ESP.ORIGINAL:
scn DXZCryoSprayScript
Short Random Short Frozen
Begin ScriptEffectStart
;//If they are just dead or frozen, just re-ice them. If GetDead == 1 PMS DXZCryoShader100 45 Endif
End
Begin ScriptEffectUpdate
; ;//Turn off Fire ; Dispel EnchFlamerEffect ; RemoveSpell SpellFlamerEffect ; RemoveSpell FlamerNormalEffect ; RemoveSpell FlamerBurnEffectSpell ; RemoveSpell FlamerCritEffect ; RemoveSpell FlamerCritEffect02 ; SMS Flames01 ; SME FlamerFireDamage
;//When their health is low, they freeze solid. Or updates if allready frozen. If GetActorValue Health <= 20 && Frozen != 1 && GetDead != 1 && IsEssential != 1 && GetUnconscious != 1 ;//Flash Freeze Set Frozen to 1 CastImmediateOnSelf DXZFrozenActor Endif
if GetUnconscious == 1 || GetPlayerControlsDisabled 0 1 0 0 1 1 1 == 1 ;//Keep actors from being shattered when hit with this weapon. ResetHealth endif
End

scn DXZCryoExplodeScript
Short Random Short Frozen
Begin ScriptEffectStart
;//If they are just dead or frozen, just re-ice them. If GetDead == 1 PMS DXZCryoShader100 45 Endif
End
Begin ScriptEffectUpdate
;//When their health is low, they freeze solid. Or updates if allready frozen. If GetActorValue Health < 50 && Frozen != 1 && GetDead != 1 && IsEssential != 1 && GetUnconscious != 1 ;//Flash Freeze Set Frozen to 1 CastImmediateOnSelf DXZFrozenActor Endif
if GetUnconscious == 1 || GetPlayerControlsDisabled 0 1 0 0 1 1 1 == 1 ;//Keep actors from being shattered when hit with this weapon. ResetHealth endif
End

SCN RWThirdQuestBypassActivatorSCRIPT
BEGIN OnActivate Player
if GetStage rdwrldThirdQuest == 40 player.RemoveItem RWThirdQuestBypassModule 1 PlaySound ObjSateProj02 SetStage rdwrldThirdQuest 50 Disable Markfordelete endif
END

SCN RWAirportTerminalDoorOpenerSCRIPT
Begin OnActivate Player
if Player.GetItemCount RWAirportKeycard < 1 Return elseif Player.GetItemCount RWAirportKeycard >= 1 RWAirportTerminalHiddenDoorREF.SetOpenState 1 PlaySound OBJSwitchButtonBPass Disable endif
END

SCN RWLegionQuestMayorUltimatumSCRIPT
int DoOnce
BEGIN OnTrigger Player
if GetStage rdwrldLegionQuest01 == 50 && RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.MayorAttack == 1 RWTheMayorREF.StartCombat Player RWTheMayorREF.RemoveFromAllFactions endif
if GetStage rdwrldLegionQuest01 == 60 && DoOnce == 0 RWGustavoREF.EquipItem ArmorNVCLPraetorian RWGustavoREF.UnequipItem HatPrewarHat RWGustavoREF.MoveTo RWGustavoAssassinMarkerREF RWGustavoREF.AddScriptPackage RWGustavoAssassinateMayorPACKAGE RWGustavoREF.EVP RWTheMayorREF.kill RWGustavoREF 1 RWHannahREF.disable Set DoOnce to 1 endif
END

SCN RWMervinShowTriggerSCRIPT
int TimerSequence float fTimer
Begin OnTrigger Player
set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
if (fTimer >= 2.0) && (TimerSequence == 0) RWMervinREF.Say RadWorldMervinExplosion set TimerSequence to 1
elseif (fTimer >= 3.0) && (TimerSequence == 1) RWMervinShowExplosionREF01.PlaceAtMe MediumExplosion set TimerSequence to 2
elseif (fTimer >= 3.5) && (TimerSequence == 2) RWMervinShowExplosionREF02.PlaceAtMe MediumExplosion set TimerSequence to 3
elseif (fTimer >= 4.0) && (TimerSequence == 3) RWMervinShowExplosionREF02.PlaceAtMe MediumExplosion set TimerSequence to 4
elseif (fTimer >= 4.5) && (TimerSequence == 4) RWMervinShowExplosionREF03.PlaceAtMe MediumExplosion set TimerSequence to 5
elseif (fTimer >= 5.0) && (TimerSequence == 5) RWMervinShowExplosionREF04.PlaceAtMe MediumExplosion set TimerSequence to 6
elseif (fTimer >= 5.5) && (TimerSequence == 6) RWMervinShowExplosionREF05.PlaceAtMe MediumExplosion set TimerSequence to 7
elseif (fTimer >= 6.0) && (TimerSequence == 7) RWMervinShowExplosionREF06.PlaceAtMe MediumExplosion set TimerSequence to 8
elseif (fTimer >= 6.5) && (TimerSequence == 8) RWMervinShowExplosionREF07.PlaceAtMe MediumExplosion set TimerSequence to 9
elseif (fTimer >= 7.0) && (TimerSequence == 9) RWMervinShowExplosionREF08.PlaceAtMe MediumExplosion set TimerSequence to 10
elseif (fTimer >= 10.0) && (TimerSequence == 10) set TimerSequence to 11 Set RadWorldMervinDialogue.Busy to 0 RWMervinREF.StopIdle RWMervinREF.StartConversation Player RadWorldMervinImpressed endif
END

SCN RWNCRCampScript
short EntryPermission short RWNCRMoralePoints short RWNCRDepressedTrooperHelp short RWNCRDepressedTrooperTalkedTo short RWNCRTalkedAboutSpy short RWNCRTakenCareOfSpy short RWNCRFindCaravan short RWNCRCaravanFound short RWMetMedic
BEGIN GameMode
if GetStage rdwrldNCRQuest01 >= 40 if player.HasPerk WildWasteland == 0 RWNCRCampGoalBoardREF.enable elseif player.HasPerk WildWasteland == 1 RWNCRCampGoalBoardWWREF.enable endif RWNCRSadTrooperREF.enable RWNCRDeserterREF01.enable RWNCRDeserterREF02.enable RWNCRDeserterREF03.enable RWNCRDeserterREF04.enable endif
if RWNCRMoralePoints >= 7 && GetStage rdwrldNCRQuest01 == 40 SetStage rdwrldNCRQuest01 50 endif
if GetStage rdwrldNCRQuest01 == 100 && (RWLegionAssaultREF01.GetDead == 1) && (RWLegionAssaultREF02.GetDead == 1) && (RWLegionAssaultREF03.GetDead == 1) && (RWLegionAssaultREF04.GetDead == 1) && (RWLegionAssaultREF05.GetDead == 1) && (RWLegionAssaultREF06.GetDead == 1) && (RWLegionAssaultREF07.GetDead == 1) && (RWLegionAssaultREF08.GetDead == 1) && (RWLegionAssaultREF09.GetDead == 1) if (RWLegionAssaultREF10.GetDead == 1) && (RWLegionAssaultREF11.GetDead == 1) && (RWLegionAssaultREF12.GetDead == 1) && (RWLegionAssaultREF13.GetDead == 1) && (RWLegionAssaultREF14.GetDead == 1) && (RWLegionAssaultREF15.GetDead == 1) && (RWLegionAssaultREF16.GetDead == 1) SetStage rdwrldNCRQuest01 110 RWNCRAssaultWarnerREF.removescriptpackage RWNCRAssaultTrooperFollowPACKAGE RWNCRAssaultWarnerREF.evp endif endif
if GetPCEnemyOfFaction RWHavasuNCRFaction && GetStage rdwrldNCRQuest01 < 200 SetStage rdwrldNCRQuest01 210 endif
if player.GetItemCount RWNCRDeserterDogtag == 4 && GetStage rdwrldNCRQuest01 == 40 SetObjectiveCompleted rdwrldNCRQuest01 43 1 endif
END

SCN RWLegionSpyDeathSCRIPT
Begin OnDeath
if GetStage rdwrldNCRQuest01 > 30 SetObjectiveCompleted rdwrldNCRQuest01 41 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldNCRQuest01 46 1 endif
set RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue.RWNCRTakenCareOfSpy to 1
if GetStageDone rdwrldLegionQuest01 200 == 0 SetStage rdwrldLegionQuest01 210 endif
if GetStageDone rdwrldGustavoQuest01 200 == 0 SetStage rdwrldGustavoQuest01 210 endif
SetEnemy PlayerFaction RWLegionFaction
END

SCN RWLegionSpyNoteSCRIPT
Begin OnActivate Player
ShowMessage RWLegionSpyPaperMessages if RWGustavoREF.GetDead == 0 RWGustavoREF.MoveTo RWNCRSpyQuestSpawnREF RWGustavoREF.StartCombat Player RWLegionSpyApartmentTriggerREF.enable endif
END

SCN RWLegionCampEntryCheckerSCRIPT
;Checks whether the player has gained entry permission from the entrance guard or not
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
if RadWorldLegionDialogue.EntryPermission != 1 SetEnemy PlayerFaction RWLegionFaction endif
END

SCN RWNCRCampEntryCheckerSCRIPT
;Checks whether the player has gained entry permission from the entrance guard or not
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
if RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue.EntryPermission != 1 SetEnemy PlayerFaction RWHavasuNCRFaction endif
END

SCN RWVault47DropDisablerSCRIPT
;Disables the player from dropping items, to prevent them from losing it upon swapping cells.
Begin OnTrigger Player
If MenuMode 1002 == 1 DisableKey 257 elseif MenuMode 1002 == 0 EnableKey 257 endif
END

SCN RWNCRRadioPartSCRIPT
BEGIN OnActivate Player
if GetStage rdwrldNCRQuest01 == 70 Disable RWNCRRadioPartREF.disable SetStage rdwrldNCRQuest01 80 player.additem RWNCRRadioPartItem 1 elseif GetStage rdwrldNCRQuest01 != 70 ShowMessage RWNCRRadioPartMessage Return endif
END

SCN RWNCRInstallRadioPartSCRIPT
BEGIN OnActivate Player
if GetStage rdwrldNCRQuest01 == 80 RWNCRRadioInstalledPartREF.enable player.removeitem RWNCRRadioPartItem 1 Disable SetStage rdwrldNCRQuest01 90 endif
END

SCN RWCoolantActivatorSCRIPT
Ref Self
Begin OnActivate Player
PlaySound ITMBottleUp player.additem DXZAmmoLiquidCoolant 20 disable
END
Begin OnHit
PlaceAtMe DXZExplosionCryoMine Disable
END

SCN RWOvergrownCavePsychoSCRIPT
int bDoOnce int TimerSequence
float fTimer
Begin OnTrigger Player
if player.HasMagicEffect PsychoMagicEffect == 1 && bDoOnce == 0 set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
if (fTimer >= 0.0) && (TimerSequence == 0) DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 player.AddScriptPackage NVDLC01PlayerKnockedOut Set TimerSequence to 1 elseif (fTimer >= 4.0) && (TimerSequence == 1) imod FadeToBlack9sISFX Playsound RWEvilLaughterFadeOut Set TimerSequence to 2 elseif (fTimer >= 6.0) && (TimerSequence == 2) Set TimerSequence to 3 elseif (fTimer >= 10.0) && (TimerSequence == 3) player.MoveTo RWHallucinationHellMarkerREF Set TimerSequence to 4 EnablePlayerControls 1 0 1 1 1 1 1 Set bDoOnce to 1 endif endif
END

SCN RWHallucinationEnemySCRIPT
int TimerSequence
float fTimer
BEGIN OnHit
set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
if (fTimer >= 0.0) && (TimerSequence == 0) Killactor RWHoraceREF 0 Set TimerSequence to 1 elseif (fTimer >= 60.0) && (TimerSequence == 1) Disable Markfordelete Set TimerSequence to 2 endif
END

SCN RWOverGrownCavePsychoEventSCRIPT
int bDoOnce int TimerSequence
float fTimer
BEGIN OnTrigger Player
set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
if (fTimer >= 0.0) && (TimerSequence == 0) EnablePlayerControls 1 0 1 1 1 1 1 player.RemoveScriptPackage NVDLC01PlayerKnockedOut player.RemoveAllItems RWOvergrownDumpREF 1 1 imod RWHallucinationISFX Set TimerSequence to 1 elseif (fTimer >= 5.0) && (TimerSequence == 1) RWHalucEnemyREF02.enable TriggerScreenBlood 100 Set TimerSequence to 2 elseif (fTimer >= 10.0) && (TimerSequence == 2) RWHalucEnemyREF02.enable TriggerScreenBlood 100 Set TimerSequence to 3 elseif (fTimer >= 15.0) && (TimerSequence == 3) RWHalucEnemyREF03.enable TriggerScreenBlood 100 Set TimerSequence to 4 elseif (fTimer >= 20.0) && (TimerSequence == 4) RWHalucEnemyREF04.enable TriggerScreenBlood 100 Set TimerSequence to 5 elseif (fTimer >= 25.0) && (TimerSequence == 5) RWHalucEnemyREF05.enable TriggerScreenBlood 100 Set TimerSequence to 6 elseif (fTimer >= 30.0) && (TimerSequence == 6) RWHalucEnemyREF06.enable TriggerScreenBlood 100 Set TimerSequence to 7 elseif (fTimer >= 35.0) && (TimerSequence == 7) RWHalucEnemyREF07.enable TriggerScreenBlood 100 Set TimerSequence to 8 elseif (fTimer >= 46.0) && (TimerSequence == 8) imod FadeToWhiteAndBackISFX DisablePlayerControls Set TimerSequence to 9 elseif (fTimer >= 50.0) && (TimerSequence == 9) player.MoveTo RWTunnelHillMarkerREF Player.AddScriptPackage NVDLC01PlayerWakesUp rimod RWHallucinationISFX RWOvergrownDumpREF.RemoveAllItems Player 1 1 Set RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.BerserkTeleport01 to 1 Set TimerSequence to 10 endif
END

SCN RWOvergrownCaveExitSCRIPT
int bDoOnce int TimerSequence
float fTimer
BEGIN OnTrigger Player
if RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.BerserkTeleport01 == 1 && bDoOnce == 0 set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
if (fTimer >= 5.0) && (TimerSequence == 0) Player.RemoveScriptPackage NVDLC01PlayerWakesUp Set TimerSequence to 1 EnablePlayerControls IncrementScriptedChallenge RWPsychoTripChallenge Set bDoOnce to 1 RWOverGrownCavePsychoTriggerREF.markfordelete Disable Markfordelete endif endif
END

SCN RWHavasuMiscDialogueQuestSCRIPT
; various variables for quests and stuff smile
short MayorAlcoholism ; knows about the mayor's alcoholism. short MendezQuest01MendezSide ; sided with Mendez in MendezQuest01 short SlaveBaited ; variable to not get more than one target short MissRocketBlackmail ; knows incriminating info to blackmail or lure Miss Rocket with. short SlaveQuestHannah ; baited hannah to the gravedigger's hut short SlaveQuestRocket ; baited miss rocket to the gravedigger's hut short SlaveQuestRegina ; baited regina to the gravedigger's hut short SlaveGagged ; variable for if target is bound in the hut short NurseGone ; variable for if mendez nurse died/escaped short NurseArrived ; variable for if Nurse has arrived at the clinic with Mendez present short NurseRunsClinic ; variable for if nurse now runs clinic short MendezQuest02Start ; to force enable Mendez quest greeting short PaulPatientMet ; variable to see if player has met Paul short ColbertTrustPoint ; stat to track if the player can initiate Colbert's quest short ColbertTrusted ; if this is 1 player can get Colbert's quest. short PassportCheck01 ; guard passport check 1 short MayorAttack ; Legion ultimatum choice attack
short BerserkTeleport01 ; for when the player gets teleported to the hill next to the tunnel
; RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.PassportCheck01
int DoOnce
BEGIN GameMode
if RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.ColbertTrustPoint >= 2 && DoOnce == 0 Set ColbertTrusted to 1 Set DoOnce to 1 endif
if RWHannahREF.GetDead && RWMissRocketREF.GetDead && RWReginaCabreraREF.GetDead && GetStage rdwrldMendezQuest02 < 200 SetStage rdwrldMendezQuest02 210 endif
END

SCN rdwrldTwitchQuest01FidgetFoundSCRIPT
;Script should update Nigel's and Twitch's quest upon searching Fidget's corpse. If you haven't talked to twitch, set the prerequisite for corpse being found.
BEGIN OnActivate
if (getActionRef == player) Activate endif
if (GetStage rdwrldTwitchQuest01 == 5) SetStage rdwrldTwitchQuest01 10 endif
if (GetStage rdwrldTwitchQuest01 < 5) SetStage rdwrldTwitchQuest01 7 endif
if (GetStage rdwrldNigelQuest01 < 10) Setstage rdwrldNigelQuest01 10 endif
END

SCN RadWorldTwitchDeathSCRIPT
Begin OnDeath
if (GetStageDone rdwrldTwitchQuest01 200 == 0) SetStage rdwrldTwitchQuest01 210 endif
END

SCN RadWorldCoreBrewingValveSCRIPT
;This script converts an empty Arizona Strong bottle to a homebrew bottle if the player is on or has completed Core's brewing quest. If not, a message displays with a generic info box.
BEGIN OnActivate Player
if GetStage rdwrldCoreQuest01 >= 5 if player.GetItemCount RWEmptyBeerBottle >= 1 player.removeItem RWEmptyBeerBottle 1 player.additem RWCoreBeer 1 PlaySound NPCHumanDrinkingWaterValve endif if player.GetItemCount RWEmptyBeerBottle == 0 ShowMessage rdwrldCoreBreweryNoBottlesMSG endif endif
if GetStage rdwrldCoreQuest01 < 5 ShowMessage rdwrldCoreBreweryNotInitatedBox endif
END

scn RWCoreBeerAddBottleScript
begin ScriptEffectStart additem RWEmptyBeerBottle 1 end

SCN RWJimmysBigRedSCRIPT
;if player has planted bomb in ant cave, pushing button will blow up cave. If player has bomb in inventory, kill player. If player is not on the quest, display message.
Begin onActivate Player
if player.getItemCount RWJimmysBomb == 1 player.placeatme C4Explosion Player.Kill Player 0
elseif (player.getItemCount RWJimmysBomb == 0) && (GetStage rdwrldJimmyQuest01 == 30) RWJimmysExplosionTriggerREF.placeatme FakeLargeExplosion 1 1024 1 SetStage rdwrldJimmyQuest01 40
elseif (player.getItemCount RWJimmysBomb == 0) && (GetStage rdwrldJimmyQuest01 != 30) ShowMessage RWJimmysBigRedMessage
endif
END

SCN RWSewerSkullScript01
int bDoOnce int TimerSequence
float fTimer
Begin OnTrigger Player
if player.HasMagicEffect PsychoMagicEffect == 1 && bDoOnce == 0 set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
if (fTimer >= 0.0) && (TimerSequence == 0) DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 player.AddScriptPackage NVDLC01PlayerKnockedOut player.additem SpareParts 500 1 Set TimerSequence to 1 elseif (fTimer >= 4.0) && (TimerSequence == 1) imod FadeToBlack9sISFX Playsound RWEvilLaughterFadeOut Set TimerSequence to 2 elseif (fTimer >= 6.0) && (TimerSequence == 2) Set TimerSequence to 3 elseif (fTimer >= 10.0) && (TimerSequence == 3) player.MoveTo RWGoreCaveMarkerREF Set TimerSequence to 4 EnablePlayerControls 1 0 0 0 1 1 0 player.RemoveScriptPackage NVDLC01PlayerKnockedOut Set bDoOnce to 1 endif endif
END

SCN RWBankBombTimerSCRIPT
int iDoOnce
float fTimer
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
if GetStage rdwrldBankQuest == 20 RWBankC4MarkerREF.enable SetStage rdwrldBankQuest 30 endif
END
Begin GameMode
if rdwrldBankQuest.BombPlanted == 1
Set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
if (ftimer >= 6) && (iDoOnce == 7) RWBankAlarm01REF.PlayGroup Left 0 RWBankAlarm02REF.PlayGroup Left 0 RWBankAlarm03REF.PlayGroup Left 0 RWBankAlarm04REF.PlayGroup Left 0 RWBankAlarmSound01REF.enable SetEnemy RWHavasuBankFaction PlayerFaction RWBankMilitiaREF01.StartCombat Player RWBankMilitiaREF02.StartCombat Player RWBankMilitiaREF03.enable RWBankMilitiaREF04.enable RWBankMilitiaREF03.StartCombat Player RWBankMilitiaREF04.StartCombat Player Set iDoOnce to 8 endif
if (ftimer >= 5) && (iDoOnce == 6) ApplyImageSpaceModifier ExplosionInFace RWBankExplosionMarkerREF.placeatme C4Explosion RWBankVaultPreBomb01REF.disable RWBankVaultPreBomb01REF.markfordelete RWBankVaultPreBomb02REF.disable RWBankVaultPreBomb02REF.markfordelete RWBankVaultPreBomb03REF.disable RWBankVaultPreBomb03REF.markfordelete RWBankVaultPreBomb04REF.disable RWBankVaultPreBomb04REF.markfordelete RWBankVaultPreBomb05REF.disable RWBankVaultPreBomb05REF.markfordelete RWBankVaultPreBomb06REF.disable RWBankVaultPreBomb06REF.markfordelete RWBankVaultPreBomb07REF.disable RWBankVaultPreBomb07REF.markfordelete RWBankC4PlantedREF.disable RWBankC4PlantedREF.markfordelete RWBankVaultBrokeREF01.enable 0 RWBankVaultBrokeREF02.enable 0 RWBankVaultBrokeREF03.enable 0 RWBankVaultBrokeREF04.enable 0 RWBankVaultBrokeREF05.enable 0 RWBankVaultBrokeREF06.enable 0 RWBankVaultBrokeREF07.enable 0 RWBankVaultBrokeREF08.enable 0 RWBankVaultBrokeREF09.enable 0 RWBankVaultBrokeREF10.enable 0 RWBankVaultBrokeREF11.enable 0 RWBankVaultBrokeREF12.enable 0 Set iDoOnce to 7 endif
if (ftimer >= 4.5) && (iDoOnce == 5) PlaySound WPNMineTick Set iDoOnce to 6 endif
if (ftimer >= 4) && (iDoOnce == 4) PlaySound WPNMineTick Set iDoOnce to 5 endif
if (ftimer >= 3.5) && (iDoOnce == 3) PlaySound WPNMineTick Set iDoOnce to 4 endif
if (ftimer >= 3) && (iDoOnce == 2) PlaySound WPNMineTick Set iDoOnce to 3 endif
if (ftimer >= 2) && (iDoOnce == 1) PlaySound WPNMineTick Set iDoOnce to 2 endif
if (ftimer >= 1) && (iDoOnce == 0) PlaySound WPNMineTick Set iDoOnce to 1 endif
endif
END

SCN RadWorldIntroQuestInsidePlaneSCRIPT
int iDoOnce int RallyCommTalk int Music int Steam float fTimer
Begin OnTriggerEnter player
DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 0 1 1
player.RemoveAllItems RadWorldEquipmentJailREF 1 1 player.AddItem OutfitJumpsuitTLHandyman 1 1 player.EquipItem OutfitJumpsuitTLHandyman 0 1 PipboyRadioOff RallysAirplaneREF.disable 0 SetObjectiveCompleted rdwrldIntroQuest 20 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldIntroQuest 30 1
END
;Above block takes player equipment, gives them a jumpsuit, turns radio off and removes the related objects from the mojave. ;Below block is an ingame cutscene of the plane crashing.
Begin OnTrigger player
set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
if (fTimer >= 5.0) && (RallyCommTalk == 0) RWRallyCommREF.Say RadWorldRallyPlaneComm01 Set RallyCommTalk to 1
elseif (fTimer >= 60.0) && (RallyCommTalk == 1) RWRallyCommREF.Say RadWorldRallyPlaneComm02 Set RallyCommTalk to 2
elseif (fTimer >= 88.0) && (RallyCommTalk == 2) RWRallyCommREF.Say RadWorldRallyPlaneComm03 Set RallyCommTalk to 3
elseif (fTimer >= 96.0) && (RallyCommTalk == 3) RWRallyCommREF.Say RadWorldRallyPlaneComm04 Set RallyCommTalk to 4
elseif (fTimer >= 57.0) && (Steam == 0) RWPlaneInteriorSteamREF01.enable Set Steam to 1
elseif (fTimer >= 72.0) && (Steam == 1) RWPlaneInteriorSteamREF01.disable Set Steam to 2
; Below is events, above is dialogue timer.
elseif (fTimer >= 10.0) && (iDoOnce == 0); kungkobra sign PlaySound RWIntroMusicGuitar01 RWIntroLogoREF01.PlayGroup Left 0 Set iDoOnce to 1
elseif (fTimer >= 13.0) && (iDoOnce == 1) RWIntroLogoREF01.PlayGroup Right 0 Set iDoOnce to 2
elseif (fTimer >= 16.0) && (iDoOnce == 2) ; akarion sign PlaySound RWIntroMusicGuitar02 RWIntroLogoREF02.PlayGroup Left 0 Set iDoOnce to 3
elseif (fTimer >= 19.0) && (iDoOnce == 3) RWIntroLogoREF02.PlayGroup Right 0 Set iDoOnce to 4
elseif (fTimer >= 22.0) && (iDoOnce == 4) ; mod in two acts sign PlaySound RWIntroMusic01 RWIntroLogoREF03.PlayGroup Left 0 Set iDoOnce to 5
elseif (fTimer >= 25.0) && (iDoOnce == 5) RWIntroLogoREF03.PlayGroup Right 0 Set iDoOnce to 6
elseif (fTimer >= 31) && (iDoOnce == 6) ; havasu blues sign RWIntroLogoREF04.PlayGroup Left 0 Set iDoOnce to 7
elseif (fTimer >= 47.0) && (iDoOnce == 7) RWIntroLogoREF04.PlayGroup Right 0 Set iDoOnce to 8
elseif (fTimer >= 90.0) && (iDoOnce == 8) RadWorldPlaneExplosionMarker.PlaceAtMe RadWorldPlaneExplosion player.AddScriptPackage NVDLC01PlayerKnockedOut RadWorldPlaneBackFireREF.enable RadWorldPlaneAlarmREF.enable Set iDoOnce to 9
elseif (fTimer >= 91.5) && (iDoOnce == 9) RadWorldPlaneExplosionMarker.PlaceAtMe RadWorldPlaneExplosion RadWorldPlaneLSmokeREF.enable Set iDoOnce to 10
elseif (fTimer >= 93.0) && (iDoOnce == 10) RadWorldPlaneExplosionMarker.PlaceAtMe RadWorldPlaneExplosion RadWorldPlaneRSmokeREF.enable RadWorldPlaneBLSmokeREF.enable Set iDoOnce to 11
elseif (fTimer >= 94.5) && (iDoOnce == 11) RadWorldPlaneExplosionMarker.PlaceAtMe RadWorldPlaneExplosion Set iDoOnce to 12
elseif (fTimer >= 95.0) && (iDoOnce == 12) RadWorldPlaneExplosionMarker.PlaceAtMe RadWorldPlaneExplosion RadWorldPlaneSparkREF.enable Set iDoOnce to 13
elseif (fTimer >= 96.0) && (iDoOnce == 13) RadWorldPlaneExplosionMarker.PlaceAtMe RadWorldPlaneExplosion RadWorldPlaneSparkREF.enable Set iDoOnce to 14
elseif (fTimer >= 97.0) && (iDoOnce == 14) RadWorldPlaneExplosionMarker.PlaceAtMe RadWorldPlaneExplosion imod FadeToBlackPermanent Set iDoOnce to 15
elseif (fTimer >= 105.0) && (iDoOnce == 15) player.moveto RadWorldIntroQuestStartMarker SetStage rdwrldIntroQuest 200 SetObjectiveCompleted rdwrldIntroQuest 200 1 StopSound RWIntroMusic01 Set iDoOnce to 16 endif
END

SCN RadWorldIntroQuestWakingUpSCRIPT
Int iDoOnce Float fTimer Float fHealth
BEGIN OnTrigger player
set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
if (fTimer >= 6.0) && (iDoOnce == 1) Player.RemoveScriptPackage NVDLC01PlayerWakesUp EnablePlayerControls Autosave Set iDoOnce to 2
elseif (fTimer >= 1.0) && (iDoOnce == 0) Player.AddScriptPackage NVDLC01PlayerWakesUp Set GameDay To ( GameDay + 1 ); SetStage rdwrldSecondQuest 5 SetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldSecondQuest 5 1 player.RestoreAV RadiationRads 1000 Player.DamageAV RightMobilityCondition 100
Set fHealth to (Player.GetAV Health - 10) If (Player.GetAV Health > 10) && (fHealth > 0) Player.DamageAV Health fHealth EndIf
Set iDoOnce to 1
endif
END

if (RWLegionFinaleMilitiaREF01.GetDead == 1 && RWLegionFinaleMilitiaREF02.GetDead == 1 && RWLegionFinaleMilitiaREF03.GetDead == 1 && RWLegionFinaleMilitiaREF04.GetDead == 1 && RWLegionFinaleMilitiaREF05.GetDead == 1 && RWLegionFinaleMilitiaREF06.GetDead == 1 && RWLegionFinaleMilitiaREF07.GetDead == 1 && RWLegionFinaleMilitiaREF08.GetDead == 1) SetStage rdwrldLegionQuest01 70 if rdwrldBankQuest < 200 SetStage rdwrldBankQuest 210 endif endif

SCN RWBerserkQuest01SCRIPT
short DoOnce ;Script blocker float Timer ;Timer used for animation control
Begin GameMode
if GetStage rdwrldBerserkQuest01 == 10 && rdwrldJohnnyREF.GetDead == 1 && RWCoreREF.GetDead == 1 && RWYuukoREF.GetDead == 1 && rdwrldNigelREF.GetDead == 1
if ( DoOnce== 0 ) set Timer to 10 set DoOnce to 1 endif
set Timer to ( Timer - GetSecondsPassed )
if ( Timer <= 9 ) && ( DoOnce == 1 ) IMod FadeToBlackPermanent DisablePlayerControls set DoOnce to 2 endif
if ( Timer <= 3 ) && ( DoOnce == 2 ) player.MoveTo RWShantyBerserkMarkerREF RWShantySettlerREF01.disable RWShantySettlerREF02.disable RWShantySettlerREF03.disable RWShantySettlerREF04.disable RWShantySettlerREF05.disable RWShantySettlerREF06.disable RWShantySettlerREF07.disable RWShantySettlerREF08.disable RWShantySettlerREF09.disable RWShantySettlerREF10.disable RWShantySettlerREF11.disable RWShantySettlerREF12.disable RWBerserkGoreREF01.enable RWBerserkGoreREF02.enable RWBerserkGoreREF03.enable RWBerserkGoreREF04.enable RWBerserkGoreREF05.enable RWBerserkGoreREF06.enable RWBerserkGoreREF07.enable RWBerserkGoreREF08.enable RWBerserkGoreREF09.enable RWBerserkGoreREF10.enable rdwrldJohnnyREF.MoveTo RWBerserkNPCMarkerREF RWCoreREF.MoveTo RWBerserkNPCMarkerREF RWYuukoREF.MoveTo RWBerserkNPCMarkerREF rdwrldNigelREF.MoveTo RWBerserkNPCMarkerREF set DoOnce to 3 endif
if ( Timer <= 0 ) && ( DoOnce == 3) EnablePlayerControls SetStage rdwrldBerserkQuest01 20 IncrementScriptedChallenge RWPsychoTripChallenge set DoOnce to 4 endif endif END

SCN RWMendezQuest02CaptiveScript
; RWMendezSlaveQuestCaptiveMarker RWMissRocketREF RWReginaCabreraREF
int DoOnce int TimerInc
float fTimer
BEGIN OnTrigger Player
if RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.SlaveQuestHannah == 1 && GetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldMendezQuest02 31
set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
if (fTimer >= 6.0) && (TimerInc == 1) RWHannahREF.AddScriptPackage RWSlaveQuestTargetTalkPackage RWHannahREF.MoveTo RWMendezSlaveQuestTargetMarker SetObjectiveCompleted rdwrldMendezQuest02 31 1 Set TimerInc to 2
elseif (fTimer >= 0.0) && (TimerInc == 0) DisablePlayerControls ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Player.MoveTo RWMendezSlaveQuestPlayerMarker Set TimerInc to 1 endif endif
if RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.SlaveQuestRocket == 1 && GetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldMendezQuest02 31
set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
if (fTimer >= 6.0) && (TimerInc == 1) RWMissRocketREF.AddScriptPackage RWSlaveQuestTargetTalkPackage RWMissRocketREF.MoveTo RWMendezSlaveQuestTargetMarker SetObjectiveCompleted rdwrldMendezQuest02 31 1 Set TimerInc to 2
elseif (fTimer >= 0.0) && (TimerInc == 0) DisablePlayerControls ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Player.MoveTo RWMendezSlaveQuestPlayerMarker Set TimerInc to 1 endif endif
if RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.SlaveQuestRegina == 1 && GetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldMendezQuest02 31
set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
if (fTimer >= 6.0) && (TimerInc == 1) RWReginaCabreraREF.AddScriptPackage RWSlaveQuestTargetTalkPackage RWReginaCabreraREF.MoveTo RWMendezSlaveQuestTargetMarker SetObjectiveCompleted rdwrldMendezQuest02 31 1 Set TimerInc to 2
elseif (fTimer >= 0.0) && (TimerInc == 0) DisablePlayerControls ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Player.MoveTo RWMendezSlaveQuestPlayerMarker Set TimerInc to 1 endif endif
END

SCN RWLegionCampQuestSCRIPT
short EntryPermission short LegionCampDead short SlaveTeleport
BEGIN GameMode
if RWLegionCampRecruitREF01.GetDead == 1 && RWLegionCampRecruitREF02.GetDead == 1 && RWLegionCampRecruitREF03.GetDead == 1 && RWLegionCampRecruitREF04.GetDead == 1 && RWLegionCampRecruitREF05.GetDead == 1 if RWLegionCampRecruitREF06.GetDead == 1 && RWLegionCampRecruitREF07.GetDead == 1 && RWLegionCampRecruitREF08.GetDead == 1 && RWLegionCampRecruitREF09.GetDead == 1 && RWLegionLeaderREF.GetDead == 1 if RWLegionDoorGuardREF.GetDead == 1 && RWLegionDoorGuard2REF.GetDead == 1 && RWLegionSoldierREF01.GetDead == 1 set LegionCampDead to 1 endif endif endif
if LegionCampDead == 1 && RWLegionSlave02.GetDead == 0 RWLegionSlave02.RemoveScriptPackage RWLegionSlave02DayPackage RWLegionSlave02.RemoveScriptPackage RWHavasuNCRGuardSleepPackage RWLegionSlave02.AddScriptPackage RWNurseEscapePACKAGE RWLegionSlave02.evp endif
if LegionCampDead == 1 && GetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldMendezQuest02 39 == 1 SetStage rdwrldMendezQuest02 40 endif
if GetPCEnemyOfFaction RWLegionFaction if GetStage rdwrldGustavoQuest01 < 200 SetStage rdwrldGustavoQuest01 210 endif if GetStage rdwrldLegionQuest01 < 200 SetStage rdwrldLegionQuest01 210 endif endif
if GetStage rdwrldMendezQuest02 >= 40 && GetStage rdwrldMendezQuest02 != 210 && Player.GetInCell RadWorldLegionMainTent == 0 && SlaveTeleport == 0
if RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.SlaveQuestHannah == 1 RWHannahSlaveREF.enable Set SlaveTeleport to 1 endif
if RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.SlaveQuestRocket == 1 RWRocketSlaveREF.enable Set SlaveTeleport to 1 endif
if RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.SlaveQuestRegina == 1 RWReginaSlaveREF.enable Set SlaveTeleport to 1 endif
endif END

SCN RWFourthQuestSCRIPT
short SpawnMM ; variable for Mysterious Man outside gun shop. short MMDead ; if mysterious man is killed. short HunterMoving ; if the player tells the bounty hunters to go to bunker short AlarmStart ; starts the alarm short Disarmed ; if the ICBM is disarmed
int aDoOnce
BEGIN GameMode
if GetHasNote RWFourthQuestNote01 == 1 && GetStage rdwrldFourthQuest == 20 SetStage rdwrldFourthQuest 25 endif
if RWMysteriousMan.GetDead == 1 Set MMDead to 1 endif
if HunterMoving == 1 && aDoOnce == 0 RWFourthBountyHunter01REF.removescriptpackage DefaultSandboxEditorLocation256NoSleep RWFourthBountyHunter02REF.removescriptpackage DefaultSandboxEditorLocation256NoSleep RWFourthBountyHunter03REF.removescriptpackage DefaultSandboxEditorLocation256NoSleep RWFourthBountyHunter01REF.addscriptpackage DefaultTravelToLinkedPackage RWFourthBountyHunter02REF.addscriptpackage DefaultTravelToLinkedPackage RWFourthBountyHunter03REF.addscriptpackage DefaultTravelToLinkedPackage RWFourthBountyHunter01REF.evp RWFourthBountyHunter02REF.evp RWFourthBountyHunter03REF.evp Set aDoOnce to 1 endif
if GetObjectiveCompleted rdwrldFourthQuest 60 == 1 && RWFourthBountyHunter01REF.GetInCell RadWorldBigBunker == 0 RWFourthBountyHunter01REF.moveto RWFourthBountyBunkerMarkerREF01 RWFourthBountyHunter02REF.moveto RWFourthBountyBunkerMarkerREF02 RWFourthBountyHunter03REF.moveto RWFourthBountyBunkerMarkerREF03 endif
if RWFourthBunkerLockedDoor02REF.GetLocked == 0 RWBunkerReactorGreenLightREF.enable RWBunkerReactorRedLightREF.disable endif
if AlarmStart == 1
PlaySound HVSelfDestructKlaxon RWFourthTreasureDoorREF.SetOpenState 0 RWFourthTreasureDoorREF.Lock 255 RWFourthLaunchSmokeREF01.enable RWFourthLaunchSmokeREF02.enable RWFourthBradleyRelayDoorREF.unlock RWFourthBradleyRelayDoorREF.SetOpenState 1 RWFourthUTLRoomDoorREF1.lock 255 RWFourthBunkerMechanicDoorREF.SetOpenState 0 RWFourthBunkerMechanicDoorREF.Lock 255
endif
if Disarmed == 1 RWFourthLaunchSmokeREF01.disable RWFourthLaunchSmokeREF02.disable RWFourthDisarmTriggerREF.Disable RWFourthBunkerKeyCardSlotREF.enable SetStage rdwrldFourthQuest 100 RWFourthTreasureDoorREF.unlock RWFourthTreasureDoorREF.setOpenState 1 Set rdwrldFourthQuest.AlarmStart to 0 RWFourthUTLRoomDoorREF1.unlock RWFourthBunkerMechanicDoorREF.Unlock RWBunkerTreasureGreenLightREF.enable RWBunkerTreasureRedLightREF.disable endif
END

SCN RWFourthBunkerNUKESCRIPT
; this script blows the bunker up if you escape without disarming the ICBM inside first. Otherwise it just completes the quest.
int TimerSequence float fTimer short bRunTimer short DoOnce Ref rExplosion
; RWFourthDestroyedBunkerDoorREF ; RWFourthBunkerDoorREF
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
if GetStage rdwrldFourthQuest == 90 Set bRunTimer to 1 set rdwrldFourthQuest.AlarmStart to 0 DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 imod FadeToBlackAndBackISFX RWNukeCameraPlatformREF.enable RWFourthBountyHunter01REF.disable RWFourthBountyHunter02REF.disable RWFourthBountyHunter03REF.disable elseif GetStage rdwrldFourthQuest == 100 SetStage rdwrldFourthQuest 200 if RWFourthBountyHunter01REF.GetDead == 0 RWFourthBountyHunter01REF.disable endif if RWFourthBountyHunter02REF.GetDead == 0 RWFourthBountyHunter02REF.disable endif if RWFourthBountyHunter03REF.GetDead == 0 RWFourthBountyHunter03REF.disable endif endif
END
Begin GameMode
;RWBunkerNukeFXREF.playgroup Forward 1
If (bRunTimer == 0) Return; Else
set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
if (fTimer >= 2.0) && (TimerSequence == 0) RWFourthBunkerDoorREF.lock 255 RWFourthUTLRubbleREF.enable player.MoveTo RWNukeCameraMarkerREF Player.SetAngle X -5 set TimerSequence to 1
elseif (fTimer >= 6.0) && (TimerSequence == 1) Set rExplosion to RWFourthBunkerNukeMarkerREF.PlaceAtMe MS11SmallMegatonNuke rExplosion.SetAngle Z 90 RWFourthOutsideBunkerRadREF.enable set TimerSequence to 2
elseif (fTimer >= 25.0) && (TimerSequence == 2) RWFourthBunkerDoorREF.disable RWFourthDestroyedBunkerDoorREF.enable imod FadeToBlackAndBackISFX SetStage rdwrldFourthQuest 200 set TimerSequence to 3
elseif (fTimer >= 27.0) && (TimerSequence == 3) player.MoveTo RWFourthAfterNukeCutsceneREF RWNukeCameraPlatformREF.disable RWNukeCameraPlatformREF.markfordelete EnablePlayerControls RWBunkerNukeTriggerREF.disable RWBunkerNukeTriggerREF.markfordelete set TimerSequence to 4 set bRunTimer to 0
endif endif
END

SCN RWBankDetectionSCRIPT
int Detected
Begin OnTrigger Player
if RWBankMilitiaREF01.GetDetected Player && RWBankMilitiaREF01.GetDead == 0 && Detected == 0 RWBankMilitiaREF01.startcombat Player SetEnemy RWHavasuBankFaction PlayerFaction Set Detected to 1 Disable endif
if RWBankMilitiaREF02.GetDetected Player && RWBankMilitiaREF02.GetDead == 0 && Detected == 0 RWBankMilitiaREF02.startcombat Player SetEnemy RWHavasuBankFaction PlayerFaction Set Detected to 1 Disable endif
if RWHavasuBankTellerREF01.GetDetected Player && RWHavasuBankTellerREF01.GetDead == 0 && Detected == 0 RWHavasuBankTellerREF01.Say RadWorldBankTellerDetection RWHavasuBankTellerREF01.startcombat Player SetEnemy RWHavasuBankFaction PlayerFaction Set Detected to 1 Disable endif
if RWHavasuBankTellerREF02.GetDetected Player && RWHavasuBankTellerREF02.GetDead == 0 && Detected == 0 RWHavasuBankTellerREF02.Say RadWorldBankTellerDetection RWHavasuBankTellerREF02.startcombat Player SetEnemy RWHavasuBankFaction PlayerFaction Set Detected to 1 Disable endif
if RWHavasuBankTellerREF03.GetDetected Player && RWHavasuBankTellerREF03.GetDead == 0 && Detected == 0 RWHavasuBankTellerREF03.Say RadWorldBankTellerDetection RWHavasuBankTellerREF03.startcombat Player SetEnemy RWHavasuBankFaction PlayerFaction Set Detected to 1 Disable endif
if RWHavasuBankTellerREF04.GetDetected Player && RWHavasuBankTellerREF03.GetDead == 0 && Detected == 0 RWHavasuBankTellerREF04.Say RadWorldBankTellerDetection RWHavasuBankTellerREF04.startcombat Player SetEnemy RWHavasuBankFaction PlayerFaction Set Detected to 1 Disable endif
if Detected == 1 RWBankAlarm01REF.PlayGroup Left 0 RWBankAlarm02REF.PlayGroup Left 0 RWBankAlarm03REF.PlayGroup Left 0 RWBankAlarm04REF.PlayGroup Left 0 RWBankAlarmSound01REF.enable endif
END

scn RWTrapGrenadeRifleSCRIPT ; ;This script runs the shotgun trap. If activated by a remote source, it shoud fire indefinitely. ;The player can loot some shotgun shells if able to deactivate it. ; ;VVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVV ;Commented out combat shotgun reward.
short armed short button short skillPassed short init short doOnce
short rewardXPOnce short XPForDisarm ;==================================================== begin OnLoad
setStage NQlvl 1
if init == 0 set armed to 1 set init to 1 endif
end ;====================================================
;==================================================== begin onActivate
if armed == 1 ;is the trap already activated/disarmed? if isActionRef player == 1 ;can the player disarm the trap? if player.getAV Repair >= NQlvl.TRAPShotgunSkillReq ShowMessage RWTrapGrenadeRifleDetectMsg set skillPassed to 1 else ;Message "Your Repair skill is not high enough to disarm this trap." ShowMessage TrapLowSkillRepairMsg NQlvl.TRAPShotgunSkillReq endIf else if doOnce == 0 fireWeapon WeapNVGrenadeRifle set doOnce to 1 endif endif endif
end ;====================================================
;====================================================
begin gameMode
if skillPassed == 1 ;don't run stuff in game mode unless recently activated set button to getButtonPressed ;grab the button state, you don't know when this will be set if button > -1 ;if a valid response is received start doing stuff if button == 1 ShowMessage TrapDisarmMsg set armed to 0 ;disarm the trap
if rewardXPOnce == 0 if NQlvl.TRAPShotgunSkillReq< getGS iLockLevelMaxVeryEasy set XPForDisarm to 0 elseif NQlvl.TRAPShotgunSkillReq< getGS iLockLevelMaxEasy set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardVeryEasy elseif NQlvl.TRAPShotgunSkillReq< getGS iLockLevelMaxAverage set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardEasy elseif NQlvl.TRAPShotgunSkillReq< getGS iLockLevelMaxHard set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardAverage elseif NQlvl.TRAPShotgunSkillReq< getGS iLockLevelMaxVeryHard set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardHard else set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardVeryHard endif
set rewardXPOnce to 1 rewardXP XPforDisarm endif placeatme shotgunTrapShell01 1 ;player.additemHealthpercent WeapNVSingleShotgun 1 0.3 player.additem Ammo40mmGrenade 1 disable
endif set skillPassed to 0 ;stop running stuff endif endif
end

SCN RWBountyProgressScript
int BountyProgress int MinerMover
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
if BountyProgress == 0 && GetStage rdwrldBountyQuest01 == 200 RWBountyNote02REF.enable set BountyProgress to 1 endif
if BountyProgress == 1 && GetStage rdwrldBountyQuest02 == 200 RWBountyNote03REF.enable set BountyProgress to 2 endif
if BountyProgress == 2 && GetStage rdwrldBountyQuest03 == 200 RWBountyNote04REF.enable set BountyProgress to 3 endif
if GetStage rdwrldBountyQuest04 >= 200 RWCelesteREF.disable RWCelesteMerc01REF.disable RWCelesteMerc02REF.disable RWCelesteMerc03REF.disable RWCelesteBrahminREF.disable RWBounty04AmbushREF.disable RWPierceClemonsREF.disable RWPierceClemonsMerc01REF.disable RWPierceClemonsMerc02REF.disable RWCelesteREF.markfordelete RWCelesteMerc01REF.markfordelete RWCelesteMerc02REF.markfordelete RWCelesteMerc03REF.markfordelete RWCelesteBrahminREF.markfordelete RWBounty04AmbushREF.markfordelete RWPierceClemonsREF.markfordelete RWPierceClemonsMerc01REF.markfordelete RWPierceClemonsMerc02REF.markfordelete set BountyProgress to 4 endif
if GetStageDone rdwrldPittsburgPointQuest01 10 >= 1 && Player.GetHasNote RWHelpWantedPoster01 == 0 RWHelpWantedPoster01REF.disable endif
if GetQuestCompleted rdwrldPittsburgPointQuest02 == 1 && Player.GetHasNote RWHelpWantedPoster03 == 0 RWHelpWantedPoster03REF.enable endif
if GetStage rdwrldMinerQuest01 == 10 && MinerMover == 0 RWMinerCaptainREF.moveto RWMinersCaptainHutREF RWMinerCaptainREF.resetAI RWMiner01REF.moveto RWMinerTeleportHutREF RWMiner02REF.moveto RWMinerTeleportHutREF RWMiner03REF.moveto RWMinerTeleportHutREF RWMiner01REF.resetAI RWMiner02REF.resetAI RWMiner03REF.resetAI Set MinerMover to 1 endif
if GetStage rdwrldFourthQuest == 20 && RWMysteriousMan.GetDisabled == 0 RWMysteriousMan.StartConversation Player RadWorldFourthQuestMysteriousManForceGreet endif
END

SCN RWBounty04CelesteAmbushSCRIPT
;RWBounty04StormingInMarkerREF short DoOnce
Begin OnTrigger Player
if GetStage rdwrldBountyQuest04 == 200 && RWCelesteMerc01REF.GetDead == 0 && RWCelesteMerc02REF.GetDead == 0 && RWCelesteMerc03REF.GetDead == 0 && DoOnce == 0 RWCelesteMerc01REF.MoveTo RWBounty04Ambush02REF RWCelesteMerc02REF.MoveTo RWBounty04Ambush03REF RWCelesteMerc03REF.MoveTo RWBounty04Ambush04REF StartCombat Player StartCombat RWPierceClemonsREF endif
if GetStage rdwrldBountyQuest04 == 200 && RWCelesteREF.GetDead == 0 && DoOnce == 0 RWCelesteREF.MoveTo RWBounty04Ambush01REF StartCombat Player StartCombat RWPierceClemonsREF Set DoOnce to 1 endif
END

scn RWPPHElevatorSCRIPT
int Button
begin OnActivate ref reffer set reffer to GetActionRef if GetActionRef == player showmessage RWPPHElevatorMessage else if reffer.GetPlayerTeammate == 1 reffer.moveto player endif endif end
begin GameMode set Button to GetButtonPressed ref rMarker if Button == 1 player.MoveTo RWPPHBasementMarkerREF set rMarker to RWPPHBasementMarkerREF Autosave elseif Button == 2 player.MoveTo RWPPHLobbyMarkerREF set rMarker to RWPPHLobbyMarkerREF Autosave elseif Button == 3 player.MoveTo RWPPHSuitesMarkerREF set rMarker to RWPPHSuitesMarkerREF Autosave elseif Button == 4 player.MoveTo RWPPHSuitesMarkerREF set rMarker to RWPPHSuitesMarkerREF Autosave endif if (Button == 1 || Button == 2 || Button == 3 || Button == 4) if (VNPCFollowers.bBooneHired) && (CraigBooneREF.Waiting != 1) CraigBooneREF.MoveTo rMarker; endif if (VNPCFollowers.bCassHired) && (RoseofSharonCassidyREF.Waiting != 1) RoseofSharonCassidyREF.MoveTo rMarker; endif if (VNPCFollowers.bVeronicaHired) && (VeronicaREF.Waiting != 1) VeronicaREF.MoveTo rMarker; endif if (VNPCFollowers.bLilyHired) && (LilyREF.Waiting != 1) LilyREF.MoveTo rMarker; endif if (VNPCFollowers.RaulHired) && (RaulREF.Waiting != 1) RaulREF.MoveTo rMarker; endif if (VNPCFollowers.ArcadeHired) && (ArcadeREF.Waiting != 1) ArcadeREF.MoveTo rMarker; endif if (VNPCFollowers.bEDEHired) && (EDE1REF.Waiting != 1) if EDE1Ref.GetDisabled == 0 EDE1Ref.MoveTo rMarker elseif EDE2Ref.GetDisabled == 0 EDE2Ref.MoveTo rMarker elseif EDE3Ref.GetDisabled == 0 EDE3Ref.MoveTo rMarker endif endif if (VNPCFollowers.RexHired) && (RexREF.Waiting != 1) RexREF.MoveTo rMarker; endif endif end

SCN RWAdvertPaintSCRIPT
;When the player interacts with the marked spot on the wall, disable controls and fade out whilst playing splash noises. ;Enable the advert decal and then activate player controls.
BEGIN OnActivate Player
if GetStage rdwrldPittsburgPointQuest03 == 10 && player.getitemcount RWPaintBucket == 1 DisablePlayerControls Disable RWAdvertTimerBoxREF.enable endif
END

SCN RWPaintBucketScript
Begin OnAdd Player
SetStage rdwrldPittsburgPointQuest03 10
END

SCN RWAdvertTimerTriggerSCRIPT
BEGIN OnTrigger Player
int iDoOnce
float fTimer
Set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
if (ftimer >= 3) && (iDoOnce == 3) Player.RemoveItem RWPaintBucket 1 PlaySound NPCIdleBarTendBucketSplash SetStage rdwrldPittsburgPointQuest03 30 EnablePlayerControls Set iDoOnce to 4 endif
if (ftimer >= 2) && (iDoOnce == 2) RWPPHAdvert01REF.enable PlaySound FSTWaterWalkR Set iDoOnce to 3 endif
if (ftimer >= 1) && (iDoOnce == 1) PlaySound FSTWaterWalkL Set iDoOnce to 2 endif
if (ftimer >= 0) && (iDoOnce == 0) PlaySound NPCIdleBarTendBucketSplash ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Set iDoOnce to 1 endif
END

SCN RWJimmysQuest02DeliveredSCRIPT
int DoOnce
begin OnTrigger Player
if (IsPlayerGrabbedRef RWJimmysCrateREF && DoOnce == 0) SetStage rdwrldJimmyQuest02 20 set DoOnce to 1 RWJimmysQuest02HoraceBoxREF.disable MarkForDelete endif
end

SCN RWExplosivesMarkerMineSCRIPT
BEGIN OnActivate Player
if GetStage rdwrldMinerQuest01 == 30 && player.getitemcount RWDynamiteBundle >= 1
RWMineDynamiteStackREF.enable player.removeitem RWDynamiteBundle 1 SetStage rdwrldMinerQuest01 40 RWExplosivesMarkerSpotREF.Disable RWExplosivesMarkerSpotREF.MarkForDelete
endif
END

SCN RWMineDetonatorSCRIPT
Begin OnActivate Player
if GetStage rdwrldMinerQuest01 != 40 ShowMessage RWJimmysBigRedMessage elseif GetStage rdwrldMinerQuest01 == 40 DisablePlayerControls RWMineExplostionTriggerREF.enable RWMineDetonatorButtonREF.setdestroyed 1 endif
END

SCN RWMineExplosionSCRIPT
;This script activates after player presses detonator, fades to black and puts them in designated spot then explodes the dynamite and exchanges rubble with a way down.
BEGIN OnTrigger Player
int iDoOnce
float fTimer
Set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
if (ftimer >= 10) && (iDoOnce == 3) EnablePlayerControls RWMineExplostionTriggerREF.disable RWMineExplostionTriggerREF.markfordelete SetStage rdwrldMinerQuest01 50 Set iDoOnce to 4 endif
if (ftimer >= 6) && (iDoOnce == 2) ApplyImageSpaceModifier ExplosionInFace RWMineExplosionMarkerREF.placeatme FakeLargeExplosion RWMineExplosionMarkerREF.placeatme FakeLargeExplosion PlaySound FXEventBoulderSmall RWMinePreEx01REF.disable RWMinePreEx02REF.disable RWMinePreEx01REF.markfordelete RWMinePreEx02REF.markfordelete RWMinePostExREF.enable RWMineDynamiteStackREF.disable RWMineDynamiteStackREF.markfordelete RWMineExplosiveWireREF.disable RWMineExplosiveWireREF.markfordelete RWPostExSmokeREF.enable Set iDoOnce to 3 endif
if (ftimer >= 2) && (iDoOnce == 1) player.moveto RWMineExplosionWatchMarkerREF RWMinerCaptainREF.moveto RWMinerSmithExplosionMarkerREF Set iDoOnce to 2 endif
if (ftimer >= 0) && (iDoOnce == 0) ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Set iDoOnce to 1 endif
END

SCN RWMiner04DilemmaScript
short Button short msgshown int iDoOnce
BEGIN OnActivate
if IsActionRef player && iDoOnce == 0 && GetStage rdwrldMinerQuest01 == 60 ShowMessage RWMiner04DilemmaMessage set msgshown to 1 endif END
BEGIN GameMode
if msgshown == 1 set Button to GetButtonPressed
if ( Button == 1 ) player.additem RWMinerQuestGem 1 RewardKarma -75 SetStage rdwrldMinerQuest01 75 RWMiner04REF.removeitem RWMinerQuestGem 1 Set iDoOnce to 1 elseif ( Button == 0 ) set msgshown to 0 SetStage rdwrldMinerQuest01 70 RWMiner04REF.removeitem RWMinerQuestGem 1 return
endif endif END
BEGIN OnHit
SetStage rdwrldMinerQuest01 75 Set iDoOnce to 1
END

SCN RWMineExploredScript
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
if GetStage rdwrldMinerQuest01 == 50 SetStage rdwrldMinerQuest01 60 RWMineExploredTriggerREF.disable RWMineExploredTriggerREF.markfordelete endif
END

SCN RWMinerQuestCleanupScript
;Once the quest is complete, bury the miner if evil option or put him in a bed to rest if he is spared.
int bDoOnce
Begin OnTrigger Player
if GetStage rdwrldMinerQuest01 >= 200 && bDoOnce == 0
RWMinerCaptainREF.moveto RWMinersCaptainHutREF RWMinerCaptainREF.resetAI RWMiner04REF.markfordelete RWMineFuse01REF.markfordelete RWMineDetonatorButtonREF.markfordelete RWMineDetonatorBoxREF.markfordelete
if player.GetItemCount RWMinerQuestGem == 1 RWMiner04GraveMudREF.enable RWMiner04GraveCrossREF.enable elseif player.GetItemCount RWMinerQuestGem == 0 RWMiner04AliveREF.enable RWMiner04AliveREF.resetAI RWMiner04AliveREF.additem RWMinerQuestGem 1 endif RWMinerQuestCleanupREF.disable RWMinerQuestCleanupREF.markfordelete
set bDoOnce to 1
endif
END

SetEnemy PlayerFaction RWMinersFaction
END

SCN RWBoatToMojaveSCRIPT
; RWCatfishBayBoatREF01, RWCatfishBayBoatMarkerREF01 ; RWNorthBoatREF01, RWNorthBoatMarkerREF01 ; RWPPHBoatREF01, RWPPHBoatMarkerREF01 ; RWTrailerBoatREF01, RWTrailerBoatMarkerREF01 ; RWMojaveBoatREF01, RWMojaveBoatMarkerREF01 ; RWMojaveBoatREF02, RWMojaveBoatMarkerREF02
int Button
begin OnActivate ref reffer set reffer to GetActionRef if GetActionRef == player showmessage RWBoatTravelMessage else if reffer.GetPlayerTeammate == 1 reffer.moveto player endif endif end
begin GameMode set Button to GetButtonPressed ref rMarker if Button == 1 player.MoveTo RWMojaveBoatMarkerREF01 set rMarker to RWMojaveBoatMarkerREF01 RWCatfishBayBoatREF01.disable RWNorthBoatREF01.disable RWPPHBoatREF01.disable RWTrailerBoatREF01.disable RWMojaveBoatREF01.enable Autosave elseif Button == 2 player.MoveTo RWPPHBoatMarkerREF01 set rMarker to RWPPHBoatMarkerREF01 RWCatfishBayBoatREF01.disable RWNorthBoatREF01.disable RWPPHBoatREF01.enable RWTrailerBoatREF01.disable RWMojaveBoatREF01.disable Autosave elseif Button == 3 player.MoveTo RWCatfishBayBoatMarkerREF01 set rMarker to RWCatfishBayBoatMarkerREF01 RWCatfishBayBoatREF01.enable RWNorthBoatREF01.disable RWPPHBoatREF01.disable RWTrailerBoatREF01.disable RWMojaveBoatREF01.disable Autosave elseif Button == 4 player.MoveTo RWTrailerBoatMarkerREF01 set rMarker to RWTrailerBoatMarkerREF01 RWCatfishBayBoatREF01.disable RWNorthBoatREF01.disable RWPPHBoatREF01.disable RWTrailerBoatREF01.enable RWMojaveBoatREF01.disable Autosave elseif Button == 5 player.MoveTo RWNorthBoatMarkerREF01 set rMarker to RWNorthBoatMarkerREF01 RWCatfishBayBoatREF01.disable RWNorthBoatREF01.enable RWPPHBoatREF01.disable RWTrailerBoatREF01.disable RWMojaveBoatREF01.disable Autosave elseif Button == 6 player.MoveTo RWMojaveBoatMarkerREF02 set rMarker to RWMojaveBoatMarkerREF02 RWCatfishBayBoatREF01.disable RWNorthBoatREF01.disable RWPPHBoatREF01.disable RWTrailerBoatREF01.disable RWMojaveBoatREF01.disable Autosave endif if (Button == 1 || Button == 2 || Button == 3 || Button == 4 || Button == 5 || Button == 6) if (VNPCFollowers.bBooneHired) && (CraigBooneREF.Waiting != 1) CraigBooneREF.MoveTo rMarker; endif if (VNPCFollowers.bCassHired) && (RoseofSharonCassidyREF.Waiting != 1) RoseofSharonCassidyREF.MoveTo rMarker; endif if (VNPCFollowers.bVeronicaHired) && (VeronicaREF.Waiting != 1) VeronicaREF.MoveTo rMarker; endif if (VNPCFollowers.bLilyHired) && (LilyREF.Waiting != 1) LilyREF.MoveTo rMarker; endif if (VNPCFollowers.RaulHired) && (RaulREF.Waiting != 1) RaulREF.MoveTo rMarker; endif if (VNPCFollowers.ArcadeHired) && (ArcadeREF.Waiting != 1) ArcadeREF.MoveTo rMarker; endif if (VNPCFollowers.bEDEHired) && (EDE1REF.Waiting != 1) if EDE1Ref.GetDisabled == 0 EDE1Ref.MoveTo rMarker elseif EDE2Ref.GetDisabled == 0 EDE2Ref.MoveTo rMarker elseif EDE3Ref.GetDisabled == 0 EDE3Ref.MoveTo rMarker endif endif if (VNPCFollowers.RexHired) && (RexREF.Waiting != 1) RexREF.MoveTo rMarker; endif endif end

scn DXZFrozenScript
Short Random Float DeathClock Ref Attacker Short NoShatter Float FaceX Float FaceY Float FaceZ Short AllDead Short DoOnce
Begin ScriptEffectStart
;//Who is killing them? if GetCombatTarget == 00000000 Set Attacker to PlayerREF else Set Attacker to GetCombatTarget endif
;//If it is the player who got hit with this, disable their controls and give em a faceful of ice if ( getDistance player == 0 ) ;GetSelf == PlayerREF ShowMessage DXZFrozenMsg DisablePlayerControls 0 1 0 0 1 1 1 imod DXZFreezeFace else ;SetRestrained 1 ;//Stops the character in place, in an idle loop - Makes no diff SetUnconscious 1 ;//Works fine now I guess SkipAnim ;//Works, but causes all kinds of glitches and crap ;SetActorsAI 0 ;//Stops animation, but makes player able to walk through them...perhaps placeing an invisible box at their feet endif
; ;//Where are they facing? ; Set FaceX to GetAngle x ; Set FaceY to GetAngle y ; Set FaceZ to GetAngle z
;//Lets keep them alive ResetHealth Set DeathClock to 0 PMS DXZCryoShader100 45
End
Begin GameMode
;//Got to apply the shader 1 frame after death or there are problems. if AllDead == 1 PMS DXZCryoShader100 45 Set AllDead to 2 endif
; ;//If they get set on fire, lets thaw em! ; if HasMagicEffect FlamerFireDamage == 1 || HasMagicEffect FlamerMagicEffect == 1 ; SMS DXZCryoShader100 ; if ( getDistance player == 0 ) ;GetSelf == PlayerREF ; EnablePlayerControls ; rimod DXZFreezeFace ; endif ; killActor Attacker ; endif
;//Die when thawed out. if DeathClock > 29.0 && GetDead != 1 if ( getDistance player == 0 ) ;GetSelf == PlayerREF EnablePlayerControls rimod DXZFreezeFace endif killActor Attacker else set DeathClock to DeathClock + GetSecondsPassed endif
;//Lets give them a half second so they don't shatter right away. if DeathClock <= 0.50 ResetHealth endif
;//Are they frozen? Are they hit? Lets explode em!!! If GetActorValue Health < GetBaseActorValue Health && GetDead != 1 ;&& IsGoreDisabled != 1 - nahuy nado if ( getDistance player == 0 ) ;GetSelf == PlayerREF EnablePlayerControls rimod DXZFreezeFace endif ;PlayGroup Death 1 ;//Attempt to fix glitches PlaySound DXZCryoBreak killActor Attacker 0 3 ;Torso ;killActor Attacker 1 3 ;Head ;killActor Attacker 2 3 ;killActor Attacker 3 3 ;Left Arm ;killActor Attacker 4 3 ;killActor Attacker 5 3 ;Right Arm ;killActor Attacker 6 3 ;killActor Attacker 7 3 ;Left Leg ;killActor Attacker 8 3 ;killActor Attacker 9 3 ;killActor Attacker 10 3 ;Right Leg ;killActor Attacker 11 3 ;killActor Attacker 12 3 ;killActor Attacker 13 3 ;Brain SetRigidBodyMass 100 ;Make Gibs fall close together SMS DXZCryoShader100 Set AllDead to 1 Endif
; ;//Keep them alive and from turning ; if GetDead != 1 ; ;ResetHealth ; SetAngle x, FaceX ; SetAngle y, FaceY ; SetAngle z, FaceZ ; endif End
Begin ScriptEffectFinish ;//Attempt to fix non dieing guys if DeathClock > 20.0 if ( getDistance player == 0 ) ;GetSelf == PlayerREF EnablePlayerControls rimod DXZFreezeFace endif killActor Attacker endif End
