ESP.ORIGINAL:
Canteen Schedule:
We have decided to assign every room in the living quarters to canteen duty on a rolling weekly schedule.
Room A starts canteen duty on calendar week 1, room B on calendar week 2 and so forth up to room Q. When your week is up, please hand the canteen keycard to the next person in charge.
The leftover week will be thanksgiving week, where everyone will help out in the canteen and related duties.
ESP.TRADUIT:
食堂时间表：
我们已经决定将生活区的每个房间按每周滚动时间表分配给食堂值班。
A房间从第一周开始负责食堂，B房间从第二周开始，以此类推，直到Q房间。当你的一周结束时，请将餐厅钥匙卡交给下一位负责人。
剩下的一周将是感恩节，每个人都将在食堂和相关工作中帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
From: Donald Jackson (Saturnite Cosmic Knife Factory Foreman) To: Saturnite Shipping Department Subject: Shipping Error?
Hello, I believe there has been some sort of error in the shipping process. We here at the Cosmic Knife Factory have recieved two full pallets of saturnite bars, but I only ordered a half stack. Two full pallets will last us a good five years and I don't think we can afford paying that much up front without going in the red.
I believe that these bars were supposed to go to the munitions factory down the road? They go through much more saturnite than us.
Donald Jackson Foreman at the Saturnite Cosmic Knife Factory
ESP.TRADUIT:
来自: 唐纳德·杰克逊 (土星宇宙餐刀厂工头) 致: 土星运输部门 主题: 装运错误？
你好，我想是在运输过程中出现了一些错误。我们在宇宙餐刀厂收到了整整两托盘的土星棒，但我只订了半堆。整整两托盘够我们用五年了，我想我们不可能在不出现亏损的情况下预先支付那么多钱。
我认为这些土星棒是要送到这条路上的兵工厂的？它们处理的土星原料比我们多。
- 唐纳德·杰克逊 土星宇宙餐刀厂工头

ESP.ORIGINAL:
From: Donald Jackson (Saturnite Cosmic Knife Factory Foreman) To: H&H Tools Repair Services Subject: Broken Down Conveyor Belt
Good afternoon.
We have a conveyor belt that's broken down for the third time this year and our makeshift repairs are no longer economically viable. Would you have the time to send a repairman down within the week?
I know it's on short notice but we have a showcase event coming up in a couple of months for our new product and we can not be behind on schedule for this.
Thanks in advance.
Donald Jackson Foreman at the Saturnite Cosmic Knife Factory
ESP.TRADUIT:
来自: 唐纳德·杰克逊 (土星宇宙餐刀厂工头) 致: H&H五金工具维修服务 主题: 输送带故障
下午好。
你们的传送带今年第三次坏了，我们的临时维修在经济上已经不可行了。你这周有时间派个修理工来吗？
我知道这是临时通知，但几个月后我们有一个新产品的展示活动，我们不能因此延期。
提前感谢。
- 唐纳德·杰克逊 土星宇宙餐刀厂工头
潦草的遗书

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I've had it with this hellforsaken valley. I can't find a way to climb the walls and I don't dare to follow the road. There are people out there, but you know, they're insane. They're like those zombies from the movies!
I thought I could stay here for a while but the thirst is killing me. The water tastes like dung and if I stay I fear I might become like one of them. I'd rather take the easy way out.
Whoever finds this note, hope you have better luck than I have when attempting to get out.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我受够了这个地狱般的山谷。我找不到爬墙的方法，我也不敢沿着这条路走。外面是有人，但你要知道他们都是疯的。他们就像电影里的僵尸！
我觉得我可以在这里多待一会儿，但是我太渴了，水尝起来像粪便。如果我留下来，我担心自己会变成他们中的一员。我宁愿走捷径离开。
不管是谁发现了这张字条，希望你在试图逃离时有比我更好的运气。
抱歉，我得离开。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hey pal, I know I said come back later but shit came up. I have to get out of here for a while, so I can't give you any work to do. I've left my passport into town on the office desk though if you want it.
Peace.
- Horace
ESP.TRADUIT:
嘿，哥们儿，我知道我说过晚点会来，但事情就是这样。我得离开这里一段时间，所以我没法给你任何工作了。我把去城里的通行证放在办公桌上了，如果你想要的话。
平安。
- 贺瑞斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me and My Friend Against The World
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和我的朋友对抗世界

ESP.ORIGINAL:
It feels so good to be out of that dirty, cramped pile of rubble on a cliffside!
There's literally nothing of worth there, nothing fun. All there is to do is drinking Core's stale beer and piss off the railings.
Nigel's been on my ass to "Pull my weight" and to "Stop associating with bad people". Screw him, Twitch ain't a bad guy - he's the only one who really gets me, who I can connect with, you know?
I don't want any of that. I'm a free spirit, so we'll roam free. Us two against this irradiated hell hole of a world.
That said, there's not much around here. First we tried to go the obvious way through the tunnel, but that was locked. We decided to check out the grocery store for loot, but it's pretty barren. Why wouldn't it be, it's been centuries since "The War".
Next we're gonna try the railway exit, maybe check out the quarry.
ESP.TRADUIT:
离开悬崖边上那堆肮脏、狭窄的瓦砾的感觉真好！
那里简直没有任何有价值的东西，没有任何乐趣。所有能做的事就是喝科尔的陈年啤酒和从栏杆上撒尿。
奈杰尔一直盯着我，让我“做好本职工作”和“不要和坏人来往”。去他妈的，图奇不是坏人，他是唯一一个真正了解我的人，一个我可以交流的人，你懂吗？
我什么都不想要，我是个自由的灵魂，所以我们可以自由自在，两个人一起对抗这个被辐射的地狱般的世界。
话虽如此，这附近没有什么东西。首先，我们试图通过隧道走明显的路，但那是锁着的。我们决定到杂货店去找战利品，但那里没什么东西。难道不是吗？“战争”已经过去好几个世纪了。
下一步我们将尝试铁路出口，也许会去采石场看看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me Without My So Called Friend
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有所谓的朋友

ESP.ORIGINAL:
It's not easy being a wanderer. Hostile creatures all around, supply shortages, all kinds of trouble. Nigel was right, Twitch was "bad company".
He's a selfish good-for-nothing who thinks of nothing but how to get himself high again. He's making me carry most of our equipment and he's sending me out on scavenging runs while he cowers in our safehouse, jacking off and huffing jet.
I'm leaving, screw Twitch. Going back to the Shantytown. Maybe Nigel will forgive me for what I said to him.
ESP.TRADUIT:
做一个流浪者并不容易。周围都是有敌意的生物，补给短缺，各种各样的麻烦。奈杰尔是对的，图奇是个 "坏伙伴"。
他是个自私的废物，只想着如何让自己再次嗨起来。他让我搬我们的大部分装备，他派我出去搜刮，而他却躲在我们的安全屋里，吸着杰特打飞机。
我要走了，去他妈的图奇。回棚户区去，也许奈杰尔会原谅我对他说的话。
磨损的潦草涂鸦

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Can't believe I actually made it out of that nightmare. I was just out scavenging for food in the rad world when I accidentally stumbled upon one of those pre-war vaults. It was still sealed so I thought I'd run into some nice loot, but it was fucking freezing inside. The door almost closed on me too, but I was lucky to bail before I got trapped.
I still wonder if there's some hidden treasure inside though...
ESP.TRADUIT:
不敢相信我真的从那个噩梦中走了出来。我只是在疯狂的世界里寻找食物时无意中发现了那些战前的避难所之一。它仍然是密封的，所以我以为我会碰到一些好东西，但里面他妈的太冷了。门也差点把我关在里面，但我很幸运，在我被困住之前就逃了出来。
我还是想知道里面是否藏着一些宝藏...
亚利桑那力量最新配方

ESP.ORIGINAL: This note contains detailed instructions and ingredients on how to make Arizona Strong beer. Someone might be very interested in getting their hands on this.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这张笔记包含了如何制作亚利桑那力量啤酒的详细说明和原料。
也许有人会对这个感兴趣。
亚利桑那力量终端条目1

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To: Arizona Strong Brewmaster From: Arizona Strong Research & Development Subject: Updated Recipe
Hello chief, the boys here over at the R&D department have come up with an improved formula for making Arizona Strong. You can barely taste any difference but the recipe is 22% cheaper for each unit brewed. I have attached the recipe in another note.
ESP.TRADUIT:
致: 亚利桑那力量酿酒专家 来自: 亚利桑那力量研发部 主题: 更新配方
负责人你好，研发部的小伙子们想出了一个改良配方来制作亚利桑那力量。你几乎尝不出有什么不同，但这个配方每单位的酿造成本会便宜22%。我在另一份说明中附上了该配方。
揉皱的便条

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To whoever finds this note: Get out immediately.
Even if it were to kill you, escape the camp. The fate that captives of this camp faces is probably much worse than death itself. I've been here the longest but even then I've only been here for three weeks. I've tried to do as good of a job as possible, but even then I will likely get called into the main tent any day now.
And when you get called into the main tent, you won't leave alive.
Better to gamble on an escape than getting tortured to death by the monster who leads this camp.
ESP.TRADUIT:
找到这张纸条的人：立即离开。
即使要杀了你，也要逃出营地。这个营地的俘虏所面临的命运可能比死亡本身更糟糕。我在这里呆的时间最长，但即使如此我也只呆了三个星期。我已经尽力把工作做好，但即使这样，我也可能随时会被叫到主帐篷里。
而你被叫进主帐篷的话，你不会活着离开的。
与其被领导这个营地的怪物折磨致死，还不如赌一次越狱。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
First Name: Lydia Last Name: Perry
Bloodtype: A Birthdate: 5/16/2246 Sex: F
Note: Patient treated due to several leg fractures in her left femur and tibia, caused from crushing by a heavy blunt object. Patient was administered anesthesia and had surgery performed. Advised to continue to take painkillers for another three weeks, and if the pain gets excrutiating, take half a dose of Med-X.
Rehabilitation therapy booked for August and 3 months ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT:
名字: 莉迪娅 姓氏: 佩里
血型: A 出生日期: 2246年5月16日 性别: 女
注：患者因左腿股骨和胫骨多处骨折而接受治疗，原因是被沉重的钝器压伤。对患者进行了麻醉并实施了手术。建议继续服用止痛药三周，如果疼痛难忍，可服用半剂量的放射线-X。
预定在8月和未来3个月进行康复治疗。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
First Name: Ethan Last Name: Marsh
Bloodtype: AB Birthdate: 5/16/2229 Sex: M
Note: Patient treated due to minor lacerations on left arm. Patient claims it to be a work accident, when fishing. Only one of the three lacerations was deep enough to warrant stitches, the others were disinfected and bandaged.
Stitch removal planned after 10 days.
ESP.TRADUIT:
名字: 伊桑 姓氏: 马什
血型: AB 出生日期: 2229年5月16日 性别: 男
注：患者因左臂有轻微撕裂伤而接受治疗。患者称这是一次工作事故，当时是在钓鱼。三处裂伤中只有一处深到需要缝合，其他的都进行了消毒和包扎。
计划10天后拆线。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
First Name: Wayne "The Mayor" Last Name: Bishop
Bloodtype: B Birthdate: 5/16/2215 Sex: M
Note: Patient brought to clinic by his wife due to concerns of heavy abuse of alcoholic substances. Patient has developed a heavy dependency on alcohol, but through therapy and weaning has been rid of dependency.
Relapse likely, keep regular checks.
ESP.TRADUIT:
名字: 韦恩 "市长" 姓氏: 毕肖普
血型: B 出生日期: 2215年5月16日 性别: 男
注：患者因担心严重滥用酒精类物质而由其妻子带至诊所。患者对酒精产生了严重的依赖性，但通过治疗和戒除，已经摆脱了依赖性。
有可能复发，请定期检查。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
First Name: Isabella Last Name: Mills
Bloodtype: B- Birthdate: 5/16/2249 Sex: F
Note: Patient miscarries. That's right, Julian. I will not give birth to this child, not after you've revealed your true colors. I'm done here, and don't ever try to follow me.
ESP.TRADUIT:
名字: 伊莎贝拉 姓氏: 米尔斯
血型: B- 出生日期: 2249年5月16日 性别: 女
注：病人流产。这就对了，朱利安，在你露出真面目之后我不会把这个孩子生下来的。我受够了，千万别想跟着我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sold 20 units of Med-X and 30 units of Jet to the Pittsburg Point Hotel. They paid me half up front, then the rest on credit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 向匹兹堡角酒店出售了20份放射线-X和30份杰特。他们先付给我一半的钱，剩下的赊账。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Mayor came by again, we'd say he'd come by for "therapy" sessions but we're mostly talking about business. I've come to terms with him that the medical shipments will come through without inspections as long as I keep quiet about his addiction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 市长又来了，我们会说他来是为了"治疗"，但我们主要是在谈生意。我已经和他达成协议，只要我对他的毒瘾保持沉默，我的药品运输就可以无需检查。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The boys are pressuring me to get more supply. I've spoken to Isabella but she isn't being cooperative. The bitch was useful at first but she's started to get on my nerves. She's been slacking off at work lately too, taking more bathroom breaks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 孩子们在给我施加压力，要求我提供更多的补给。我已经和伊莎贝拉谈过了，但她并不配合。这婊子一开始很有用，但她已经开始让我心烦意乱了。她最近在工作上也很懈怠，上厕所的时间更多了。
护士的日记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This diary contains detailed entries of Dr Mendez and his associates blackmailing the nurse and several entries describing Mendez sexually abusing the nurse.
It also has a password noted down on the last page.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这本日记详细记录了门德斯医生和他的同伙勒索护士的情况，还有几篇日记描述了门德斯性侵护士的情况。
它还在最后一页记下了一个密码。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
From: Tony Grier To: Saturnite Shipping Department Subject: Saturnite Bar Shipment
Hello, this is Tony from the Munitions Factory at Eagle Crags, I'm inquiring about the two pallets of saturnite bars that I ordered last week. We still have not recieved the shipment and without it we won't finish our government quota. What the hell happened to it? We're in the sticker here thanks to you guys!
Tony Grier at the Eagle Crags Saturnite Munitions Factory
ESP.TRADUIT:
来自: 托尼·格里尔 致: 土星运输部门 主题: 土星棒运输
你好，我是鹰崖兵工厂的托尼，我想询问一下我上周订购的两托盘土星棒。我们仍然没有收到货物，如果没有它，我们将无法完成我们的政府配额。它到底怎么了？多亏了你们，我们才有了这个标签！
- 托尼·格里尔 鹰崖土星兵工厂

ESP.ORIGINAL:
From: Tony Grier To: Saturnite Co. HR Department Subject: Troublesome Coworker
Hello HR Department, I need some advice regarding one of our employees. His name is Conrad Jensen and is a technology freak beyond saving. He's always tinkering with something and it's affecting his work. We can not afford to replace him because of his skillset but we also need him to do his job properly if we're to meet our quota.
What should I tell him? Should I threaten him with a pay cut? Tempt him with a raise?
Tony Grier at the Saturnite Munitions Factory
ESP.TRADUIT:
来自: 托尼·格里尔 致: 土星公司人事部 主题: 棘手的同事
你好，人事部，我需要一些关于我们一位员工的建议。他叫康拉德·詹森，是个无可救药的科技狂人，总是在捣鼓一些东西，这影响了他的工作。因为他的技能，我们没法取代他，但如果我们要完成定额，我们也需要他好好工作。
我该怎么跟他说？我应该用减薪威胁他？还是用加薪来诱惑他？
- 托尼·格里尔 土星兵工厂

ESP.ORIGINAL:
From: RobCo Combat Drone Department To: Tony Grier Subject: Shipment of Four Turrets
Greetings, Mr Jensen. Your shipment of four state of the art Anti Air Projectile Turrets have been shipped and should arrive within two weeks. Please note that the invoice should be paid within the quarter and is not eligble for government tax deducts.
The sum you owe us is, to clarify, three hundred thousand dollars ($300,000). Please pay as soon as possible.
ESP.TRADUIT:
来自: RobCo战斗机器人部门 致: 托尼·格里尔 主题: 装运四个炮塔
你好，詹森先生。你的四座最先进的防空炮塔已经发运，应该在两周内到达。请注意，发票应在本季度内支付，并且不符合政府减税的要求。
阐明一下，你欠我们的金额是三十万美元（$300,000）。请尽快支付。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
From: Tony Grier To: Saturnite Co. HR Department Subject: RE; Troublesome Coworker
He's really done it now! I tempted him that if he swore to put down his gadgets during work hours, I would let him order something in the company name for the break room. The absolute clown went and ordered a set of turrets worth more than 5 years of my salary! I'll have him work this off for the next ten years, I swear!
Tony Grier at the Saturnite Munitions Factory
ESP.TRADUIT:
来自: 托尼·格里尔 致: 土星公司人事部 主题: 回复; 棘手的同事
他现在真的做到了！我劝他说，如果他发誓在工作时间放下他的小工具，我就会让他以公司名义为休息室订购一些东西。这个十足的小丑去订购了一套炮塔，价值超过了我5年的工资！我发誓，我会让他在接下来的十年里把这事解决掉!
- 托尼·格里尔 土星兵工厂

ESP.ORIGINAL:
From: Tony Grrier To: Subject: No Subject
I can't believe this. They're actually dropping the bombs. The turrets Jensen ordered and set up might've actually saved the entire valley. We're getting out of here as soon as we can and heading to the bunker. Godspeed and may He have mercy upon us.
ESP.TRADUIT:
来自: 托尼·格里尔 致: 主题: 无主题
我真不敢相信，他们真的在投核弹。詹森订购安装的炮塔实际上可能拯救了整个山谷，我们要尽快离开这里，前往地堡。愿上帝保佑我们。
东倒西歪的潦草广告

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You! Yees you! Are you tired of walllking these dusty roads on your way to Vegas? Why dont yuo buy a BOAT! a BOAT will give you eesy and FAST acksess up and down the colorado river!! Buy a BOAT from TERRY'S BOATS!! I am located NORTH of Havassu! CAN'T miss me!!
For ONLY 1000 caps you can becom a CAPTAIN and sail the river faster than walking!
LIMITED SUPPLY! GET A BOAT BEFORE I SELL OUT!!
ESP.TRADUIT:
你！是的，你！你是否厌倦了走这些尘土飞扬的路去拉斯维加斯？你为什么不买一艘船呢！一艘船能让你在科罗拉多河上下快速通行！来特瑞的船店买一艘船吧！！！我在哈瓦苏北部！不要错过我！
只要1000瓶盖，你就可以成为船长，以比走路更快的速度在河上航行！
限量供应！在我卖光之前赶快买艘船！！
找到那个婊子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey Mendez, I found that bitch you were looking for. Saw her in the legion camp up north. Looks like she got her dumb ass caught by those skirt wearing sissies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，门德斯，我找到了你说的那个婊子。她在北边的军团营地，看来她被那些穿裙子的娘娘腔给逮住了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
05/23/2279
Finally got this terminal working! Hello world, Yuuko Takahashi here reporting from the dusty bowl of Eagle Crags! Ugh, who am I kidding, this is just a damn note to myself to keep track of what I'm doing and for anyone else who ends up here after I'm gone.
I ended up here after getting chased away by some angry settlers when wandering the wasteland. That was about 3 weeks ago now, and the small settlment of shacks here have been both a blessing and a curse. Nobody will bother us here, but that also means nobody will trade with us and the location makes it hard to go out for scavenging runs.
Johnny has been here for longer than I have, and seems to be a bit jaded about the whole area. He's got good reason though, I heard he's lost a good amount of friends to the valley.
----------------------
08/05/2279
The supplies I brought with me has now ran dry, and it seems that nobody else in town has any good food or water either. I know that us ghouls technically don't need to eat or drink to sustain our bodies, but we do still feel hunger and thirst.
On the upside though, I don't have to sleep outside anymore! I managed to convince Jessica and Esther to share their shack with me, so I can finally say goodbye to my cardboard fort.
ESP.TRADUIT:
2279年5月23日
终于让这个终端工作了！大家好，我是高桥优子，在鹰崖尘土飞扬的碗里向大家报道！呃，我在骗谁呢，这只是给自己的一张该死的纸条，用来记录我在做什么，也是为了在我死后留在这里的其他人。
我在废土上闲逛时被一些愤怒的定居者赶走后，就到了这里。那是大约三周前的事了，在这里的小棚屋定居既是一种祝福，也是一种诅咒。在这里没有人会打扰我们，但这也意味着没有人会和我们做生意，而且这里的位置使我们很难出去拾荒。
强尼在这里的时间比我长，他似乎对整个地区有点厌倦了。不过他有充分的理由，我听说他在山谷中失去了很多朋友。 ----------------------
2279年8月5日
我带来的物资现在已经用完了，看起来镇上其他人也没有什么好的食物和水。我知道严格来说，我们食尸鬼不需要吃或喝来维持我们的身体，但我们仍然会感到饥饿和口渴。
不过好的一面是，我不用再睡在外面了！我设法说服了杰西卡和埃斯特。我设法说服杰西卡和埃丝特与我分享她们的小屋，所以我终于可以和我的纸板堡垒说再见了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
12/23/2279
Even though we're this far south, it actually gets pretty cold during the winter here in Arizona. It's nothing like up in Minnesota, that's for sure. I've seen my fair share of hypothermia and limbs of ghouls straight up falling off. At least I don't need to deal with that anymore.
We got a visitor yesterday, he had a bunch to trade luckily so we got our hands on some food and water to ration out. It's not top shelf stuff, but I guess that's a thing of the past.
I think I'll start looking for a permanent solution to our supply problem when winter is over, but I don't know whether I'll succeed or not.
--------------
04/14/2280
Esther went down into the valley this morning and haven't come back yet, and Jessica is beyond herself with worry. She's already packing her backpack for a rescue operation. I tried to discourage her and have her wait at least another day before setting out, but to no avail. She's probably gonna head out before nightfall.
This is probably all my fault too because I've been mentioning that I needed more wiring for the grow lights.
ESP.TRADUIT:
2279年12月23日
尽管我们在这么靠南的地方，但实际上亚利桑那州的冬天还是很冷。这与明尼苏达州的情况完全不同，这是肯定的。我见过很多人体温过低还有食尸鬼的四肢直接掉下来，至少我不用再面对这些了。
昨天来了个访客，幸运的是他有很多东西可以交换，所以我们得到了一些食物和水来定量配给。这不是最好的东西，但我想这已经是过去的事情了。
我想当冬天结束时，我会开始寻找一个永久的解决方案来解决我们的补给问题，但我不知道我能不能成功。
--------------
2280年4月14日
埃丝特今天早上去了山谷，到现在还没有回来。杰西卡担心极了，她已经在为营救行动收拾背包了。我试图劝阻她，让她至少再等一天再出发，但无济于事，她可能会在天黑前离开。
这可能都是我的错，因为我一直在说，我需要更多的线路来安装植物生长灯。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
04/18/2280
Esther and Jessica still haven't come back, and by now I don't think they ever will. Maybe they died, maybe they just left the valley. I guess the shack is mine now, so I can start giving their stuff away to people who's still left here.
Not that there's many of them left. Most either leave or give in to the hunger and goes feral...
--------------
06/04/2280
I've gotten the planters up and running and I've found some good soil deeper into the caves. Now I just need some seeds and the operation will be up and running! Finally stuff is looking up around here. Johnny seems doubtful but I'm putting all my eggs in this basket. This is going to work.
ESP.TRADUIT:
2280年4月18日
埃丝特和杰西卡仍然没有回来，到现在我想她们永远不会回来了。也许她们死了，也许她们刚刚离开了山谷。我想这个小屋现在是我的了，所以我可以开始把她们的东西送给还留在这里的其他人了。
虽然他们的人不多了。大多数人要么离开，要么屈服于饥饿，变成野人...
--------------
2280年6月4日
我已经把种植槽弄好了，而且我在洞穴深处找到了一些好的土壤。现在我只需要一些种子，就可以开始运作了，这里的情况终于好转了。强尼似乎很怀疑，但我把所有的鸡蛋放在这个篮子里了，这一定会成功的。
钥匙在哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If anyone wants the communications office key, Jenkins found the dropped key and should have it by his bed. He's stationed in Barracks C.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有人想要通信办公室的钥匙，詹金斯找到了丢失的钥匙，应该在他的床边。他驻扎在C营房。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
08/01/2280
I have managed to get my hands on some corn! Can't wait to plant these and get this project of mine finally off its feet. If this work I can feed the entire settlement! I'm running on fumes but I can't give up hope. We're barely staving off the hunger with scavenged pieces of meat.
--------------
10/04/2280
The crops are making steady progress, but the rest of the people around here doesn't seem to agree with how much water I'm using for my projects. They say it's gotten worse outside, but I've been too immersed in my projects that I barely leave the caves these days.
ESP.TRADUIT:
2280年8月1日
我已经设法弄到了一些玉米！我等不及要种下这些玉米，让我的这个项目最终得以启动。如果这能成功，我就能养活整个定居点了！我弹尽粮绝.但我不能放弃希望。我们靠捡来的肉块勉强充饥。
--------------
2280年10月4日
庄稼正在稳步生长，但周围的其他人似乎并不同意我为我的项目用这么多水。他们说外面的情况越来越糟，但我太专注于我的项目了，这些天几乎没有离开过洞穴。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
12/12/2280
We had a power outage for several days and I think it severely damaged the crops. We'll see how it goes but I may have to replant another batch.
Clive and Hanz wasn't happy with the recent decisions Johnny made, so they left town.
--------------
04/28/2281
The new batch I planted have started to wither. I do not yet know the cause but I suspect it's the water. I need to replant. We've lost another three to the hunger, and I'm afraid it might catch me soon too.
--------------
10/15/2281
The third batch was doing so well after I took care to remove as much radiation from the water as possible, but I guess the cave spring water just isn't doing it for the crops. Perhaps the treatment plant down in the valley has something better I can use?
ESP.TRADUIT:
2280年12月12日
我们停电好几天了，我想这严重损害了作物。我们得看看情况如何，但我可能不得不再重新种植一批。
克莱夫和汉兹对强尼最近做出的决定不满意，所以他们离开了小镇。
--------------
2281年4月28日
我种植的新一批植物已经开始枯萎了，我还不知道原因，但我怀疑是水的问题。我需要重新种植，我们已经在饥饿中失去了另外三人，我担心它也会很快抓住我。
--------------
2281年10月15日
第三批在我注意尽可能多地去除水中的辐射后，表现得非常好，但我想洞穴里的泉水对农作物来说并不合适。也许山谷中的处理厂有更好的东西可以用？
遗言

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This place is cursed. Pops told me to check it out and try to find anything useful. The main doors were all blocked off with thick concrete, so I decided to take the back door in from the sewers.
When I entered this building though, the door locked behind me. I've been stuck here for days now and I can not for the life of me find a way out. Most doors are locked or blocked off, and the one that isn't just lead around in circles!
If you read this note, I'm leaving you all my belongings on the table. Hopefully you have better luck finding your way out than me.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这个地方被诅咒了，老爹让来看看，试图找到任何有用的东西。主门都被厚厚的混凝土堵住了，所以我决定从下水道的后门进去。
但当我进入这栋楼时，门在我身后锁住了。我已经被困在这里好几天了，我怎么也找不到出去的办法。大多数门都被锁住了，或者被堵住了，而那扇没有被锁住的门只是在原地转圈！
如果你看到这张纸条，我把我所有的东西都放在桌子上了。希望你寻找出路的时候运气比我好。
NCR医护人员想要的药物

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The NCR Medic asked for:
12 Stimpaks 5 Med-X 2 Steady
ESP.TRADUIT:
NCR医师要求：
- 治疗针 (12) - 放射线-X (5) - 稳定剂 (2)
星期一

ESP.ORIGINAL: On a beautiful Monday morning, Robbie the Robot woke at 6 AM sharp, ready to start his wonderful day full of fun and exciting tasks at the office! Early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy, and wise as they say. (even if I抦 not a man) After a fulfilling 18 hour day of working at the computer, Robbie went back to his refueling station, happy to help his country in any way possible. Remember kids, stay in school and you抣l be able to serve your country in the exact same way!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在一个美丽的星期一早晨，机器人罗比在早上6点准时醒来，准备开始他美好的一天，在办公室里充满了有趣和令人兴奋的任务！他在办公室里工作了很长时间。俗话说，早睡早起使人健康、富有、有智慧。(即使我不是人）在电脑前工作了18个小时后，罗比回到了他的加油站，很高兴能以任何可能的方式帮助他的国家。记住，孩子们，留在学校，你们就能以完全相同的方式为国家服务！
星期二

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tuesday is the working man抯 sacred day, or so they say. Who "They" were, Robbie was not entirely sure since he'd never heard anyone actually say it. Robbie was off to a brilliant start at 5 AM tallying up the accounts and ledgers of the previous week抯 record-breaking sales! While Joe from accounting used his squeaky clean chassis as a footrest, Robbie was busy at work filling in the budgeting books. With dedication like that, he held the company up in more ways than one!
ESP.TRADUIT: 周二是劳动者神圣的一天，他们是这么说的。"他们"是谁，罗比并不确定，因为他从来没有听过有人这样说。早上5点，罗比开始工作，统计上个星期的账目和销售记录。当会计部的乔用他那干净的底盘当脚踏板时，罗比正忙着填写预算书。有了这样的奉献精神，他在多个方面支撑着公司的发展！
星期三

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wednesday was Robbie抯 favorite day, the very middle of the week where there were 2 days of work behind and ahead. For his human coworkers of course! Robbie was such a diligent worker, that his programming volunteered him to work all week. What a swell robot, truly an example to us all. Always remember to try and emulate Robbie抯 selfless actions in your future employment, and you抣l rise up the corporate ladder in no time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 周三是罗比最喜欢的一天，是一周中最中间的一天，前后有两天的工作。当然是为了他的人类同事们！罗比是一个非常勤奋的工人，他的程序要求他整个星期都要工作。多么棒的一个机器人，真是我们所有人的榜样。永远记住，在你未来的工作中，试着效仿罗比的无私行为，你很快就会在公司里步步高升！
星期四

ESP.ORIGINAL: As the week got busier, so did our beloved hero Robbie the Robot. Working a 20 hour shift, he barely had time to refuel! But thanks to the ingenuity of his fantastic coworkers, he was revved up and ready to go. Turns out adding just a splash of alcohol to his dwindling fuel reserves kept Robbie going for several hours more! Innovation in the workplace is exactly what is needed these days, after approval from your manager of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着这一周的忙碌，我们可爱的英雄机器人罗比也越来越忙。在20个小时的轮班中，他几乎没有时间来加油！但是，多亏了他出色的同事们的聪明才智，他已经蓄势待发，准备出发了。事实证明，在他不断减少的燃料储备中加入一瓢酒精，就能让罗比再坚持了好几个小时！如今，工作场所的创新正是我们所需要的，当然是在得到经理的批准之后。
星期五

ESP.ORIGINAL: Due to the brilliant thinking of Thursday抯 heroes, Robbie was now able to work without the need for extensive refueling! Remember kids, consuming addictive substances is perfectly fine if it抯 for the sake of your employer! Robbie抯 programming had been slightly improved by his recent refueling redesign and he was able to work much more efficiently. As he was directed to climb the corporate ladder, a shortcut became immediately clear. If he removed all the people above him, he would be the one on top! What a simple solution, and all it took was a little help from his coworkers. That抯 why they say an office is like a family, everyone has each other抯 back! And now that they抮e all gone, Robbie is at the top of the ladde-
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于星期四的英雄们的出色思维，罗比现在能够在不需要大量加油的情况下工作了！请记住，孩子们，如果是为了你的雇主，摄入成瘾物质也是完全可以的！罗比的程序经过最近的重新设计后得到了轻微的改进，他的工作效率大大提高了。当他被指示在公司晋升时，一条捷径立即变得清晰起来。如果他把所有在他上面的人都除掉，他就会是最上面的那个人！这是一个简单的解决办法，他所需要的只是同事们的一点帮助。这就是为什么他们说办公室就像一个家庭，每个人都互相支持！现在他们都死了，罗比在最顶端
大篷车酒店文件

ESP.ORIGINAL:
A bunch of papers, mostly invoices.
You spot some correspondence between Miss Rocket and what seems to be her lover. It seems that their relationship ended poorly, for the other part.
One of the more interesting papers mentions a switch of ownership of an apartment in downtown Havasu, in the red house next to the bank on the second floor. Perhaps it is worth investigating.
ESP.TRADUIT:
一堆文件，大部分是发票。
你发现了一些火箭小姐和她的情人之间的通信。另一方面，他们的关系似乎结束得很糟糕。
其中一粉比较有趣的文件提到了哈瓦苏市中心一套公寓的所有权转换，这套公寓位于银行旁边二楼的红房子里。也许这值得调查。
需要成员！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Seeking Brave Treasure Hunters!
Me and the boys are setting out on an expedition into Arizona, hunting the legendary stash of Big Bradley the Brawn!
However, we are one member short on our crew so we're hiring a mercenary to come with us. 100 caps payment up front and you'll get an even share of the loot when we get our hands on it.
Come see us at the Searchlight Airport if you're interested.
ESP.TRADUIT:
寻找勇敢的寻宝者！
我和兄弟们要出发去亚利桑那州探险，去狩猎传说中的“孔武有力”大布拉德利！
但是，我们的团队还缺少一名成员，所以我们要雇一个雇佣兵跟我们一起去。先付100个瓶盖等我们拿到战利品时，你会得到平均分配的份额。
如果你有兴趣，来探照灯机场找我们。
冻结的避难所监督终端笔记1

ESP.ORIGINAL:
***INSTRUCTIONS FROM VAULT-TEC***
TO OVERSEER OF VAULT 47
The overseer (You) has been hired to monitor the effects of artificial climate change and variations in temperature on the subjects. Under no circumstances are the subjects allowed to enter the Reactor and Maintenance areas of the facility.
The facility has been equipped with ten (10) RobCo maintenance and security robots to keep the facility running for an approximate span of 300 years. The robots have been authorized to use lethal force if the subjects would try to break into the reactor area, or conspire to do so.
ESP.TRADUIT:
***来自避难所科技的指示***
给47号避难所的监督
监督(你)被雇佣来监测人为气候变化和温度变化对受试者的影响。在任何情况下，受试者都不允许进入反应堆和设施的维护区域。
该设施已经配备了十个(10)RobCo维护和安全机器人，以保持设施运行约300年。机器人已经被授权使用致命武力，如果实验对象试图闯入反应堆区域，或密谋这样做的话。
揉皱的便条

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Damnit Joe, why'd you have to get mixed up with those scumbags...
I know we parted on bad terms and writing this is in vain. Oh how I wish I could've talked some sense into you back then, it didn't need to end this way.
Once I've raised enough money I'm going to post a bounty on the jackass who killed you. Just you wait, Harry Mama. I'll get you yet...
ESP.TRADUIT:
该死的乔，你为什么要和那些人渣混在一起...
我知道我们分手时关系不好，写这封信是徒劳的。噢，我多么希望那时我能告诉你一些道理，事情不必这样结束。
一旦我筹到足够的钱，我就会悬赏杀了你的混蛋。你就等着吧，哈里妈妈。我会找到你的...
诊断结果

ESP.ORIGINAL:
--- DIAGNOSTICS RESULTS ---
Radioactive materials 692% over legally allowed treshold.
WARNING: NOT FIT FOR CONSUMPTION
ESP.TRADUIT:
--- 诊断结果 ---
放射性物质超过法定允许值692%。
警告: 不适合食用！
冻僵的人的最后一条讯息
计划: 干掉大布拉德利

ESP.ORIGINAL:
We need more men if we're ever to storm Bradley's base.
We also need someone who would be able to open the door.
We ALSO need more water and ammo.
And we also need Mike to stop being a little bitch.
If you find someone, send them to our camp near the NCR checkpoint.
ESP.TRADUIT:
如果我们要袭击布拉德利的基地，就需要更多的人手。
我们还需要一个能把门打开的人。
我们还需要更多的水和弹药。
我们还需要迈克别再这么贱了。
如果你找到了人，派他们去NCR检查站附近的营地。
如果我死了...

ESP.ORIGINAL:
If I were to die... I'm taking you all with me. None of you are getting out of here with the treasure I've worked so hard to make. My suit is rigged to start the ICBM launch sequence when it can't read my life signals anymore, so if any of you try to betray me, there'll be nothing left.
- Bradley, your kind boss and leader.
ESP.TRADUIT:
如果我死了... 我要带上你们所有人，你们谁也别想带着我辛辛苦苦赚来的财宝离开这里。 我的防护服被设定为在无法读取我的生命信号时启动洲际弹道导弹发射程序，所以如果你们中有人试图背叛我，那就什么都没有了。
- 布拉德利，你亲切的老板和领导。
折叠整齐的信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dear Margaret
I heard about the situation down in Arizona and I have decided to send you a care package to help you and your husband out. I was planning on sending you the necklace that unfortunately got lost when we bathed in the lake a few years back. However the necklace broke in the process of packing. I decided to still send you the lovely sapphire that endorned the piece, along with some supplies for the road.
Stay safe out there, yours always, Linneth.
ESP.TRADUIT:
亲爱的玛格丽特
我听说了亚利桑那州的情况，我决定给你寄一个关怀包裹来帮助你和你丈夫。我本来打算给你送那条几年前我们在湖里洗澡时不幸丢失的项链。然而，项链在包装过程中断裂了，所以我决定还是给你寄那颗可爱的蓝宝石，还有一些路上用的补给。
在外面注意安全， 你的挚爱，林奈
通缉：亚当·格里高利

ESP.ORIGINAL:
On the request of an anonymous party a man by the name of Adam Gregory is wanted for repeated accounts of thievery and burglary.
The man is wanted either dead or alive and upon the presentation of proof of his demise a reward of three hundred bottle caps will be paid out.
Adam was last spotted heading east upon the confiscation of his Havasu Passport.
ESP.TRADUIT:
应一个匿名者的要求，一个名叫亚当·格里高利的人因多次偷窃和入室盗窃被通缉。
该男子被悬赏，无论死活，只要能提供他死亡的证据，就可以得到300瓶盖的赏金。
亚当最后一次被发现是在他的哈瓦苏通行证被没收后向东走了。
招工：扑灭害虫

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Combat experienced help wanted to Pittsburg Point Hotel in order to clear out the basement of a recent infestation of Lakelurks.
For more information contact Pittsburg Point Hotel Management.
Payment negotiable.
ESP.TRADUIT:
匹兹堡角酒店需要有战斗经验的人帮助，清除地下室最近发生的湖沼蟹侵扰。
欲了解更多信息，请联系匹兹堡角酒店管理部门。
付款方式可协商。
寻求硬汉

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Me and the boys are looking to open up our mine again, but we could use some help to clear it out and get back to business.
Come seek us out at the Mehi Co bar in town if you're interested.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我和兄弟们打算重新开矿，但我们需要一些帮助来清理它并重新开业。
如果你有兴趣，可以来城里的墨西哥酒吧找我们。
悬赏：托德·罗伯逊的包裹

ESP.ORIGINAL:
An anonymous party has requested the bounty of a package in the possession of a man called Ted Robertson. They claim that the package is rightfully theirs but is too afraid to confront Mr Robertson.
Mr Robertson lives south of Havasu City, in a run down trailer park.
A payment of three hundred bottle caps will be paid upon delivery of the package.
NOTE: The client prefers that the target is not killed.
ESP.TRADUIT:
一个匿名方要求悬赏一个叫托德·罗伯逊的人手中的包裹。他们声称该包裹理应属于他们，但他们不敢与罗伯逊先生对质。
罗伯逊先生住在哈瓦苏市南部的一个破旧的拖车公园里。
包裹交付后，将支付300瓶盖的报酬。
注：客户希望不要杀害目标人物。
血迹斑斑的信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To My Daughter
Jessica, I'm sorry.
I'm sorry for all that I did.
I'm sorry for leaving you and your mother.
I'm sorry for taking your chances of a real future.
I doubt you'll ever read my final words but know that I regret it with every ounce in my body.
Farewell, and forgive me.
ESP.TRADUIT:
给我的女儿
杰西卡，我很抱歉。
我为我所做的一切道歉。
我很抱歉离开了你和你母亲。
我很抱歉让你失去了真正的未来。
我怀疑你永远读不到我的遗言，但你要知道，我身体里的每一分每一秒都在后悔。
永别了，原谅我。
悬赏：兰迪·贾克斯特

ESP.ORIGINAL:
A woman of Havasu has requested a hit on her runaway husband who took their entire fortune with him.
The man is named Randy Jaxter and is wanted dead. A reward of three hundred caps will be paid out upon presentation of proof of his demise.
Randy was known to have an unhealthy fixation with radiation.
ESP.TRADUIT:
哈瓦苏的一名女子要求暗杀她离家出走的丈夫，因为他卷走了他们的全部财产。
此人名叫兰迪·贾克斯特，死亡悬赏。一旦出示他死亡的证据，将支付300瓶盖的赏金。
众所周知，兰迪对辐射有一种不健康的迷恋。
悬赏：塞莱斯特·阿什利

ESP.ORIGINAL:
On the behalf of the client, Celeste Ashley is to never set her foot in Havasu again. Target is wanted dead or driven out of the city.
Once the goal has been set, proof is to be brought directly to the client, which will also handle the reward.
Speak with Pierce Clemons in the Caravaneer Rest Stop for more information.
ESP.TRADUIT:
代表客户，让塞莱斯特·阿什利将永远无法再踏入哈瓦苏。目标要么被通缉到死要么被赶出这个城市。
一旦确定了目标，就要把证据直接带给客户，客户会处理报酬问题。
在商队休息站与皮尔斯·克莱蒙斯交谈，了解更多信息。
需要细心的侦探

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I am in need of a person who is capable of sleuthing and finding out the truth. If interested, contact me at my clinic on the south side of town, just outside the walls.
Signed, Dr Mendez of Mendez Clinic.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我需要一个有能力调查和发现真相的人。如果有兴趣，可以联系我的诊所，我的诊所在城南，就在墙外。
署名，门德斯诊所的门德斯医生。
配送工作

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dylan in Donkey Acres requests an urgent scavenging job and delivery to the Poseidon Gas Station.
Payment upon delivery.
ESP.TRADUIT:
驴子田园的迪伦要求进行紧急清扫工作，并向海神加油站送货。
交付后付款。
定位计算机密码
密码是小精灵。
配方 - 冷冻枪

ESP.ORIGINAL:
REPCONN Inter-office Correspondence #2133451
To: Chief Technical Officer From: General Manager
Hey, Trent. Here finally arrives schematics for new cryo-tech from TCGame Corp. I know you really want to look in to it, but they have some damn paranoid encryption, so we need some time for decryption. I sending to you one part what we already have with description of cryo cannon. Good luck with it.
Piers Isley, General Manager REPCONN
*This recipe allows you to make Cryolator*
ESP.TRADUIT:
REPCONN 办公室内部通信#2133451
致: 首席技术官 来自: 总经理
嘿，特伦特，TCGame公司的新低温技术的原理图终于到了。我知道你很想研究它，但他们有一些该死的偏执的加密方式，所以我们需要一些时间来解密。我把我们已经有的一部分冷冻加农的描述发给你。祝你好运。
皮尔斯·艾斯利, REPCONN总经理
*这个配方可以让你制作冷冻枪*
配方 - 低温地雷

ESP.ORIGINAL:
REPCONN Inter-office Correspondence #2133454
To: Chief Technical Officer From: General Manager
Trent, another part is done. Damn encryption, are they use Morse Code? Anyway, sending to you, i think this is about mines, but you better to look yourself.
Piers Isley, General Manager REPCONN
*This recipe allows you to make Cryo Mine*
ESP.TRADUIT:
REPCONN 办公室内部通信#2133454
致: 首席技术官 来自: 总经理
特伦特, 另一部分完成了。该死的加密， 他们用的难道是摩斯电码？总之，发给你，我想这是关于地雷的，但你最好自己看看。
- 皮尔斯·艾斯利,REPCONN总经理
*这个配方可以让你制作低温地雷*
强尼的日记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Page 22.
A strange fellow named Randy visited today. He said he found these radioactive waste barrels that he was "collecting". He paid me good money to help him haul it back to his apartment. I didn't get a good look inside, he snatched the barrels and locked the door in a haste but you could practically see the glow from the outside. Pretty rude of him considering I helped him haul these barrels up to the second floor.
Then I don't know about the neighbors, I don't believe anyone else lives there anymore but there was some intense stink coming from an apartment on the third floor. I'm staying away from this decrepit old grocery store, place gives me the creeps.
ESP.TRADUIT:
22页。
今天有一个叫兰迪的奇怪家伙来访。他说他发现了这些放射性废物桶，他正在 "收集"。他给了我很多钱，让我帮他把这些东西拖回他的公寓。我没有看清楚里面的情况，他匆匆忙忙地抢走了这些桶并锁上了门，但你几乎可以从外面看到那些光芒。他真是太没礼貌了，毕竟是我帮他把这些桶拖到二楼的。
然后我不知道邻居的情况，我相信已经没有其他人住在那里了，但三楼的一间公寓传出了强烈的臭味。我要远离这家破旧的杂货店，这地方让我毛骨悚然。
配方 - 低温手榴弹

ESP.ORIGINAL:
REPCONN Inter-office Correspondence #2133479
To: Chief Technical Officer From: General Manager
About your cryo-stuff. Yes, I know we make brake for long time, but two of our terminals just crashed after decrypting this schematics! Your know, we wasted lot of time trying to make them work again. But, yes, now we have another part, nades by the way. Sending to you.
Piers Isley, General Manager REPCONN
*This recipe allows you to make Cryo Grenade*
ESP.TRADUIT:
REPCONN 办公室内部通信#2133479
致: 首席技术官 来自: 总经理
关于你的低温原料。是的，我知道我们刹车很长时间了，但我们的两个终端在破译了这个原理图后崩溃了！我们浪费了很多时间试图让它们恢复正常。但是，是的，现在我们有了另一部分。顺便一提，手榴弹，发给你了。
- 皮尔斯·艾斯利,REPCONN总经理
*这个配方可以让你制作低温手榴弹*
配方 - 液体冷却剂

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To: Chief Technical Officer From: General Manager
Trent! We did it! Last part decrypted now and I sending it to you. This is some liquid ammo for all of this cryo-tech. I heard, some folks tell what in TCGame Corp, their Chief Engineer can drink this liquid coolant! You must try it too! Ha, just kidding, i think this will freeze all of your guts, but who knows.
*This recipe allows you to make Liquid Coolant*
ESP.TRADUIT:
致: 首席技术官 来自: 总经理
特伦特！我们做到了！最后一部分已经解密，现在发给你。这是低温技术所需的液体弹药，我听TCGame公司的一些人说，他们的首席工程师可以喝下这种液体冷却剂！你也一定要试试！哈哈，开个玩笑，我想这会冻住你所有的内脏，但谁知道呢。
- 皮尔斯·艾斯利,REPCONN总经理
*这个配方可以让你制作液体冷却剂*
脑笼冷冻状态

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Brain Cage Cryogenic Storage:
Cage #01: OFFLINE - OXYGEN LEAK
Cage #02: OFFLINE - DAMAGE TO BRAIN
Cage #03: OFFLINE - POWER SURGE
Cage #04: OFFLINE - OXYGEN LEAK
Cage #05: OFFLINE - OXYGEN LEAK
Cage #06: OFFLINE - POWER SURGE
ESP.TRADUIT:
脑笼低温存储：
1号笼: 离线 - 氧气泄漏
2号笼: 离线 - 大脑损伤
3号笼: 离线 - 电力波动
4号笼: 离线 - 氧气泄漏
5号笼: 离线 - 氧气泄漏
6号笼: 离线 - 电力波动
医生的日志 01

ESP.ORIGINAL:
We were forced to relocate from Nevada to this backwater Arizona bunker due to an emergency inspection, and we can not afford for this find to come into federal hands.
While the subjects are not showing signs of consciousness, their bodies are still alive albeit in a vegetative state. We planned to have dissection begin last week, but due to these unforseen circumstances we'll be forced to postpone it somewhat. The subjects are being kept connected to the devices that seem to function as a life support.
I will update the log once we get the lab set up and running.
ESP.TRADUIT:
由于紧急检查，我们被迫从内华达州搬迁到这个落后的亚利桑那州地堡，我们不能让这个发现落入联邦政府手中。
虽然实验对象没有表现出有意识的迹象，但他们的身体仍然活着，尽管处于植物人状态。我们计划在上周开始解剖，但由于这些不可预见的情况，我们将被迫推迟一些时间。实验对象被连接到设备上，这些设备似乎起到了维持生命的作用。
一旦我们把实验室建立起来并运行，我将更新日志。
医生的日志 02

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The temporary lab seems to become a permanent one due to the old base being repurposed for the war effort. It's not as spacious but we have every tool we need to continue our research.
We tried taking one of the subjects out of their pods, but the subject in question started violently convulsing mere minutes after unplugging. Any attempt to calm the subject failed, and it subsequently died shortly after. We hypothesize that the subject had these adverse reactions due to rapid change in air pressure and respiratory issues.
ESP.TRADUIT:
由于旧基地被重新用于战争，这个临时实验室似乎变成了永久的实验室。它没有那么宽敞，但我们有继续研究所需的一切工具。
我们试着把一个实验对象从他们的舱里拿出来，但是这个实验对象在拔掉电源后仅仅几分钟就开始剧烈地抽搐起来。任何试图让它平静下来的尝试都失败了，随后它很快就死了。我们假设受试者有这些不良反应是由于气压的快速变化和呼吸问题。
医生的日志 03

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Two more failures in keeping subjects alive after taking them out of their alien statis pods. The war has caused our budget to be severely slashed. As a result we have to lay off almost 75 percent of our staff. We made the decision to transfer the brains of the subjects into our own stasis pods, since the pods that they arrived in has started to fail structurally.
We can manage our own pods on a skeleton crew until the war is over, and then carry on our attempts at waking the subject brains, maybe even make proper communion with them.
ESP.TRADUIT:
在把受试者从他们的外星休眠舱中取出来后，又有两次实验对象无法存活。战争导致我们的预算被严重削减，因此，我们不得不裁掉几乎75%的员工。我们决定将受试者的大脑转移到我们自己的休眠舱中，因为他们抵达的休眠舱已经开始出现结构性问题。
在战争结束前，我们可以只依靠少数人来管理自己的休眠舱，然后继续尝试唤醒被试者的大脑，甚至可能与他们进行适当的交流。
冻结的避难所监督终端笔记2

ESP.ORIGINAL:
09-05-2108
My previous suspicions of the vault machinery malfunctioning were correct. Or perhaps not malfunctioning but going beyond humanly habitable temperatures by design from the higher ups...
This will be my last log, since the habitants have gotten too unruly for me to control. I have locked myself into my office chamber as some of the others are attempting to break into the maintenance wing. I fear that the experiment will end prematurely, and rightfully so. Vault-Tec were not the saviors they claimed to be. Not at all. The guilt of locking all these people into this frozen coffin has taken its toll on me. I can't even look these people in the eyes any longer, lying to their face as I try to reassure them that everything is going to be all right.
If the people I've condemned don't manage to kill me, I will do the deed myself.
ESP.TRADUIT:
2108年9月5日
我之前对避难所机器故障的怀疑是正确的。或者，也许不是故障，而是由高层设计的超出人类适宜居住的温度...
这将是我的最后一篇日志，因为居民们已经变得太不守规矩了，我无法控制。我已经把自己锁在我的办公室里，因为其他一些人正试图闯入维修部。我担心实验会过早结束，这是理所当然的。避难所科技不是他们声称的救世主，根本就不是。把所有这些人关进这个冰冷的棺材的罪恶感已经让我付出了代价，我甚至不能再直视这些人的眼睛，在我试图向他们保证一切都会好起来的时候，我是在当着他们的面撒谎。
如果那些被我定罪的人没有杀我，我就自己动手。
低温喷雾
低温地雷
低温手榴弹
哈瓦苏废土

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fantastic! I knew you were a good guy. You've done a good deed today. Thank you.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanQu_00001E08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've installed the bypass module and respecified the targeting parameters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经安装了分流模块并重新指定了目标参数。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Charlie Redford. I'm an ambassador for the NCR, and I'm on a mission to negotiate the city of Havasu's assimilation into the republic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是查理·雷德福，NCR的大使，我的任务是协商哈瓦苏加入共和国。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_00002503_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is official NCR business. I shouldn't allow civilians into these affairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是NCR的官方业务，我不应该让平民介入这些事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_00002506_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Havasu's been a trade hub for a long time, and the strategical position that allows us to flank the legion's forces makes it very attractive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈瓦苏长期以来一直是一个贸易中心，而且它的战略位置允许我们对军团的部队进行包抄，这让它非常有吸引力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_00002505_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately they don't seem too keen on being assimilated into the republic, so my work has been difficult to say the least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，他们似乎不太热衷于加入共和国，所以我的工作至少可以说是困难重重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_00002505_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not that I don't understand their opposing us. If they joined the republic, the Legion would no doubt put pressure on them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是说我不理解他们反对我们。如果他们加入共和国，军团无疑会对他们施加压力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_00002505_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So in a way, you could say that they're stuck in between a rock and a hard place, or at least I think that's how the saying goes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此在某种程度上，你可以说他们是进退维谷，至少我认为这个成语是这么说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_00002505_4.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 哈瓦苏有什么重要的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. Well it wouldn't hurt to have someone try to get us out of this stalemate. Give it a try if you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。如果有人能帮我们打破僵局，那也无妨，如果你愿意试一试的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_0000250A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] I'm no stranger to official NCR business.
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR]我对NCR的官方业务并不陌生。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I see. Well it wouldn't hurt to have someone try to get us out of this stalemate. Give it a try if you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]我明白了。如果有人能帮我们打破僵局，那也无妨，如果你愿意试一试的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_0000250C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't seem to be going anywhere with this "business" of yours anyway. Let me help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 反正你的"业务"也不会有什么进展。我来帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] No, I think I'll try my chances elsewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]不，我想我会在其他地方碰碰运气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_00003223_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 请让我帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh. Well, ain't been having much luck with anything lately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵呵，好吧，最近没什么好运气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_0000250B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck with your business then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你的业务顺利。

ESP.ORIGINAL: None of your fucking business, that's who we are. Get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不关你他妈的事，我们就是这样的人。快走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deserting Trooper [0600253E] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBriggsVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRDese_00002546_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 这些家伙们是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: And what? Subject ourselves to the firing squad? We're dead either way. Better take our chances out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后呢？把自己扔进行刑队？反正我们都死定了，我们还不如在这里碰碰运气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deserting Trooper [0600253E] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBriggsVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRDese_00002547_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna need you to turn yourselves in to the camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你们去营地自首。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Magic is the very essence of destruction. It is bound within the etherial flux flowing through everything. Here, let me give you a demonstration.
ESP.TRADUIT: 魔法是毁灭的本质，它被束缚在流经万物的空气中。来，我给你示范一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grand Magus Mervin [06032365] (mod) Quest : ([06032376]RadWorldMervinDialogue) 06032376 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMe_RadWorldMervinW_00002AFF_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: “魔法”是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well then, are you quivering in your boots at the might of Grand Magus Mervin?! A very master of magic! Tell me you're impressed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你是否因为大法师默温的力量而颤抖？一个非常厉害的魔法大师！告诉我你被打动了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grand Magus Mervin [06032365] (mod) Quest : ([06032376]RadWorldMervinDialogue) 06032376 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMe_RadWorldMervinI_00002B03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clearly you're not very cultured to not appreciate the intricacies of magic! Pardon my rudeness, but I do have to wish for you to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很显然你不是很有文化，不懂得欣赏复杂的魔法！请原谅我的无礼，但我真的希望你离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grand Magus Mervin [06032365] (mod) Quest : ([06032376]RadWorldMervinDialogue) 06032376 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMe_RadWorldMervinN_00002B08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do not wish to associate with fellows that belittle the arts. Farewell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不愿与贬低艺术的人来往，就此告别。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grand Magus Mervin [06032365] (mod) Quest : ([06032376]RadWorldMervinDialogue) 06032376 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMe_RadWorldMervinN_00002B08_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh no, that was lame as hell...
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃不，那太逊了...

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought so! Bask in the glory of meeting the Grand Magus Mervin, because I, am the only man in these lands that has mastered the arts of magic!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想也是！享受与大法师默温见面的荣耀吧，因为我，是这片土地上唯一掌握魔法艺术的人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grand Magus Mervin [06032365] (mod) Quest : ([06032376]RadWorldMervinDialogue) 06032376 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMe_RadWorldMervinI_00002B07_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 噢是的，令人印象非常深刻！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I- Uh... Yes, you are right. Of course you're right. It's all just a delusion of mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]我...呃...是，你说得对。你当然是对的，一切都只是我的错觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grand Magus Mervin [06032365] (mod) Quest : ([06032376]RadWorldMervinDialogue) 06032376 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMe_RadWorldMervinN_00002B0A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who am I trying to fool? This entire persona is just made up based on comic books I used to read.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我到底在愚弄谁？整个形象只是根据我以前读过的漫画书虚构出来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grand Magus Mervin [06032365] (mod) Quest : ([06032376]RadWorldMervinDialogue) 06032376 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMe_RadWorldMervinN_00002B0A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, you seem competent with explosives. Here, take this keycard to my secret stash down below the terminal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，你似乎很擅长炸药。拿着这张钥匙卡去我在候机楼下面的秘密仓库。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grand Magus Mervin [06032365] (mod) Quest : ([06032376]RadWorldMervinDialogue) 06032376 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMe_RadWorldMervinN_00002B0A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can find it on the bottom floor, through the room by the escalators closest to the entrance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以在底层找到它，穿过离入口最近的自动扶梯边上的那个房间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grand Magus Mervin [06032365] (mod) Quest : ([06032376]RadWorldMervinDialogue) 06032376 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMe_RadWorldMervinN_00002B0A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think I'll have a use for all that stuff any more. I'm gonna leave this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我再也用不着那些东西了，我要离开这个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grand Magus Mervin [06032365] (mod) Quest : ([06032376]RadWorldMervinDialogue) 06032376 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMe_RadWorldMervinN_00002B0A_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We might cross paths elsewhere in the wastes. So until then, Farewell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可能会在废土的其他地方再见。所以在那之前，就此告别。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grand Magus Mervin [06032365] (mod) Quest : ([06032376]RadWorldMervinDialogue) 06032376 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMe_RadWorldMervinN_00002B0A_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You merely pre-rigged explosives to a timer and set it off remotely. You're no wizard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只是把炸药预先装在计时器上然后远程引爆，你不是巫师。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Just- Just a bunch of booms?! Why I never...! The audacity of some people! Get out of my face, belittler of magic!
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]只是...只是一阵轰隆声？为什么我从没...！有些人真是太大胆了！从我面前消失，魔法的贬低者！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grand Magus Mervin [06032365] (mod) Quest : ([06032376]RadWorldMervinDialogue) 06032376 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMe_RadWorldMervinN_00002B0B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was just a bunch of booms, big deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是一阵轰隆声，没什么大不了的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Again? That pest has been bothering me for months! My answer is not going to change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又来？那个讨厌的家伙烦了我好几个月了！我的答案不会变的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_00002B84_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My town is an independent jewel by the Colorado River and I wouldn't have it any other way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的城市是科罗拉多河旁的一颗独立的明珠，我不会让它以其他方式存在的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_00002B84_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell those republic clowns to march back to where they came from.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉那些共和国小丑，滚回他们的老家去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_00002B84_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR Ambassador wishes to speak with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR大使想和你谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck. I knew this day would come. Listen pal, I'm a businessman, and I'm sure we can come to an agreement that benefits the both of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操，我就知道会有这一天会。听着，伙计，我是个商人，我相信我们能达成一个对我们双方都有利的协议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_00002B86_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever since those California goons showed up, business started drying up. I HAD to cut down on the tribute in order for the town to survive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自从那些加州暴徒出现后，生意就开始枯竭。为了让这个城镇生存下去，我不得不削减贡税。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_00002B86_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surely you understand, right? P-Please forgive me, I'll do better in the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你肯定明白的，对吧？请...请原谅我，以后我会做得更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_00002B86_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've even dealt with the NCR! Business will be back to normal soon enough, trust me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还跟NCR打过交道呢！生意很快就会恢复正常的，相信我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_00002B86_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here on behalf of Caesar's Legion, to make you answer for breaking the deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是代表凯撒军团来的，让你为违反协议负责。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, please no! Take the women and children too if you must! Just spare me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，请不要！如果有必要的话，把女人和孩子也带走！饶了我吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_00002B8A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: RWMayorOfficeDoorREF.SetOpenState 0 RWMayorOfficeDoorREF.Lock 255 RWMayorOfficeDoorREF.SetOwnership Set RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.MayorAttack to 1
<Attack> Nobody crosses the Legion and lives to tell the tale.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>没有人能越过军团还活下来讲述这个故事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] O-Okay, that's fine. Just fine. Anything for the cause, you know. Oy vey, true to Kaiser and all that!
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]好...好的，那很好，挺好的，只要是为了事业，你懂的。哎呀，忠于凯撒和一切！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_00002B8C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You owe us. We'll be taking what we're due, and you will not complain about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你欠我们的。我们会拿回我们应得的，你不能抱怨。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh thank you! Thank you so much! I'll have the tribute back up to speed soon! You have my word!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，谢谢你！非常感谢！我很快就会让贡品恢复正常的！我向你保证！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_00002B8B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well, I'll give you another chance. You better not mess this up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我再给你一次机会。你最好别搞砸了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess I was wrong about you. The Mayor is a spineless worm, you can not give debased degenerates like that any room to wriggle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我看错你了。市长是一条没有骨气的虫子，你不能给那样的下贱堕落者任何回旋的余地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_00002B94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The original plan is a go. Eliminate any resistance and take any fitting survivors as slaves. Get moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原计划是可行的。消灭任何抵抗，并把任何合适的幸存者作为奴隶，行动起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_00002B94_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The original plan is a go. Eliminate any resistance and take any fitting survivors as slaves. Get moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原计划是可行的。消灭任何抵抗，并把任何合适的幸存者作为奴隶，行动起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_0001C0A8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Heh, well, yeah, at this price the least I could do is hear them out, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]呵呵，好吧，对，以这个价格我至少能听他们把话说完，你懂吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_00003218_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <2000 Caps> How about we cut a little deal? A fair price for a little chat, no?
ESP.TRADUIT: <2000瓶盖>我们做个小交易怎么样？聊一聊，价钱还算公道吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Heh, well, yeah, at this price the least I could do is hear them out, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]呵呵，好吧，对，以这个价格我至少能听他们把话说完，你懂吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_00003219_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <1000 Caps> How about we cut a little deal? A fair price for a little chat, no?
ESP.TRADUIT: <1000瓶盖>我们做个小交易怎么样？聊一聊，价钱还算公道吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Heh, well, yeah, at this price the least I could do is hear them out, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]呵呵，好吧，对，以这个价格我至少能听他们把话说完，你懂吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_0000321A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <500 Caps> How about we cut a little deal? A fair price for a little chat, no?
ESP.TRADUIT: <500瓶盖>我们做个小交易怎么样？聊一聊，价钱还算公道吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Heh, well, yeah, at this price the least I could do is hear them out, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]呵呵，好吧，对，以这个价格我至少能听他们把话说完，你懂吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_0000321B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <200 Caps> How about we cut a little deal? A fair price for a little chat, no?
ESP.TRADUIT: <200瓶盖>我们做个小交易怎么样？聊一聊，价钱还算公道吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I guess. If they're this persistent they must actually care about the town. Never liked the Legion anyway, too many demands.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]我想是的。如果他们这么执着，他们一定是真的关心这个城市。反正我也不喜欢军团，他们要求太多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_00003216_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just hear them out. It can't be much worse than your current situation, with Legion and all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听他们说完。这不可能比你目前的情况更糟，军团之类的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I've told them no before and I'll say no again. I want nothing to do with yet another gang of leeches feeding on my town.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]我之前已经拒绝过他们了，我还会拒绝的。我可不想再让另一帮水蛭吸这座城市的血了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_00003217_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, man. They just wanna talk is all!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，伙计。他们只是想谈谈而已！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] F-Fine! I get it, I get it. I'll see the ambassador or whatever, just please don't hurt me!
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]好...好的！我明白了，我明白了。我会去见大使什么的，求你别伤害我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_0000321C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd suggest having a chat with my friend if you want to keep your teeth, shorty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想保住你的牙齿，我建议你和我的朋友聊聊，矮子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I suggest you'd change your tone or I'll call the militia on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]我建议你改变语气，否则我就叫民兵来抓你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_0000321D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let the ambassador in or I'll kick your ass, buddy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让大使进来，不然我揍你一顿，兄弟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our orders are to negotiate a treaty with the town of Havasu, to later annex it and use it as a staging point of the NCR's expansion into Arizona.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我接到的命令是与哈瓦苏市谈判一项条约，随后将其吞并，并将其用作NCR向亚利桑那州扩张的中转站。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_00003222_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The location is ideal for a stronghold against Legion routes south, and has great value as a trading outpost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是对抗军团南下路线的理想据点，作为贸易前哨也有很大价值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_00003222_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However the leader of Havasu known only as "The Mayor", refuses to open up for any kind of negotiations. I've tried everything but he won't budge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，哈瓦苏的领袖“市长”拒绝进行任何形式的谈判。我什么都试过了，但他就是不肯让步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_00003222_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to get me in, have a little chat with him. If I can only start my negotiations I believe we can come to a consensus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你带我进去，和他谈谈。只要我能开始谈判，我相信我们能达成共识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_00003222_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, have my spare passport. You need these to get into town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你，我的备用通行证，你需要这个才能进城。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_00003222_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
SetStage rdwrldNCRQuest01 10
if RWNCRAmbassadorFootlockerREF.GetItemCount RWHavasuPassport >= 1 RWNCRAmbassadorFootlockerREF.removeitem RWHavasuPassport 1 player.additem RWHavasuPassport 1 endif
So what do I need to do, exactly?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我到底需要做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did? Nice! I won't dally then, I'll go start negotiations right away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做到了？漂亮！那我就不耽搁了，我马上就开始谈判。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_00003225_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meanwhile, could you go see Major Delgado in our camp down south? I'm sure he could use a hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与此同时，你能去南边的营地见德尔加多少校吗？我肯定他需要帮忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_00003225_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
SetStage rdwrldNCRQuest01 30
RWHavasuNCRGuardREF.AddScriptPackage RWHavasuNCRGuardMayorOfficePackage RWNCRAmbassadorREF.AddScriptPackage RWNCRAmbassadorMayorChairPACKAGE
RWHavasuNCRGuardREF.evp RWNCRAmbassadorREF.evp
I managed to convince The Mayor to open up for negotiations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我设法说服了市长开放谈判。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Major Delgado of the New California Republic's Arizona Outreach Battalion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是新加州共和国亚利桑那拓展营的德尔加多少校。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Major Delgado [0601A2F6] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMajo_00003229_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aw thanks, you're so sweet! This coolant will do wonders!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊谢谢，你太贴心了！这种冷却剂能创造奇迹！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mess Hall Cook [0603D779] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWUmiVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRCook_000038D0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue.RWNCRMoralePoints to (RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue.RWNCRMoralePoints + 1) RWNCRGoalBoardDashREF05.enable SetObjectiveCompleted rdwrldNCRQuest01 45 1

ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有一些冷却剂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Redford sent you, huh? Yeah we sure could use help around here. We're in the shit and nothing seems to be going right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 雷德福派你来的？对，我们这里确实需要帮手，我们陷入了困境，一切似乎都不对劲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Major Delgado [0601A2F6] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMajo_000038D2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ambassador Redford sent me, told me you could use a hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 雷德福大使派我来的，说你需要帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't even know half of it. This camp, this sorry outpost in the middle of nowhere is an excuse where the NCR sends their problematic soldiers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还不知道更严重的情况。这个位于偏远地区的可怜前哨是NCR派遣问题士兵的借口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Major Delgado [0601A2F6] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMajo_000038D4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're basically just a warning signal for when the Legion starts to blast over the Colorado en masse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们基本上只是一个警告信号，当军团开始大规模集结在科罗拉多州的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Major Delgado [0601A2F6] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMajo_000038D4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The soldiers know that this assignment is a dead end. Nothing happens and leaving the camp isn't an option.
ESP.TRADUIT: 士兵们知道这次任务是死路一条。没有发生事件也不可能离开营地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Major Delgado [0601A2F6] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMajo_000038D4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They even set up snipers nests on the other side of the river to target anyone who tries to desert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们甚至在河的另一边设置了狙击手藏匿处，瞄准任何试图逃跑的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Major Delgado [0601A2F6] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMajo_000038D4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I could go on rambling forever on what's down the shitter in this camp. Ask around, play errand boy. We need all the help we can get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，我可以永远喋喋不休地讲述这个营地里有什么问题。问问周围的人，扮演跑腿的人，我们需要所有我们能得到的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Major Delgado [0601A2F6] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMajo_000038D4_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what do you need help with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你需要我帮什么忙？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who am I? Why do you care? I never should've signed up for this military shit... Not built for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是谁？你为什么关心这个？我就不应该参军...不是为它而生的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Depressed Trooper [060038D8] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPieccuuVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRDepr_000038E1_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help? Haha yeah, I need to get out of here, man... I can't take this shit anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮忙？哈哈是的，我要离开这里，伙计...我再也受不了了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Depressed Trooper [060038D8] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPieccuuVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRDepr_000038E2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, ask the Major to give me leave. I miss my family so much. I have a son but I've never even met him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 求你了，让少校放我走吧。我非常想念我的家人，我有个儿子，但我从没见过他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Depressed Trooper [060038D8] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPieccuuVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRDepr_000038E2_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: R-Really? I can see my family again? Thank you so much!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真...真的？我又能见到我的家人了？非常感谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Depressed Trooper [060038D8] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPieccuuVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRDepr_000038E3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> I spoke with the Major, he said you're all good to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>我和少校谈过了，他说你可以走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, that's about what I expected. Maybe one day I'll get to go home...
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，和我想的差不多。总有一天我会回家的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Depressed Trooper [060038D8] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPieccuuVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRDepr_000038E5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I couldn't get you permission to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我没能得到放你离开的许可。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're not to let anyone cross the bridge under any circumstances. I'm sorry but those are our orders, my hands are tied on this one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在任何情况下都不会让任何人过桥。我很抱歉，但这是我们的命令，我无能为力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Major Delgado [0601A2F6] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMajo_000038E8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's this guy in camp that wants back to his family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 营地里有个家伙想回到他的家人身边。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right, maybe I can use you. You're an unfamiliar face around here, so you could get the jump on them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对，也许我需要你。你在这里是一张陌生的脸，所以你可以先下手为强。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Major Delgado [0601A2F6] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMajo_000038EA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's this group of four soldiers that deserted last week.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有这样一个由四名士兵组成的小组，上周逃跑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Major Delgado [0601A2F6] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMajo_000038EA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Normally, I wouldn't do anything about a single guy fleeing the field, but these are too many to fly under the radar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常情况下，我不会对一个人逃跑采取任何行动，但这么多人，不可能躲过雷达。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Major Delgado [0601A2F6] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMajo_000038EA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to hunt them down. Bring me their dog tags for proof.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你找到他们，给我他们的狗牌作为证据。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Major Delgado [0601A2F6] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMajo_000038EA_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surely you have something for me to do then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你肯定有事情让我做吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. It pains me to lose even more men, but well... It is what it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你！失去更多的人让我很痛苦，但...事情就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Major Delgado [0601A2F6] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMajo_000038ED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue.RWNCRMoralePoints to (RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue.RWNCRMoralePoints + 1) RWNCRGoalBoardDashREF03.enable RWNCRDeserterREF01.markfordelete RWNCRDeserterREF02.markfordelete RWNCRDeserterREF03.markfordelete RWNCRDeserterREF04.markfordelete SetObjectiveCompleted rdwrldNCRQuest01 43 1

ESP.TRADUIT: 这是逃兵的狗牌。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's Marcus Jones, but the guys around camp call me Frost because of my pale complexion. I'm the communications officer at this camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫马库斯·琼斯，但营地里的人都叫我弗罗斯特，因为我肤色苍白。我是这个营地的通信官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Comm Officer Frost [060038EF] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTriangleVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRComm_000038F5_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah there's one thing that's been bothering me for a while. I send and receive a lot of messages here at the camp, and lately something's been up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，有件事一直困扰着我。我在营地收发了很多信息，最近有点不对劲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Comm Officer Frost [060038EF] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTriangleVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRComm_000038F6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe someone's been listening in on our lines. I've checked around camp but there's no other radio equipment but my own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信有人一直在监听我们的线路。我检查了营地周围，除了我自己的无线电设备没有其他的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Comm Officer Frost [060038EF] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTriangleVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRComm_000038F6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That must mean that someone in town up north is listening in. Go up there, ask around or see if you can find out anything about a spy listening in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那一定是北边的城里有人在监听。去那里，四周打探打探，看看能不能发现窃听的间谍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Comm Officer Frost [060038EF] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTriangleVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRComm_000038F6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you need any help around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里需要什么帮助吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice work. I'll give you a slice of my next rations as a gesture of gratitude.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好。下次我把我的口粮分给你一片以示感谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Comm Officer Frost [060038EF] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTriangleVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRComm_000038F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue.RWNCRMoralePoints to (RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue.RWNCRMoralePoints + 3) RWLegionSpyPapersREF.disable RWLegionSpyPapersREF.markfordelete RWNCRGoalBoardDashREF01.enable SetObjectiveCompleted rdwrldNCRQuest01 46 1
I've taken care of the spy. It was a Legion guy in Havasu listening in on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经搞定那个间谍了，是哈瓦苏的一个军团的人在监听你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I try not to snoop around in others' business. I like tinkering with machines more than playing voyeur.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我尽量不去窥探别人的事。比起偷窥狂，我更喜欢摆弄机器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanRa_000038FA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you been listening in on the NCR over the radio?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一直在收听NCR的电台吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, whyever would I listen in on NCR broadcasts? Don't bother me with such preposterous accusations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我干嘛要听NCR的广播？别用这种荒谬的指控来烦我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_000038FF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you the one creeping in on NCR broadcasts?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是潜入NCR电台的那个人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hahaha, oh you! Nay, magic is not something you merely pick up and use like a knife! Magic requires a lifetime of dedication!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈哈，哦你！不，魔法不是你拿起来像刀一样使用的东西！魔法需要奉献一生！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grand Magus Mervin [06032365] (mod) Quest : ([06032376]RadWorldMervinDialogue) 06032376 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMe_RadWorldMervinL_0000391A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I myself picked up the arts only sixty years ago! I've perused endless, um, tomes to learn everything about the complex structures of magic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我自己也是在六十年前才开始学习这门艺术的！我翻阅了无尽的...嗯...书本，以了解有关魔法复杂结构的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grand Magus Mervin [06032365] (mod) Quest : ([06032376]RadWorldMervinDialogue) 06032376 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMe_RadWorldMervinL_0000391A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless you have the resolve to dedicate at least as much time as yours truly, I advice you not to dig any deeper on this subject.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你有决心拿出至少一样多的时间，否则我建议你不要在这个问题上再深究了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grand Magus Mervin [06032365] (mod) Quest : ([06032376]RadWorldMervinDialogue) 06032376 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMe_RadWorldMervinL_0000391A_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我也可以用这个...“魔法”吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess we are running a bit low on supplies. Could you head into town up north and see if there's a trader or something willing to come down here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们的补给有点短缺了。你能去北边的城里看看有没有什么商人之类的愿意来这里吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster Falmont [0603BF63] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWFoxVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRFalm_00003F59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you need help with anything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You actually found someone around here that doesn't hate our guts? Impressive. Thank you for your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的找到一个不讨厌我们的人？令人印象深刻，感谢你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster Falmont [0603BF63] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWFoxVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRFalm_00003F5B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue.RWNCRMoralePoints to (RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue.RWNCRMoralePoints + 1) RWNCRGoalBoardDashREF02.enable SetObjectiveCompleted rdwrldNCRQuest01 47 1
I found a trader willing to come down here and trade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了一个愿意来这里做生意的商人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, why not. I don't have a passport anyway, so they won't let me inside town. Maybe the troopers will actually buy something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，为什么不。反正我也没有通行证，所以他们不让我进城，也许NCR士兵真的会买点东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Traveling Merchant [0605717B] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTravelingMerchant01VT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldNCRTrav_00003F60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue.RWNCRCaravanFound to 1 SetObjectiveCompleted rdwrldNCRQuest01 42 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldNCRQuest01 47 1 RWTravelingMerchant02REF.AddScriptPackage RWNCRTravelingMerchantTravelPackage RWTravelingMerchant02REF.evp RWTravelingMerchant02BrahminREF.AddScriptPackage VES09BrahminFollowMerchant RWTravelingMerchant02BrahminREF.evp
Would you consider trading with the NCR camp down south?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会考虑和南边的NCR营地做生意吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing. Here's what I've got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，这是我有的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Traveling Merchant [0605717B] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTravelingMerchant01VT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldNCRTrav_00003F5F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to see your wares.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想看看你的货物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told you, I don't know anything about any package. Now beat it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说了，我不知道任何包裹的事。现在走开。
