ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tod Robertson [0604572D] (mod) Quest : ([06045F89]RadWorldTodRobertsonDialogue) 06045F89 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTodRobe_00045F92_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about a stack of caps for you to hand the package over?
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你一堆瓶盖，你把包裹移交给我如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, if you really want to help, give me medical supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果你真想帮忙，就给我医药用品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Medic Ryans [0601227F] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPhannVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMedi_00005330_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll need quite a bit to build my stock up again. A dozen stimpaks, a handful of Med-X, A couple of steadies. Stuff like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一大笔钱来增加我的储备。一打治疗针、一把放射线-X，几瓶稳定剂，诸如此类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Medic Ryans [0601227F] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPhannVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMedi_00005330_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Major insisted that I should help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 少校坚持要我帮助你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks, I guess. Now I just gotta hide them so the druggies around camp can't steal them for a quick high.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢。我想现在我得把它们藏起来，免得营地里的瘾君子就偷它们来嗨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Medic Ryans [0601227F] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPhannVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMedi_00005332_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem Stimpak 12 player.removeitem Morphine 5 player.removeitem NVSteadyChem 2
set RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue.RWNCRMoralePoints to (RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue.RWNCRMoralePoints + 1) RWNCRGoalBoardDashREF04.enable SetObjectiveCompleted rdwrldNCRQuest01 44 1

ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的医疗用品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah I've been hearing good things. Frost told me that Redford had good luck in his negotiations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我听到一些好消息。弗罗斯特告诉我，雷德福在谈判中运气不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Major Delgado [0601A2F6] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMajo_00005334_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll be moving some of our soldiers out there shortly, so you should probably go speak with him if you want more tasks in this operation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们很快就会把一些士兵转移到那里，所以如果你想在这次行动中得到更多任务，你也许应该去和他谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Major Delgado [0601A2F6] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMajo_00005334_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will be staying here, keeping tabs on things and making sure the supply lines are in check.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会留在这里，密切关注事态的发展，确保补给线得到控制。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Major Delgado [0601A2F6] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMajo_00005334_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've helped out around the camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在营地周围帮了不少忙了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah yes, my little helper. I've managed to convince the Mayor to let us inside the town and further fortify it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，是的，我的小帮手。我已经说服市长让我们进入城镇并进一步加强防御。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_0000534A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This will help our influence over the area and through implementing taxes we can get a cut off a trade route previously untouched by the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这将有助于我们在该地区的影响力，通过实施税收，我们可以切断一条此前未受NCR影响的贸易路线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_0000534A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The men should have set up tents by now, but there's one more thing I want you to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计们现在应该已经搭好帐篷了，但我还想让你做一件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_0000534A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whilst I finish up the negotiations with the Mayor, I would like you to hunt down a specific radio part.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我完成与市长的谈判的同时，我希望你能找到一个特定的无线电零件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_0000534A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're going to need that part to do long range broadcasts all the way back to Shady Sands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们将需要这个部件来做远距离广播，直到沙荫镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_0000534A_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you get your hands on the part, install it in the radio building down the block.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你拿到零件后，把它安装在街区尽头的广播大楼里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_0000534A_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Major told me that I should speak with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 少校让我跟你谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm, long distance transmissions huh... I think I saw stuff like that when I was doing scavenging runs at the airstrip up north.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，长途广播啊...我记得我在北边的机场跑道上拾荒的时候见过这样的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanNC_0000534C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like deep in the hangars. I didn't bother dragging it out because my pack was already fairly full.
ESP.TRADUIT: 像是在机库的深处。我懒得把它拖出来，因为我的背包已经满了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanNC_0000534C_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 它可能还躺在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanNC_0000534C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know where I can find a radio part for long distance broadcasts?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我在哪里可以找到用于长途广播的无线电零件吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent, I'll report with the operations, albeit overdue, success. Bet the General doesn't even remember we're out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我会报告这次行动的成功，虽然有些迟了。我打赌将军甚至不记得我们在这里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_00005361_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经安装了无线电部件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know about that, huh? Yeah, it's pretty bad. I took him to the Doc and it seemed to be going well for a while, but he's relapsed hard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，嗯？是啊，很糟糕。我带他去看了医生，有一段时间情况似乎还不错，但他旧病复发了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hannah [06044892] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoGFVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldHannahM_00007E4F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a functioning alcoholic though, and luckily not violent. He's a good man, but it hurts me to see him slowly killing himself with the whiskey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个正常的酒鬼，幸运的是他没有暴力倾向。他是个好人，但看到他慢慢地喝着威士忌酒自杀，我很难受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hannah [06044892] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoGFVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldHannahM_00007E4F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does the Mayor have a problem with alcohol?
ESP.TRADUIT: 市长有酗酒的问题？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave me alone, will ya? Everyone's on my fucking ass just because I wanna enjoy some drinks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别烦我，好吗？所有人都盯着我的屁股就因为我想喝点酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_00007E51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard you have an alcohol problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你酗酒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Of course I'm not, we literally just met! I'm not naive enough to just run my mouth to a stranger who just waddled in.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]我当然没有，我们才刚认识！我还没天真到对一个刚进来的陌生人信口开河。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoSP_00007F1D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But tell you what, if you do some helping out around here, I'll try to track down your stuff. How about that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过这样吧，如果你能帮点忙，我会试着找到你的东西。你觉得如何？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoSP_00007F1D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think you're telling me everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你没把一切都告诉我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's T-Twitch. They call me that because of my s-stutters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫图...图奇，他们这么叫我是因为我口...口吃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Twitch [06013762] (mod) Quest : ([06007F23]RadWorldTwitchDialogue) 06007F23 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJamesVT\RadWorldTw_RadWorldTwitchW_00007F29_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Y-Yeah, and what brings you t-to me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是...是的，那你怎么来找...找我了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Twitch [06013762] (mod) Quest : ([06007F23]RadWorldTwitchDialogue) 06007F23 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJamesVT\RadWorldTw_RadWorldTwitchH_00007F2B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, I didn't come for a fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我不是来打架的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help? I don't need any h-help! If anyone needs help it's my b-buddy Fidget.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮助？我不需要任何帮...帮助！如果有人需要帮助，那就是我的好兄..兄弟菲基特。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Twitch [06013762] (mod) Quest : ([06007F23]RadWorldTwitchDialogue) 06007F23 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJamesVT\RadWorldTw_RadWorldTwitchC_00007F2D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He went on a c-chem run a few days ago and didn't come back. I need my fix, man. F-find him and ask him what's taking him so long!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他几天前去找药...药品，还没回来。我需要我的量，伙计，找到他，问他为什么这么久都不回来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Twitch [06013762] (mod) Quest : ([06007F23]RadWorldTwitchDialogue) 06007F23 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJamesVT\RadWorldTw_RadWorldTwitchC_00007F2D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: if GetStage rdwrldTwitchQuest01 < 5 SetStage rdwrldTwitchQuest01 5 endif

ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me and my b-buddy Fidget got fed up with the tightwads at the shantytown and bailed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和我的哥...哥们菲基特受够了棚户区的吝啬鬼们，就离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Twitch [06013762] (mod) Quest : ([06007F23]RadWorldTwitchDialogue) 06007F23 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJamesVT\RadWorldTw_RadWorldTwitchW_00007F31_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: W-We tried to leave the valley but the tunnel gate was locked and the path by the t-train tracks was blocked by boulders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我们想离开山谷，但隧道的门被锁住了，铁...铁轨旁的路也被巨石堵住了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Twitch [06013762] (mod) Quest : ([06007F23]RadWorldTwitchDialogue) 06007F23 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: So we decided to take shelter in this b-building for a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我们决定在这栋建...建筑里躲一段时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Twitch [06013762] (mod) Quest : ([06007F23]RadWorldTwitchDialogue) 06007F23 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJamesVT\RadWorldTw_RadWorldTwitchW_00007F31_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么在这里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, shit. That's bad. T-That's the worst thing that could've happened. What am I supposed to do now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，该死。这太糟了，这...这是可能发生的最糟糕的事了，我现在该怎么办呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Twitch [06013762] (mod) Quest : ([06007F23]RadWorldTwitchDialogue) 06007F23 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJamesVT\RadWorldTw_RadWorldTwitchY_00007F34_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, he was su-supposed to get the jet! Where will I get my fix from now? D-Did he have some on him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说，他应...应当搞到杰特的！现在我到那里去搞到我的量？他...他身上有吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Twitch [06013762] (mod) Quest : ([06007F23]RadWorldTwitchDialogue) 06007F23 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJamesVT\RadWorldTw_RadWorldTwitchY_00007F34_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found Fidget, he's dead. Eaten by some rabid dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到菲基特了，他死了，被疯狗吃了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: S-Sweet, dude! You're a lifesaver. Oh, if you wanted to leave the valley, you can have this key I found earlier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真...真好，哥们儿！你真是救星。哦，如果你想离开山谷，你可以拿走我之前找到的这把钥匙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Twitch [06013762] (mod) Quest : ([06007F23]RadWorldTwitchDialogue) 06007F23 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJamesVT\RadWorldTw_RadWorldTwitchG_00007F38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would go myself, b-but now with Fidget gone I don't think I could find my way around. I'm bad with d-directions, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本来想自己去的，但...但是现在菲基特死了，我想我找不到路了。我不太能认清方...方向，你懂吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Twitch [06013762] (mod) Quest : ([06007F23]RadWorldTwitchDialogue) 06007F23 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJamesVT\RadWorldTw_RadWorldTwitchG_00007F38_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I've got some jet for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我有一些杰特给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aw, come on man! I need my f-fix!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，求你了老兄！我需要我的药...药！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Twitch [06013762] (mod) Quest : ([06007F23]RadWorldTwitchDialogue) 06007F23 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJamesVT\RadWorldTw_RadWorldTwitchK_00007F37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Y-You have the jet! You're hiding it f-from me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...你有杰特！你在瞒...瞒着我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Twitch [06013762] (mod) Quest : ([06007F23]RadWorldTwitchDialogue) 06007F23 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJamesVT\RadWorldTw_RadWorldTwitchK_00007F37_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, and even if I did I wouldn't give a junkie like you anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，就算我有，我也不会给你这种瘾君子任何东西。
{站那儿别动。}
啊，站...站在那儿别动！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Twitch [06013762] (mod) Quest : ([06007F23]RadWorldTwitchDialogue) 06007F23 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJamesVT\RadWorldTw_RadWorldTwitchH_00007F4D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh yikes, you're not a feral! I almost shot you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢天啊，你不是野兽！我差点开枪打你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyF_000085E0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently she got taken by the Legion, and is now serving as a slave in their camp up north.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很显然她被军团抓走了，现在在他们北边的营地里当奴隶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00008BFE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not dumb enough to go up against the Legion, but maybe we'll be able to... negotiate with them? Could you see if you can get her back for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没傻到去对抗军团，但也许我们能...跟他们谈判？你能帮我把她找回来吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00008BFE_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 她在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. I need to run the clinic, so if you ever change your mind, come and see me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。我需要管理诊所，如果你改变主意了，就来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00008C01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want to do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想那样做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! Here's 300 caps you could use to bargain with if you need to. Good luck, friend. Hope you both make it out of there alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了！如果你需要的话，这里有300瓶盖可以用来跟他们讨价还价。祝你好运，朋友，希望你们都能活着出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00008C02_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 好，我知道了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm known as Core around here. Came from Havasu way back when, but when things started getting hairy I went here instead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这附近被叫做科尔。之前在哈瓦苏，那边情况变得棘手以后我就到这儿来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreWho_00009373_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lake Havasu City, or just Havasu for short, is a town a few miles west of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈瓦苏湖城，简称哈瓦苏城，是是在这里以西几英里外的一个城镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreHav_00009376_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It used to be a peaceful place, but became a sort of a political hotspot. And nowadays, most politics is played with lead and gunpowder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里曾经是一个和平的地方，但后来变成了某种意义上的政治热点。如今大多数政治都是用铅和火药来玩的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreHav_00009376_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR was pushing from the south and I heard rumors of the Legion forming an offensive from the north.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR正在从南面推进，我也听到了军团从北面发起进攻的传闻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreHav_00009376_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't want to stick around for any of the aftermath, so I got the hell out of town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想受到任何战争创伤，所以我就出了城。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreHav_00009376_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't say this place is any better, but at least I won't get shot for having some flaky skin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能说这里更好，但至少我不会因为皮肤薄而挨枪子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreHav_00009376_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, you buying something or what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，你要买东西还是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreHav_00009376_6.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 什么哈瓦苏？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doing the rounds, huh? I guess I can think up a task for you to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 四处转转，是吧？我猜我可以想出一个任务给你做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreQue_00009378_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm, you know what? My legs have started showing their age lately, so I could use your help with some fetching.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，你知道吗？我的腿最近开始显老了，所以我需要你帮我拿点东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreQue_00009378_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any experience in brewing alcohol?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有酿酒的经验吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreQue_00009378_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yuuko told me that you needed help with something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 优子跟我说你有事需要帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Haha! No, I didn't expect you to. Luckily you don't have to do much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈！不用，我没指望你会。幸运的是，你不需要做太多事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreQue_0000937A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All you have to do is collect ten of these Arizona Strong bottles, then fill them up by using the valve on the brewing stand outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要做的就是收集十瓶这种亚利桑那力量，然后用外面酿造台上的阀门把它们装满。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreQue_0000937A_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来很简单，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreQue_0000937A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't say that I've got any extensive experience in that field, no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不敢说我在这方面有丰富的经验。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just like the design, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是喜欢这个设计，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreWhy_0000937C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do I have to use the "Arizona Strong" bottles?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么我必须使用这种 "亚利桑那力量"的瓶子？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] The original Arizona Strong brewery was founded by my grandfather, way back before the war.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]最早的亚利桑那力量酿酒厂是我祖父在战前创立的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreAZS_0000937E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know it's a silly reason, but I'd like to at least keep the brand going, in a manner of speaking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道这是一个愚蠢的理由，但至少在某种程度上，我想让这个品牌继续活下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreAZS_0000937E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know that I'll never be able to truly replicate the true taste of a real Arizona Strong, but an old man can dream, can't he?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道我永远无法复制真正的亚利桑那力量的味道，但一个老人也可以有梦想，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreAZS_0000937E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you tell me the actual reason?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不告诉我真正的原因？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] No, I need them to be of the Arizona Strong brand. Okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]不行，我需要它们是亚利桑那力量牌。行吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreAZS_00009380_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't I just get any bottle?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就不能随便拿一瓶吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Off you go, kid. I'll give you some compensation for the trouble when you come back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去吧，孩子。你回来的时候，我会给你一些补偿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreQue_00009383_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I'll fill up ten bottles of Arizona Strong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我会灌满十瓶亚利桑那力量的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, don't let me keep ya. Or was there anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，别让我耽搁你。或者还有别的事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreNoN_00009385_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, friend. I promised you some compensation, so here's some caps. I'll throw in a free beer too while I'm at it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，朋友。我答应给你一些补偿，所以这里有一些瓶盖，顺便送你一杯免费啤酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreQue_00009387_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem RWCoreBeer 10 player.additem Caps001 100 player.additem RWBeer 1

ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ain't got much, but take a look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然不多，但你可以看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreOpe_00009392_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have anything for sale?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么卖的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's basically just a short way of saying my full name. It's a nickname that got attributed to me by my old army mates.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只是我全名的一种简短说法，是我的老战友给我起的绰号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreWhy_00009394_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The name Conrad Reynolds doesn't mean much to anyone anymore, so I thought "why not just go with my nickname".
ESP.TRADUIT: 康拉德·雷诺兹(Conrad Reynolds)这个名字对任何人来说都没什么意义了，所以我想“我为什么不干脆用我的昵称呢？”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreWhy_00009394_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么叫“科尔(Core)”？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I've heard. You've been a good friend to us around here, and I thank you for that. Here's your stuff back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说了。你一直是我们的好朋友，为此我感谢你，这是你的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: RWYuukoREF.RemoveItem RWEquipmentJailKey 1 if Player.GetItemCount RWEquipmentJailKey < 1 Player.AddItem RWEquipmentJailKey 1 endif RadWorldEquipmentJailREF.SetOwnership SetObjectiveCompleted rdwrldSecondQuest 30 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldSecondQuest 80 1
I've done all the chores your friends gave me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经做完了你的朋友们交给我的所有杂务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nigel Rosenwaltz, though I haven't introduced myself by my full name in a long while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奈杰尔·罗森瓦尔兹，虽然我很久没用全名介绍过自己了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelWh_00009B5B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just an old man, who in turn has become a very old ghoul.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是一个老人，现在又变成了一个非常老的食尸鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelWh_00009B5B_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well then kid, you better pull up a chair. You asked for the long one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么孩子你最好搬把椅子过来。你要的是长的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lived in Arizona all my life. Grew up back in Flagstaff. Had a nice, idyllic family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直住在亚利桑那州，在弗拉格斯塔夫(旗杆市)长大。有一个美好的，田园般的家庭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know the kind. Mom, pops a sister and two cars fitting nicely in the driveway of our two story house.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的，就是那种。妈妈、爸爸、妹妹和两辆很好地停放在我们两层楼房的车道上的汽车。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was pretty good at baseball in high school, if you could believe it. Won us the state championship of 2010!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能相信吗，我高中时棒球打得很好，为我们赢得了2010年的州冠军！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Went on to university in the same city. Northern Flagstaff University I think it was called. Or maybe it was Northern Arizona...
ESP.TRADUIT: 在同一个城市上了大学。我记得是叫北弗拉格斯塔夫大学，或者是北亚利桑那...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In any case, I graduated with a degree in mechanical engineering, and went on to work for a car factory in Phoenix.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我毕业于机械工程专业，之后在凤凰城的一家汽车厂工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that first job down at the car factory wasn't my favorite. Quite the opposite, it was awful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢在汽车厂的第一份工作。恰恰相反，它很糟糕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The boss was oppressive, the air conditioner would frequently break down, the pay wasn't all that great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老板很压迫，空调经常坏，工资也不怎么高。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, it did land me a contract within the military, which relocated me to Site Six out near Havasu.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，它确实让我得到了一份军方的合同，把我调到哈瓦苏附近的六号基地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Havasu, or Lake Havasu City, is where I bought my first house, and also where I found my wife, Helen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈瓦苏，又叫哈瓦苏湖城是我买第一套房子的地方，也是我遇到我的妻子海伦的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Helen and I had two sons, George and Edward. George was named after my father, and Edward was named after Helens grandfather.
ESP.TRADUIT: 海伦和我有两个儿子，乔治和爱德华。乔治是以我父亲的名字命名的，爱德华是以海伦祖父的名字命名的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I worked on designing artillery for the US military for almost 40 years in Havasu, but also did a lot of business trips to California and Nevada.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在哈瓦苏为美军做了将近40年的火炮设计工作，但也经常出差到加州和内华达州。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_12.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: During October 2077, I was out on a business trip in California. I can still remember the day like it's been burned into my eyelids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 2077年10月，我到加州出差。我仍记得那一天，仿佛它已经烙进了我的眼皮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_13.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was morning and I was on the highway on my way home. Then suddenly I felt a chill down my spine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是一个早晨，我在回家的高速公路上。突然我感到脊背一阵发凉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_14.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could barely react to the man on the radio reporting that the nukes had been fired before everything flashed white.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我几乎还没反应过来，收音机里的人报道说核弹已经发射了，然后一切都闪着白光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_15.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Luckily my car was able to absorb the majority of the blasts, but there wasn't much left of it afterwards. Hell, it's a miracle I survived.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸运的是，我的车能够吸收大部分的爆炸，但之后就没剩多少了。见鬼，我能活下来真是个奇迹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_16.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It wasn't until, from what I believe four days later, that I woke up in the wreck of my car, looking like I'd been burnt alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直到，在我认知中的四天后，我才在我的汽车残骸中醒来，看起来像是被活活烧死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_17.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I made my way on foot back to Arizona. My mind was blank, and even though the lack of water should've killed me, I kept going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我步行回到亚利桑那州。我的脑子一片空白，尽管缺水应该要了我的命，但我还是坚持了下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_18.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually I made my way back to Havasu, only to see charred remains of my family and neighbors on the side of the street.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终，我回到了哈瓦苏，却在路边看到了我的家人和邻居烧焦的尸体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_19.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was absolutely devastated. I had nothing left to live for, so I attempted suicide by ripping the fusion core out of our home generator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我彻底崩溃了，我已经没有活下去的理由了。所以我试图把我们家用发电机的核聚变核心扯出来自杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_20.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oddly enough, it didn't kill me. The radiation leak only made my hunger go away and my feet less sore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奇怪的是，它并没有杀死我。辐射泄漏只是让我的饥饿感消失了，我的脚也不那么酸痛了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_21.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I realized that if I had actually killed myself, my late father would've kicked my ass so hard that I could never climb back up to heaven.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我意识到，如果我真的自杀了，我已故的父亲会狠狠地揍我一顿，让我再也无法爬上天堂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_22.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I went on to look for other survivors among the fires and rubble. There weren't many but eventually we built a decently sized community.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我继续在大火和废墟中寻找其他幸存者。虽然数量不多，但最终我们创建了一个规模可观的社区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_23.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually the community reached a point where we could no longer sustain ourselves on pre-war food rations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后，这个社区到了我们不能再靠战前的配给口粮维持生活的地步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_24.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I took the task of seeking out other potential settlements around Arizona, to maybe establish trade relations or the like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的任务是在亚利桑那州周围寻找其他可能的定居点，也许是建立贸易关系之类的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_25.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then again, I guess retaining your sanity whilst being "ghoulified" like this is relatively rare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过话说回来，我想在像这样被 "尸鬼化"的情况下还能保持理智是比较罕见的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_26.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most people's reactions to ghouls was shoot first, questions never. Later on I would be imprisoned by a settelment just west of the old Phoenix.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数人对食尸鬼的反应都是先开枪，从不提问。后来，我被囚禁在老凤凰城以西的一个定居点里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_27.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They would experiment on me, try to "turn me human" again. Needless to say, they had no success.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们会在我身上做实验，试图把我“变回人类”。不用说，他们没有成功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_28.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When they scrapped the experiment, you'd think they would have the decency of releasing me, or at least putting me out of my misery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当他们放弃实验时，你会觉得他们应该体面地放了我，或者至少让我脱离苦海。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_29.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They didn't. They simply forgot about me. I spent 50 years in that cell, counting the scratches on the walls. It's a wonder I didn't go feral.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们没有，他们干脆把我忘了。我在那间牢房里待了50年，数着墙上的划痕，我没变成野性尸鬼真是个奇迹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_30.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know who else forgot about me? That's right, the town of Havasu.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道还有谁忘了我吗？没错，哈瓦苏城。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_31.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: By the time I escaped my cell, none of the settlers that had originally founded the post war settlement with me were there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我逃出牢房的时候，那些当初和我一起建立战后定居点的人都不在了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_32.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They didn't take kindly to ghouls either, so I was promptly asked to leave when asking around in town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们对食尸鬼也不客气，所以我在城里四处打听时，很快就被要求离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_33.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I met another ghoul on the outskirts of town by the name of Fernando. We decided to head east into the industrial area in the canyon nearby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在城郊遇到了另一个食尸鬼，名字叫费尔南多。我们决定向东走，进入附近峡谷中的工业区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_34.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The area was perfect for ghouls like us. Irradiated, so regular people wouldn't want to settle here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方对我们这种食尸鬼来说再合适不过了。受过辐射，所以普通人不会想在这里定居。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_35.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Out of the way, so there was no strategic reason for us to be invaded, and too bothersome to rob us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不挡道，所以没有战略上的理由入侵我们，而且抢劫我们也太麻烦了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_36.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So me, Fernando - who later took on the nickname Fidget, Johnny and a couple more ghouls helped build this here town on the side of a cliff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我，费尔南多，后来有了外号菲基特(Fidget)，强尼和其他几个食尸鬼帮忙在悬崖边建造了这个小镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_37.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was about 10 years ago now. I've cared for Fernando like he was my own son. He's recently left town due to a disagreement we had.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是大约10年前的事了。我把费尔南多当亲生儿子一样照顾，由于我们之间的分歧，他最近离开了小镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_38.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's about my whole life story. Lots of memories in this old ghouls noggin'.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我的整个人生故事，在这个古老的食尸鬼脑袋里的回忆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_39.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, stranger. I had a good time reminiscing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，陌生人。我回忆往事时很愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5D_40.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 给我讲个长点的版本。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did I end up here? Heh, do you want the long version or the short version?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么会在这里？呵呵，你想听长一点的版本还是短一点的版本？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_00009B5F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you end up here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么到这来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Understandable, not everyone has the patience to listen to an old man ramble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以理解，不是每个人都有耐心听一个老人闲扯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_0000A1CE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm an Arizona ghoul, born in Arizona over 200 years ago, and I'm still living here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是一个亚利桑那州的食尸鬼，200多年前出生在亚利桑那州，现在还住在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_0000A1CE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me and the other ghouls around here have been building the shantytown for the past 10 years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和这里的其他食尸鬼在过去十年里一直在建造棚户区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelHo_0000A1CE_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我简短的版本。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah yes, I do have something for you to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊对，我确实有些事需要你做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelQu_0000A1D0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A dear friend of mine recently left town. His nickname is Fidget, and I care for him like he's my own son.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最亲近的朋友最近离开了小镇。他的绰号叫菲基特(Fidget)，我把他当亲生儿子一样照顾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelQu_0000A1D0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now just like with all parents, I got worried about him and tried to give him some advice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，就像所有的父母一样，我开始担心他，并试图给他一些建议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelQu_0000A1D0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He didn't take that well, got angry at me and stormed out of town with his friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他对此不以为然，对我大发雷霆，和他的朋友一起冲出了小镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelQu_0000A1D0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you, a capable young adventurer, to go find him and tell him that I apologize. If possible, bring him back here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要你，一个年轻有为的冒险家，去找他，告诉他我很抱歉。如果可能的话，把他带回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelQu_0000A1D0_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yuuko told me to check if you have anything that needs doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 优子让我看看你有没有需要做的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm way too old and ragged to ever go out and brave the wastes anymore. I have things here in town to tend to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我太老了，精疲力竭了，再也不能出去勇敢地面对这片废土了。我在镇上还有事情要处理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelQu_0000A1D2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, have this key to the barricade gate on the other side of the river. Be careful though, there are traps along the ground by the gate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，拿着这把通过河对岸街垒大门的钥匙。不过要小心，大门旁边的地上有陷阱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelQu_0000A1D2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and have this pistol. You don't look too armed, and the wasteland is a dangerous place after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，还有这把手枪。你看起来没什么武器，废土毕竟是一个危险的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelQu_0000A1D2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now please go, and try to talk some sense into my dear boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在请你出发吧，试着跟我亲爱的孩子讲点道理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelQu_0000A1D2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: rdwrldNigelREF.removeitem RWBarricadeKey 1 rdwrldNigelREF.removeitem WeapNV9mmPistol 1 rdwrldNigelREF.removeitem Ammo9mm 40 player.additem RWBarricadeKey 1 player.additemhealthpercent WeapNV9mmPistol 1 0.50 player.additem Ammo9mm 40 SetStage rdwrldNigelQuest01 5
Why don't you go after him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不去追他？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I see. That's a shame. If you'd excuse me for a moment, I'd like some time for myself. Thank you though, stranger. For bringing me the news.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我明白了。这太可惜了，恕我失陪一下，我想自己静一静。谢谢你，陌生人，谢谢你告诉我这个消息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelFi_0000A1D4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found Fidget, but unfortunately he was already dead when I found him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了菲基特，但不幸的是，我发现他的时候他已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything I need doing, huh? Nothing really comes to mind, it's all quiet down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要做的事？什么也想不起来，这里很安静。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyQ_0000A1D7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, actually! You could go up to Core's bar and pick up a package for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，实际上！你可以去科尔的酒吧帮我拿个包裹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyQ_0000A1D7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yuuko told me to check in on you, see if you had anything that needed doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 优子让我来看看你，看你有没有什么事要做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks, stranger. Wait, what's this? This isn't the package I wanted. This packaging is what Core uses for Nigels packages!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，陌生人。等等，这是什么？这不是我要的包裹。这个是科尔给奈杰尔的包裹用的包装！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyP_0000A1D9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe there's been a mix up. Take this package to Nigel and see if he has my package.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能是搞混淆了。把这个包裹交给奈杰尔，看看他那里有没有我的包裹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyP_0000A1D9_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的包裹，强尼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sure it's the right package? It's very important that it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定是正确的包裹吗？这很重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyP_0000A1DB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, this seems like the correct one now that I give it a closer inspection.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我仔细检查了一下，这好像是正确的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyP_0000A1DB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, friend. And sorry about the confusion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，朋友。很抱歉造成了混乱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyP_0000A1DB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm back, and this was your package all along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我回来了，这是你一直以来的包裹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My lunch. I'm a vegetarian, you see. I don't want any meat packaged in my lunch, but Core isn't the most attentive cook.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的午餐。你瞧，我是个素食主义者，我不希望我的午餐里有任何肉类，但科尔并不是一个最细心的厨师。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyP_0000A1DD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We came up with the system of having different markings on our packages, to easier see who's lunch is who's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们想出了一套体系，在我们的包裹上有不同的标记，以便更容易看出谁的午餐是谁的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyP_0000A1DD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But then again, Core never was the most attentive cook.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但还是那句话，科尔并不是一个最细心的厨师。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyP_0000A1DD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or maybe he's doing it on purpose, to mock me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许他是故意的，是为了嘲笑我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyP_0000A1DD_4.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 包裹里到底有什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, sure. Here you go. One fresh package for Johnny.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，当然。给你，给强尼的新包裹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreJoh_0000A1DF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Johnny told me that you had a package for him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 强尼告诉我你有个包裹是给他的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is for me, you say? True, it does look like the marking Core uses for my packages, but this isn't mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说这是给我的？对，它看起来确实像科尔在我的包裹上面使用的标记，但这不是我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelJo_0000A1E2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should try Yuuko, she knows where stuff goes around here. She'll be able to help you out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该试试优子，她知道这里的东西都放哪儿。她会帮助你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelJo_0000A1E2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Johnny said that this package has your marking on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 强尼说这个包裹上有你的标记。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Haha, you've been dragged all around town with this package, huh! Sorry to say, but this isn't mine. It's actually Johnny's package.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈，你带着这个包裹被拖着满城跑！很抱歉，这不是我的，其实就是强尼的包裹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoJo_0000A1E4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Johnny said that this package from Core has Nigel's markings, but Nigel says that it's not his.
ESP.TRADUIT: 强尼说这个科尔的这个包裹上有奈杰尔的标记，但奈杰尔说不是他的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice work! And as I promised, you can have your gear back. You're welcome to hang around, but I reckon you want to get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好！我保证过，你可以拿回你的装备。欢迎你留下来，但我猜你想离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoAl_0000A1E6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: RWYuukoREF.RemoveItem RWEquipmentJailKey 1 if Player.GetItemCount RWEquipmentJailKey < 1 Player.AddItem RWEquipmentJailKey 1 endif RadWorldEquipmentJailREF.SetOwnership SetObjectiveCompleted rdwrldSecondQuest 30 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldSecondQuest 80 1
I've finished all of the tasks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经完成了所有的任务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's Clubber. I used to be a brewer at the brewery across the street.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫克劳伯，我以前在街对面的啤酒厂当酿酒师。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clubber [0600A307] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldBeerBre_0000A30B_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. We used to be an entire crew of brewers running that place. Shit happens though. Some of them died, the rest left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，我们曾经是一整个酿酒师团队在管理那个地方。不过，糟糕的事情发生了，一些人死了，其余的人离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clubber [0600A307] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldBeerBre_0000A30D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the only one who stayed behind. This used to be our dormitory. It was pretty cozy, but I shouldn't dwell on what's gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是唯一留下来的人。这里曾经是我们的宿舍，很舒适，但我不应该念念不忘过去的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clubber [0600A307] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldBeerBre_0000A30D_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 以前是酿酒师？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nope, I'm all good. Thanks for asking though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用，我都很好。不过谢谢你的关心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clubber [0600A307] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldBeerBre_0000A30F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem to be a nice person. Here, have a beer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来是个好人。来，喝杯啤酒吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clubber [0600A307] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldBeerBre_0000A30F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you need help with anything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh that note? Some guy came by a few years back to stay the night. Kept rambling on about treasure and loot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦那个纸条？几年前有个人来过我家过夜，喋喋不休地说着什么财宝和战利品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clubber [0600A307] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldBeerBre_0000A31E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think he said he was going back to that vault, down in the valley to the east.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想他说他要回那个避难所去，在东边的山谷里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clubber [0600A307] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldBeerBre_0000A31E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He never came back though, so be careful if you're going after that vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他一直没回来，所以如果你要去找那个避难所的话，得小心点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clubber [0600A307] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldBeerBre_0000A31E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you know about this note? <Show 'Distressed Scribbles' note>
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于这张纸条你知道些什么？<出示磨损的潦草涂鸦>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's Patrick. I was out scavenging when I happened upon this cave, but I got ambushed by the critters in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫帕特里克。我在外面拾荒时偶然发现了这个山洞，但我被里面的生物伏击了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrick [0600B153] (mod) Quest : ([0600B155]RadWorldPatrickDialogue) 0600B155 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDizzyVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPatrick_0000B159_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They wounded me pretty badly, I can't move anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们把我伤得很重，我已经不能动弹了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrick [0600B153] (mod) Quest : ([0600B155]RadWorldPatrickDialogue) 0600B155 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDizzyVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPatrick_0000B159_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say what now? Help? Unfortunately, I don't think a stimpak or two would fix this mess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在怎么办？帮助？不幸的是，我不认为一两个治疗针能解决这个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrick [0600B153] (mod) Quest : ([0600B155]RadWorldPatrickDialogue) 0600B155 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDizzyVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPatrick_0000B15D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's pretty much over for me already. But if you wouldn't mind, I dropped my pack when I got ambushed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我来说已经差不多结束了。但如果你不介意的话，我被伏击的时候把背包丢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrick [0600B153] (mod) Quest : ([0600B155]RadWorldPatrickDialogue) 0600B155 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDizzyVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPatrick_0000B15D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's got a memento in it that I'm fond of. If you want to fulfill a dying man's last wish, please get it back to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 里面有我最喜欢的纪念品。如果你想实现一个垂死之人的临终愿望，请把它还给我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrick [0600B153] (mod) Quest : ([0600B155]RadWorldPatrickDialogue) 0600B155 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDizzyVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPatrick_0000B15D_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, then get out of here. Just let me die in peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那就离开这里，让我安静地死去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrick [0600B153] (mod) Quest : ([0600B155]RadWorldPatrickDialogue) 0600B155 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDizzyVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPatrick_0000B160_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't feel like scouring the cave for some memento.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不想在山洞里找什么纪念品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, thank you! I'll probably not live for long, but at least I'll have my dear with me when I pass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，谢谢你！我可能活不长了，但至少我死的时候，有我的最爱在身边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrick [0600B153] (mod) Quest : ([0600B155]RadWorldPatrickDialogue) 0600B155 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDizzyVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPatrick_0000B161_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我可以。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I came in from the other side of that door to the left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从左边那扇门的另一侧进来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrick [0600B153] (mod) Quest : ([0600B155]RadWorldPatrickDialogue) 0600B155 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDizzyVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPatrick_0000B163_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It has a button to activate it from the other side, but it automatically closes and the button on this side is busted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它有一个按钮可以从另一边启动，但它会自动关闭，这边的按钮失灵了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrick [0600B153] (mod) Quest : ([0600B155]RadWorldPatrickDialogue) 0600B155 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDizzyVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPatrick_0000B163_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么到这里的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, that's the one! Thank you so much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，就是这个！非常感谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrick [0600B153] (mod) Quest : ([0600B155]RadWorldPatrickDialogue) 0600B155 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDizzyVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPatrick_0000B165_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, can you grant me one more wish? Kill me. I don't want to sit here and waste away, so can you put me out of my misery?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能再满足我一个愿望吗？杀了我吧，我不想坐在这里虚度光阴，所以你能帮我从痛苦中解脱出来吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrick [0600B153] (mod) Quest : ([0600B155]RadWorldPatrickDialogue) 0600B155 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDizzyVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPatrick_0000B165_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I picked something up in the cave earlier. Is this the memento?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我之前在山洞里捡到了点东西，这是那个纪念品吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you so much! That's the memento I dropped!
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常感谢！这就是我丢失的纪念品！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrick [0600B153] (mod) Quest : ([0600B155]RadWorldPatrickDialogue) 0600B155 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDizzyVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPatrick_0000B169_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, can you grant me one more wish? Kill me. I don't want to sit here and waste away, so can you put me out of my misery?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能再满足我一个愿望吗？杀了我吧，我不想坐在这里虚度光阴，所以你能帮我从痛苦中解脱出来吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrick [0600B153] (mod) Quest : ([0600B155]RadWorldPatrickDialogue) 0600B155 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDizzyVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPatrick_0000B169_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了你的纪念品。
再次感谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrick [0600B153] (mod) Quest : ([0600B155]RadWorldPatrickDialogue) 0600B155 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDizzyVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPatrick_0000B16B_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会结束你的生命。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. Well, I don't blame ya. Killing someone is hard, sorry for asking too much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了，嗯，我不怪你。杀人不简单，对不起我的要求太过了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrick [0600B153] (mod) Quest : ([0600B155]RadWorldPatrickDialogue) 0600B155 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDizzyVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPatrick_0000B16F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I will not kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不会杀你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I-I just thought up of a nickname that sounded cool because I don't like my real name, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我只是想了个听起来很酷的绰号，因为我不喜欢我的真名，行吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mess Hall Cook [0603D779] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWUmiVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRCook_0000C409_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everyone else thought it was so hilarious and wouldn't stop teasing me about it... It's whatever now though, most of them are nice people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他人都觉得这太搞笑了，不停地嘲笑我...不管怎样，他们大多数人都是好人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mess Hall Cook [0603D779] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWUmiVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRCook_0000C409_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: "血雨 "是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's Rose. A nice flowery name that's fit for a little girl, not a soldier. Could we drop this topic already?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是玫瑰，这个漂亮的花名适合小女孩，而不是一个士兵。我们能不能别谈这个话题了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mess Hall Cook [0603D779] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWUmiVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRCook_0000C410_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 那你的真名是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Jimmy. Owner of the small ranch here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是杰米，这个小牧场的主人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [0600CD32] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldJimmyWh_0000CD38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We raise brahmin to sell to Havasu down the hill. We also grow a few crops lately, attempting to be self-sufficient.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们养婆罗门卖给山下的哈瓦苏城。我们最近也种了一些作物，试图自给自足。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [0600CD32] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldJimmyWh_0000CD38_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That "mutant" is my dear wife, Gwenda. And I won't have you badmouthing her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个"变种人"是我亲爱的妻子，格温达。我不允许你说她的坏话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [0600CD32] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldJimmyWh_0000CD3D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've been together for near half a century, and I couldn't bear parting with her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在一起快半个世纪了，我无法忍受和她分开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [0600CD32] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldJimmyWh_0000CD3D_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 那个变种人是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well you see, the town down the hill doesn't really take kindly to our kind. They tolerate our business, albeit with their hand on their holsters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯你知道，山下的城镇对我们这种人不太友好。他们容忍我们的生意，虽然他们的手还放在枪套上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [0600CD32] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldJimmySe_0000CD3F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I also suspect that they rack up the prices for us, making us pay extra for the brahmin feed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还怀疑他们抬高了我们的价格，让我们为婆罗门饲料支付额外的费用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [0600CD32] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldJimmySe_0000CD3F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you want to be self-sufficient?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么想要自给自足？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually yes, there is something you can do. We've been plagued with these giant ants lately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上需要，你可以做一些事情。我最近一直被这些巨型蚂蚁所困扰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [0600CD32] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldJimmyNe_0000CD41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suspect that they have set up a nest in the old tunnel nearby. Probably due to the tunnel not being used anymore for travel into the canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怀疑它们已经在附近的旧隧道里筑巢了，很可能是因为隧道不再被用来出入峡谷了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [0600CD32] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldJimmyNe_0000CD41_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or maybe the ants are why the tunnel isn't used in the first place...
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者说蚂蚁可能才是隧道不被使用的原因...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [0600CD32] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldJimmyNe_0000CD41_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, their nest has gotten too big and they are harassing our livestock. It's a dirty job, but if you do that for me, I'll pay you good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，它们的巢穴太大了，还在骚扰我们的家畜。这是一份肮脏的工作，但如果你替我做了，我会给你丰厚的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [0600CD32] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldJimmyNe_0000CD41_4.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! Once you've cleared out the ants, plant this bomb in the heart of the nest so we know that we're done with them for good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了！如果你已经清除了蚂蚁，就把这个炸弹放在巢穴的中心，这样我们就知道我们永远不会再和它们打交道了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [0600CD32] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldJimmyQu_0000CD43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've already armed the bomb, so when you've placed the bomb in the nest, go push the detonator on the second floor of my barn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经把炸弹配置好了，所以当你把炸弹安装在巢穴之后，去按我谷仓二楼的引爆器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [0600CD32] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldJimmyQu_0000CD43_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, but the pay better be worth it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，但报酬最好值得。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, that's too bad. Not many travellers, even less mercenaries come up here. If that nest gets bigger, we might be forced to flee the ranch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那太糟了。来这里的旅行者不多，雇佣兵更少，如果巢穴继续变大，我们可能会被迫逃离牧场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [0600CD32] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldJimmyQu_0000CD45_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 还有别的事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [0600CD32] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldJimmyQu_0000CD45_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I don't feel up for clearing the nest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我不想清理巢穴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, stranger. You've saved our farm. Here's your payment, as we agreed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，陌生人，你拯救了我们的农场。这是你的报酬，我们说好了的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [0600CD32] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldJimmyQu_0000CD47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't mind, I've got another task for you, if you have the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不介意的话，我还有一项任务要给你，如果你有时间的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [0600CD32] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldJimmyQu_0000CD47_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've blown up the ant nest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把蚁巢炸了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bad news. The Legion seems to have mustered up their forces and are preparing for an assault at the edge of town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坏消息。军团似乎已经集结了他们的部队，准备从城镇的边缘发起攻击。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [0600D95E] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBanana\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAssa_0000D962_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to repel them before they get to harm any of the townsfolk. Come on, let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得赶在他们伤害到市民之前把他们击退。来吧，我们走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [0600D95E] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBanana\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAssa_0000D962_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great job, kid. If that won't convince The Mayor that we're worth having around, I don't know what will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好，孩子。如果这都不能让市长相信我们值得相处，我不知道还有什么能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_0000D97A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for your help in all this. I hope you'll continue to help the NCR even after all this is done. Here, have this for the trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢你的帮助，即使这一切都结束了，希望你也能继续帮助NCR。给，麻烦你拿着这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Ambassador Redford [06050755] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRAmba_0000D97A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I managed to fight off the assault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我设法击退了袭击。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Havasu Militia [06011A47] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind. You don't seem to be of any help here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别介意，你在这里似乎也帮不上什么忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody... I mean nobody you need to know of... I mean who's asking? Are you with the Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 小人物...我是说你不需要知道的人...我的意思是谁会问这个？你是军团的人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lionel [0600FCCE] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTeddyVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLionelW_0000FCD9_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm hiding. There are some bad men after me, and I would rather not have them find me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我躲起来了。有一些坏人在追杀我，我不想让他们找到我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lionel [0600FCCE] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTeddyVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLionelW_0000FCE2_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你来这儿做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh good. Real good. You're just who I need. My name's Lionel. I'm on the run from the Legion for, uh... reasons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢很好，真的很好，你正是我需要的人。我的名字叫莱昂奈尔。我在逃避军团的追捕，因为...原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lionel [0600FCCE] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTeddyVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLionelN_0000FCDA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I really could use some help from someone like you. I need to get out of here, fast. But unfortunately I don't know anyone around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我真的需要你这样的人来帮我，我要离开这里，尽快。但不幸的是，我在这附近不认识任何人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lionel [0600FCCE] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTeddyVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLionelN_0000FCDA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could you lead me to Havasu and find a way for me to escape?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能带我去哈瓦苏找条路逃跑吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lionel [0600FCCE] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTeddyVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLionelN_0000FCDA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm not with the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不是军团的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh good. Real good. You're just who I need. My name's Lionel. I'm on the run from the Legion for, uh... reasons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢很好，真的很好，你正是我需要的人。我的名字叫莱昂奈尔。我在逃避军团的追捕，因为...原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lionel [0600FCCE] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTeddyVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLionelN_0000FCE7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I really could use some help from someone like you. I need to get out of here, fast. But unfortunately I don't know anyone around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我真的需要你这样的人来帮我，我要离开这里，尽快。但不幸的是，我在这附近不认识任何人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lionel [0600FCCE] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTeddyVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLionelN_0000FCE7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could you lead me to Havasu and find a way for me to escape?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能带我去哈瓦苏找条路逃跑吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lionel [0600FCCE] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTeddyVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLionelN_0000FCE7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> No, I'm not with the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>不，我不是军团的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, I'll gather my thoughts and leave in a bit. You've saved my life. Maybe I'll get to repay the favor some day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，我整理好思绪，马上就走。你救了我的命，总有一天我会报答你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lionel [0600FCCE] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTeddyVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLionelQ_00012E8D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've bought the boat for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你买了条船。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell man? This is the camp I was hiding from! I'd rather die than go back in there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞什么鬼，伙计？这就是我在躲的营地！我宁愿死也不回去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lionel [0600FCCE] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTeddyVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLionelS_0000FCE1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't thank you enough! Tell me when it's clear and we can get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真是感激不尽！安全了告诉我，我们就可以出发了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lionel [0600FCCE] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTeddyVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLionelQ_0000FCDE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I can lead you to town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我可以带你进城。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I see. That's fine, I don't think they know I'm here. I can try to sneak out on my own when they don't expect it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我明白了。没关系，我想他们不知道我在这里，我可以趁他们不注意的时候自己偷偷溜出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lionel [0600FCCE] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTeddyVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLionelQ_0000FCDF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nope, I don't want to do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不想这么做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, let's go. I believe there's a place that sells boats on the outskirts of town. That would be the fastest way out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我们走。我想在城郊有个卖船的地方，那是离开这里最快的方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lionel [0600FCCE] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTeddyVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLionelQ_0000FCE0_1.ogg
