ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get out of here, follow me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们走吧，跟我来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You found Lionel? That man was once a promising recruit, but turned tail after his first raid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你找到了莱昂奈尔？那家伙曾经是个很有前途的新兵，但在第一次突袭后就逃跑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0000FCE6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The worm needs to learn what happens to spineless cowards. I commend you for finding him, you'll see the reward of your actions soon enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 蠕虫需要知道没有骨气的懦夫会怎么样。赞美你找到了他，你很快就能看到你行动的回报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0000FCE6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found a guy called Lionel hiding in a cave by the river.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现一个叫莱昂奈尔的人躲在河边的一个山洞里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My goodness, where did you find this? Oh, oh! I see. So that's how they did it! Thank you, friend! I-I don't know how to repay you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的天哪，你在哪儿找到这个的？哦，噢！我明白了。原来他们就是这么做的！谢谢你，朋友！我不知道该怎么报答你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Core [060176AB] (mod) Quest : ([0600936F]RadWorldCoreDialogue) 0600936F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldCo_RadWorldCoreAZS_00010542_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found this recipe for Arizona Strong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了亚利桑那力量的配方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing! Here's what I've got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题！这是我有的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Regina Cabrera [06010545] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWLinnnnnVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldReginaC_0001054C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me see what you've got for sale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看你有什么卖的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's Regina. I've been running this place since my father kicked the bucket, and he ran it since grandpa died.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫瑞金娜。我父亲去世后我就一直在经营这个地方，爷爷去世后一直是他在经营。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Regina Cabrera [06010545] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWLinnnnnVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldReginaC_0001054F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You get where this is going, it's a family business that's been run for generations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道这是怎么回事，这是一个世代经营的家族企业。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Regina Cabrera [06010545] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWLinnnnnVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldReginaC_0001054F_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not really. Shop's going well and nothing's troubling me. Unless you wanna wash the dishes, I've got nothing for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，并没有。生意很好，没什么事困扰我，除非你想洗碗，我没什么别的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Regina Cabrera [06010545] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWLinnnnnVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldReginaC_00010550_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any work that needs doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么工作需要做吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got fresh produce and various knick-knacks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有新鲜的农产品和各种各样的小装饰物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cory the Co-Op Owner [06010554] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJoeschmoVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldCoOpOpe_0001055B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you have for sale?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这卖些什么呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just a lucky ol' feller handling the Co-Op here. Trading's been my way of life for over 50 years. Oh, and name's Cory, by the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是一个幸运的老家伙，在这里经营合作公寓的事务。50多年来，做生意一直是我的生活方式。哦，顺便说一下，我叫科里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cory the Co-Op Owner [06010554] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJoeschmoVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldCoOpWho_0001055E_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nope, nothing for you here. You might wanna check out the notice board that Tom's got in his gun shop. People post notices there all the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有，这里没有适合你的。你可能会想看看汤姆枪支商店里的告示板，人们一直在那里张贴公告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cory the Co-Op Owner [06010554] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJoeschmoVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldCoOpNee_0001055F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any work that needs doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么工作需要做吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try the terminal on her desk. Her account should still be there. She never told me her password though, so I don't know what's on there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试试她桌上的终端，她的账户应该还在。但她没告诉我密码，所以我不知道里面有什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00011226_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You could also try her apartment. She used to live in the blue building, across from the gun shop. I believe her apartment number was 10.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也可以去她家看看。她以前住在枪械店对面蓝色的大楼里，我记得她的公寓号码是10号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00011226_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where can I find info about the nurse?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在哪里能找到关于护士的信息？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm with the Havasu Militia. We keep the town safe from anyone that wants to cause us trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是哈瓦苏民兵。我们保护城镇的安全，不让任何人给我们带来麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Havasu Militia [06011A47] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBanana\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMilitia_00011A4C_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh yeah? What kind of crime?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是吗？什么样的犯罪？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Havasu Militia [06011A47] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBanana\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMilitia_00011A4E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to report a crime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想举报犯罪。
别浪费我的时间，白痴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Havasu Militia [06011A47] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBanana\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMilitia_00011A50_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 算了吧，没有犯罪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The doc? The guy's always been a bit sketchy, but he's the only doctor we have in town. Do you have any proof of these accusations?
ESP.TRADUIT: 医生吗？这家伙一向不太老实，但他是我们镇上唯一的医生。你有这些指控的证据吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Havasu Militia [06011A47] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBanana\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMilitia_00011A51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr Mendez abused his nurse and has been trafficking drugs from his clinic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 门德斯医生虐待他的护士，并一直在他的诊所走私毒品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell, if the things in here are true, then he's a worse guy than I thought.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这他妈的，如果这里说的都是真的，那他比我想的还坏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Havasu Militia [06011A47] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBanana\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMilitia_00011A53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what, we'll bring a couple guys over and take him in. Thanks for bringing this to us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样吧，我们带几个人过来把他抓起来。谢谢你把这个带给我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Havasu Militia [06011A47] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBanana\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMilitia_00011A53_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found this diary in the nurse's abandoned apartment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在护士的废弃公寓里找到了这本日记。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's about what I expected from that cockroach. You've done well, mercenary. You're free to take your share of the spoils from town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这和我对那只蟑螂的期望差不多。你干得不错，雇佣兵，你可以随意从城里拿走你的战利品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_00012070_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll also personally reward you with my gratitude. Here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也会亲自向你表示感谢，给。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_00012070_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The mayor wouldn't cooperate. We sacked the town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 市长不肯合作，我们洗劫了那个城镇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You made him squeal without any bloodshed? I would've chopped his head off months ago. Though I suppose you do deserve a reward. Here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没有流血就让他尖叫了？几个月前我就该把他的头砍下来。不过我想你确实应该得到奖励，给。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_00012071_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have solved the situation without killing the townsfolk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在没有杀死市民的情况下解决了问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's Falmont. I'm the quartermaster around this camp. Keep the armory locked up tight for the most part.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫福尔蒙特，是这个营地的军需官。大部分时间都把军械库锁得严严实实的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster Falmont [0603BF63] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWFoxVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRFalm_00012282_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Work? I'm no notice board, buddy. I'm just stationed here to do my job. If you really want to help, bring me a bottle of whiskey or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 工作？我不是布告栏，哥们，我只是在这里做我的工作。如果你真的想帮忙，给我带瓶威士忌什么的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster Falmont [0603BF63] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWFoxVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRFalm_00012286_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么工作吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No can do, buddy. I only open this door on the direct order of my superior officer, and I haven't seen you around here before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不行，哥们。我只有在上级命令下才能打开这扇门，我以前没在这儿见过你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster Falmont [0603BF63] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWFoxVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRFalm_00012288_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you let me inside the armory?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能让我进入军械库吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh, thanks. Just don't go telling anyone that I asked for this. I'm not supposed to drink when I'm on duty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵呵，谢谢。别告诉任何人这是我要求的，我值班的时候不该喝酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster Falmont [0603BF63] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWFoxVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRFalm_0001228A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's something from me, as thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我送你的，作为感谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster Falmont [0603BF63] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWFoxVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRFalm_0001228A_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一瓶威士忌。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the cook of this canteen. Was a soldier before, but got injured so now I'm on permanent cook duty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是这个食堂的厨师。以前是一名士兵，但受伤了，所以现在我长期担任厨师的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mess Hall Cook [0603D779] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWUmiVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRCook_0001228E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might hear some of the others call me something silly like Blood Rain, but don't mind any of that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能会听到其他一些人叫我“血雨”之类的蠢话，但不要在意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mess Hall Cook [0603D779] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWUmiVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRCook_0001228E_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not really. I just make food, I can handle it just fine on my own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用。我只是做食物，我自己可以处理的很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mess Hall Cook [0603D779] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWUmiVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRCook_00012290_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, actually, could you try to find me some coolant for the freezers? I've issued for a resupply for months but they never deliver.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，实际上，你能不能试着给我找一些冰柜的冷却剂？我已经申请了几个月的补给，但他们从来没有提供。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mess Hall Cook [0603D779] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWUmiVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRCook_00012290_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 60 units of coolant should last me for a good while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 60单位的冷却剂应该够我用一段时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mess Hall Cook [0603D779] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWUmiVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRCook_00012290_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not really. I just make food, I can handle it just fine on my own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用。我只是做食物，我自己可以处理的很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mess Hall Cook [0603D779] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWUmiVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRCook_00015984_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the head clown around here. What the fuck does it look like?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是这里的头号蠢货，他妈的看起来像什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Medic Ryans [0601227F] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPhannVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMedi_00012292_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kid, if you want work, go to a damn unemployment office. This is a military outpost where you don't belong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 孩子，如果你想找工作，就去该死的失业救济署。这是个军事前哨，不属于你的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Medic Ryans [0601227F] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPhannVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMedi_00012296_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any work that needs doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么工作需要做吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would if I fucking had any. Bastards around the camp have ransacked my supplies time and time again. Shitheads, the bunch of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我他妈的有的话，我会的。营地周围的杂种们一次又一次地洗劫了我的物资，他们这帮人都是蠢货。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Medic Ryans [0601227F] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPhannVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMedi_00012298_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take a chill pill man, why are you so aggressive?
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静点，伙计，你为什么这么咄咄逼人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nah, that's above my pay grade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，那超出了我的职责范围。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Medic Ryans [0601227F] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPhannVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMedi_0001229A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have enough supplies hidden away to deal with some actual trauma, but I'll probably never have to, given where we're posted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我藏有足够的物资来处理一些真正的创伤，但考虑到我们所处的位置，我可能永远不会有这种需要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Medic Ryans [0601227F] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPhannVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMedi_0001229A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Want help with those stolen supplies?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要帮忙处理那些被偷的物资吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We set up here about two years ago. This outpost is where they send the worst recruits in the army.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们大约两年前在这里成立，军队里最差劲的新兵都会被送到这个前哨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Medic Ryans [0601227F] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPhannVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMedi_0001229C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Little to no action, and far enough out of the way that we won't bother anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几乎没有任何行动，而且离得足够远，我们不会打扰到任何人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Medic Ryans [0601227F] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPhannVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMedi_0001229C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How long have you been here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里待了多长时间？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget it, I'm not about to waste my supplies on some civilian who wandered into the camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 休想，我可不想把我的物资浪费在一个混进营地的平民身上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Medic Ryans [0601227F] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPhannVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMedi_0001229E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try the doctor in town, maybe he'll fix you up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试试城里的医生，也许他能治好你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Medic Ryans [0601227F] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPhannVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRMedi_0001229E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm hurt. I need help, Doc.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我受伤了。医生，我需要帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Halt, civilian. This is an NCR Military outpost. Only authorized personnel are allowed entry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 站住，平民。这是NCR的军事前哨，只有经过授权的人员才能进入。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [060122A3] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBanana\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRCamp_000122A6_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]很好，继续通过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [060122A3] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBanana\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRCamp_000122B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> I'm a member of the NCR. Let me pass.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>我是NCR成员，让我过去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I don't think so, buddy. Turn back before I get angry.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]我不这么认为，伙计。在我生气之前回去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [060122A3] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBanana\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRCamp_000122B1_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>我呃，也是个士兵。
很好，继续通过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [060122A3] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBanana\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRCamp_000122AF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] I am a known member of the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR]我是NCR的知名成员。
哦，现在你完了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [060122A3] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBanana\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRCamp_000122AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> I'll go where I please, and you're in my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>我想去哪里就去哪里，而你挡了我的路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I see. Well, head on through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我明白了。好吧，往前走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [060122A3] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBanana\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRCamp_000122B2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got special permission from the Ambassador to enter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得到了大使的特别出入许可。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on boys, let's put this pest in the dirt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，弟兄们，让我们把这个害虫埋进土里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deserting Trooper [0600253E] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBriggsVT\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRDese_000122D9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then there's no choice but the hard way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就别无他法，只能来硬的了。
你...你别想活捉我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lionel [0600FCCE] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTeddyVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLionelY_000126CE_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我是军团的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, this should be far enough. However, I think these guys recognize my face, so you better buy the boat for me. Here, this should be enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，这应该够远了。不过我觉得他们认得我的脸，所以你最好帮我买艘船。给，这些应该够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lionel [0600FCCE] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTeddyVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLionelQ_00012E8C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: RWLionelREF.RemoveScriptPackage RWLionelFollowPlayerPackage SetStage rdwrldLegionRunaway 20 Player.additem Caps001 1000
Sure thing. A thousand caps and you've got yourself a boat, no questions asked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题。一千瓶盖，你就有一艘船了，不问任何问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry the Boat Salesman [06034333] (mod) Quest : ([06034336]RadWorldBoatSalesmanDialogue) 06034336 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWLastonVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldBoatSal_00012E8F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to buy a boat for my friend over there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想给那边的朋友买条船。
谢谢你的生意，*嗝*朋友！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry the Boat Salesman [06034333] (mod) Quest : ([06034336]RadWorldBoatSalesmanDialogue) 06034336 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWLastonVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldBoatSal_00012E92_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: <1000瓶盖>好的，给你钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then come back when you do! I'll be *hic* here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有钱了再回来！我就在*嗝*这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry the Boat Salesman [06034333] (mod) Quest : ([06034336]RadWorldBoatSalesmanDialogue) 06034336 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWLastonVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldBoatSal_00012E94_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我买不起这条船。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bah! Then piss off, yeah? I can't make money with chatter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呸！那就滚开，好吗？我不靠闲聊赚钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry the Boat Salesman [06034333] (mod) Quest : ([06034336]RadWorldBoatSalesmanDialogue) 06034336 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWLastonVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldBoatSal_00012E93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, I'll pass for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想了想，现在还是算了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was a recruit in the legion's forces. It was either that or being enslaved, so I chose the option that seemed best for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是军团的一名新兵。要么这样，要么被奴役，所以我做了对我来说最好的决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lionel [0600FCCE] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTeddyVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLionelW_00012EA1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I tried my best to fit in, but I was horrified as to what they did when we went on a skirmish. I couldn't believe that they're actually human.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尽我最大的努力去融入他们，但当我们发生小规模战斗时，他们所做的事情让我感到震惊。我无法相信他们居然是人类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lionel [0600FCCE] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTeddyVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLionelW_00012EA1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, they're not human. They're monsters, nothing more. I fled the first chance I got, but their influence is bigger than I thought.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，他们不是人类，他们是怪物，而已。我一有机会就逃走了，但他们的势力比我想象中要大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lionel [0600FCCE] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTeddyVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLionelW_00012EA1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you running from the Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要逃离军团？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not supposed to be here! I'm calling the guards!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不应该在这里！我要叫警卫了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bank Teller [06014E46] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWVivivaciousVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldBankTel_00013104_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You awake back there? We put your stuff in a box behind you. The flight's only gonna take about half an hour so don抰 get too comfortable back there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你醒了？我们把你的东西放在你身后的箱子里了。飞机只需要半个小时，所以不要在后面太舒服了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rally Plane Voice Activator [060138C9] (mod) Quest : ([060191F2]RadWorldRallyDialogue) 060191F2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryMartinVT\RadWorldRa_RadWorldRallyPl_000138C5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We抮e above Arizona right now, we抣l land shortly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们现在在亚利桑那州上空，很快就会降落。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rally Plane Voice Activator [060138C9] (mod) Quest : ([060191F2]RadWorldRallyDialogue) 060191F2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryMartinVT\RadWorldRa_RadWorldRallyPl_000138C6_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 停下，堕落者。说正事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veteran Decanus [060140B0] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWMullerVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionE_000138B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait what抯 that? Oh, shit! Damn it, we抮e hit! Who the hell is firing at us?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，那是什么？噢，该死！见鬼，我们被击中了！谁在向我们开火？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rally Plane Voice Activator [060138C9] (mod) Quest : ([060191F2]RadWorldRallyDialogue) 060191F2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryMartinVT\RadWorldRa_RadWorldRallyPl_000138C7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh no no no, we抮e going down. Brace yourself!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢不不不，我们正在坠落，做好准备！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rally Plane Voice Activator [060138C9] (mod) Quest : ([060191F2]RadWorldRallyDialogue) 060191F2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryMartinVT\RadWorldRa_RadWorldRallyPl_000138C8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're really gone? I can't believe it, so is it safe for me to go out there? Well then, I better get going. Thanks, buddy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们真的没了？真不敢相信，我到外面去安全吗？那好吧，我得走了，谢谢你，哥们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lionel [0600FCCE] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTeddyVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLionelA_000144D0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, I've already cleared out the nearby Legion camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，我已经清空了附近的军团营地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tssk, well I'll be keeping my eyes on you. Don't try anything. That's if you want to keep your head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗤，我会一直盯着你的。不要尝试任何事，如果你还想保住脑袋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veteran Decanus [060140B0] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWMullerVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionE_000146EF_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是在探险。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. He's in the big, southernmost tent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。他在最南端的大帐篷里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veteran Decanus [060140B0] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWMullerVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionE_000146F1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have business with your leader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和你们的领导人有生意要谈。
死吧，堕落者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veteran Decanus [060140B0] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWMullerVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionE_000146F3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> I've got some costume wearing freaks to behead.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>我要砍掉几个穿戏服的怪胎的头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who am I? You're wandering into my camp without even knowing who you're dealing with? You've got guts, if anything, profligate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是谁？你都不知道我是谁就擅自闯入我的营地？你有胆量，或者正相反，堕落者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_00014706_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am Exenterius, leader of this camp and a Primus in Caesar's Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是埃克森特里乌斯，这个营地的首领，也是凯撒军团的首席百夫长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_00014706_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Insult my authority again and you won't leave this camp with your head attached.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再敢侮辱我的权威，你就别想带着脑袋离开这个营地了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_00014706_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What business is that to you, profligate? The slaves we gather from around here are useless I tell you. We go through several every month.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这和你有什么关系，堕落者？我告诉你，我们在这里获取的奴隶是没用的，我们每个月都要处理掉好几个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_00014709_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lazy workers, they whine and won't stay in line. I've had to make examples out of several, myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 懒惰的工人，他们抱怨，不守规矩。我不得不自己挑出几个典型。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_00014709_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you acquired any new slaves recently?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最近有搞到新奴隶吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, we caught her recently. She was... interfering with our business. She's surprisingly cooperative though, for a profligate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我们最近抓住了她，她...干扰了我们的生意。不过，对于一个堕落者来说，她的合作态度令人惊讶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001470B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what's it to you? Do you wish to buy her, or why are you prying?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那跟你有什么关系？你是想买她，还是想打听什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001470B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mind you, she's a good slave, and we're having a labor shortage. If you want her, you're gonna have to secure a replacement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 提醒你一下，她是个好奴隶，而我们现在劳动力短缺。如果你想要她，你就得找人来代替她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001470B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have a woman with a medical background, like a nurse?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有一个有医学背景的女人，比如护士？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You motherfucker. We had a good thing going, and you've gone and ruined it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个狗娘养的。我们有一件好事，而你却把它毁了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mercenary [06014711] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPhannVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldAngryMe_00014715_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's in jail. He got what was coming for him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他进了监狱，他得到了他应得的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I go by Miss Rocket around here, hun. One could wonder who a curious little mouse like yourself is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里被称为火箭小姐，亲爱的。真想知道像你这样好奇的小老鼠是什么人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Rocket [06016DB6] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWVivivaciousVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMissRoc_00014C66_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This here is my inn for weary travelers. Best place to rest your dusty bones from weeks on the trail. No need for a passport, either!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是我为疲惫的旅行者准备的旅馆，是你在几周的旅途中休息的最佳场所。也不需要通行证！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Rocket [06016DB6] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWVivivaciousVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMissRoc_00014C67_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing, hun! A room is fifty caps, breakfast not included.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了，亲爱的！ 一个房间是50瓶盖，不包括早餐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Rocket [06016DB6] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWVivivaciousVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMissRoc_00014C68_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以租一间房吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd reckon you don't have a passport, I haven't seen you around here before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我估计你也没有通行证，我以前在这里没见过你
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Rocket [06016DB6] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWVivivaciousVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMissRoc_00014C6B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The town uses them to keep potential threats outside the city walls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个城镇利用它将潜在的威胁挡在城墙之外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Rocket [06016DB6] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWVivivaciousVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMissRoc_00014C6B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the deal with passports? I don't have one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通行证是怎么回事？我没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great, here's your key. Your room is the one in the back, room E.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，这是你的钥匙。你的房间在后面那间，E房间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Rocket [06016DB6] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWVivivaciousVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMissRoc_00014C69_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: <50瓶盖>当然，我接受。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe another time then. Anything else I can help you with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就改天吧。还有什么需要我帮忙的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Rocket [06016DB6] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWVivivaciousVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMissRoc_00014C6A_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 还是算了吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that's your task, isn't it? You're the one who want my business, so you're the one who's gotta scrounge up the merchandise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在这是你的任务，不是吗？是你想要跟我做生意，所以是你要去搞到商品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001540A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just remember that the nurse is a young woman, and I expect you to bring a slave of similar caliber.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要记住，护士是个年轻的女性，我希望你带一个和她水平差不多的奴隶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001540A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you've found a replacement, get them to come to the gravedigger's hut outside of town. The one next to the church in Donkey Acres.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你找到替代者时，带到镇外的掘墓人小屋来。就在驴子田园的教堂旁边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001540A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Due to the supply situation in camp, I can't give you a collar to force them to come with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到营地的补给情况，我不能给你一个项圈强迫她跟你走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001540A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll station a couple men down there to grab her and bring her back to camp. Here, this might help you in your capturing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会派几个人下去抓住她，把她带回营地。给你，这可能对你的捕捉有帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001540A_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where can I find a suitable replacement?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在哪里可以找到合适的替代品？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Colbert. I'm a collector. I seek out rare trinkets and the like. I'm here in Havasu because I've heard rumors of several in the area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 科尔伯特。我是一个收藏家，我寻找稀有的小饰品之类的东西。我来到哈瓦苏是因为我听到了一些关于这个地区的传闻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_000158CD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you find any shiny rocks or gemstones, bring them to me and I'll see if I can give you an appraisal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你找到任何闪亮的石头或宝石，拿来给我，我看看能不能给你估个价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_000158CD_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got a few tasks on my agenda, but I don't know if I can trust you yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的日程上有一些任务，但我不知道我能不能信任你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_000158D2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any work that needs doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么工作需要做吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm, this is quite the spectacular ruby. Ahem, a ruby is a gemstone, a shiny rock if you will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这是相当壮观的红宝石，咳，红宝石是一种经过雕琢的宝石。如果你愿意这么称呼的话，是一种闪光的石头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_000158D3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the old world it was used in jewelry, or simply something to gawk upon. This one is pretty rough, but if cut and cleaned it'll look spectacular.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在旧世界被用来制作珠宝，或者只是用来观赏的东西。这件相当粗糙，但如果切割清理一下，看起来会很壮观。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_000158D3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you be willing to sell it to me for say, 500 caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你愿意卖给我吗，比如说，500瓶盖？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_000158D3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about this crystal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对这种水晶了解吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, I'll make sure to bring out the true potential of this jewel. Here's your caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，我一定会发掘出这颗宝石的真正潜力。这是你的瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_000158D7_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，成交。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] You make a good case. Fine, I'll give you 800 caps for the gem. Final offer.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]你的理由很充分。好吧，我给你800瓶盖换这颗宝石。最终报价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_000158D9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about you up the price and I might consider bringing you more of these in the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把价格提高一点怎么样，我可能会考虑将来给你多带一些这样的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Fat chance, buddy. You'll get 500, no more.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]机会难得，哥们。你能拿到500，没有更多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_000158DA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can do better than that, I need the money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以给得更多，我需要钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's your call. Not many others would be interested in buying shiny rocks nowadays, though. Just saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由你决定。不过，现在没有多少人会对购买闪亮的石头感兴趣。只是说说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_000158D8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't think I'll sell it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我想我不会卖掉它。
爆炸！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grand Magus Mervin [06032365] (mod) Quest : ([06032376]RadWorldMervinDialogue) 06032376 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMe_RadWorldMervinE_0001597D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I think it will be great for business! Having NCR stationed in town could bring more stability to the region.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我想这对生意很有好处！NCR驻扎在城里可以给这个地区带来更多的稳定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_00015BDC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I should start thinking of branching into the brothel business. There's three things men want; Action, Alcohol and Sex.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我该考虑涉足妓院生意了。男人想要的东西就三样：激情、酒精和性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_00015BDC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have the perfect place to provide at least two out of the three. If I could get my hands on some casino machines I could cross out the third too...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一个完美的地方，至少可以提供这三个中的两个。如果我能够得到一些赌场的机器，我也可以划掉第三个...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_00015BDC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion on the NCR moving into Havasu?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对NCR迁入哈瓦苏有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm, luckily it seems like we've gone unnoticed for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，幸运的是，我们似乎暂时没有被发现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_00015BDD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the Legion aren't fans of services like ours, so it might be wise to start thinking about packing up. Before we get strung on a cross.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是军团并不喜欢像我们这样的服务，所以开始考虑收拾行李是明智的。在我们被绞死之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_00015BDD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think about the increased presence of the Legion in Havasu?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对哈瓦苏军团人数的增加有何看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't mind them, hell it could be good for business if I can score a contract providing ammunition and repairs for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我并不介意他们，如果我能够得到一份为他们提供弹药和维修的合同，这对我的生意可能是有利的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_00015BDF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think about NCR being stationed in town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得NCR驻扎在城里怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who do you think provided them with guns to begin with? If they like you, they leave you alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为是谁一开始就为他们提供枪支？如果他们喜欢你，就会放过你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_00015BE0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although the will of the legion is fickle, and could change on a whim. I don't reckon our contract will be a lasting one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然军团的意志是无常的，可能会临时改变。我不认为我们的合同会长久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_00015BE0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How come the Legion didn't sack this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团为什么不洗劫这里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's going on in town don't bother me much. If the mayor has opened up town to give more people shelter, that's a positive in my book.
ESP.TRADUIT: 城里发生的事情并没有给我带来多大的困扰。如果市长开放城镇，给更多人提供庇护，这在我看来是件好事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanPo_00015BE2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion on the NCR moving into town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对NCR搬到城里有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like it one bit. The legion are a despicable, narrow-minded bunch of lunatics. It would be wise for anyone valuing their freedoms to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一点也不喜欢。军团是一群卑鄙的、心胸狭窄的疯子，任何珍视自己自由的人离开都是明智的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanPo_00015BE3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think about the increased Legion presence in Havasu?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对哈瓦苏军团人数的增加有何看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are we here? This is Arizona, our territory. We're holding this point to make sure the roads are clear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们为什么在这里？这里是亚利桑那州，我们的地盘。我们守在这里是为了确保道路畅通。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001668F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We used to have a deal with the town just south of here, but recently the profligates of the NCR have dared to cross the river.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们曾经和南边的城镇有协议，但最近NCR的堕落者们敢过河了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001668F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We must prepare to take action, and eradicate them before they infest further into our lands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们必须准备采取行动，在他们进一步侵扰我们的土地之前消灭他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001668F_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 军团为什么会在这里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A profligate like yourself wants to join our cause? I don't know if I can trust you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 像你这样的堕落者想加入我们的事业？我不知道我能不能信任你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_00016692_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, our frumentarii Gustavo is in Havasu. I would like you to speak with him and see if you can earn his trust.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我们的特务古斯塔沃还在哈瓦苏。我希望你能和他谈谈，看看你是否能赢得他的信任。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_00016692_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any tasks for me to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么任务要我做吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go ahead, here's what's in stock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 开始吧，这里有现货。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jacky the Junk Salesman [06016693] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJSAKingVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldJunkSal_00016699_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to browse your wares.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想看看你们的商品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's see what I can do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看我能做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jacky the Junk Salesman [06016693] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJSAKingVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldJunkSal_0001669A_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我有些东西要修一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just a trader. Used to run a caravan but eventually these old bones got too old for travelling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是个商人。曾经经营过商队，但这老骨头已经不适合旅行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jacky the Junk Salesman [06016693] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJSAKingVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldJunkSal_0001669B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set up shop here in Havasu, still have to earn a living, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在哈瓦苏这里开店，还是要谋生的，你懂的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jacky the Junk Salesman [06016693] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJSAKingVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldJunkSal_0001669B_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because not everyone can get inside the gate. It only makes sense, I have access to more customers if I remove a barrier of entry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为不是每个人都能进得去。只有当我解除了出入障碍，我才有机会接触到更多的客户。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jacky the Junk Salesman [06016693] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJSAKingVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldJunkSal_0001669D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you outside the gates?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么会在门外？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They use these slips called passports. They're meant to only grant one user entry, but the guards don't check for that, just if you have a passport.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们使用的这些纸条被称为通行证。只允许一个用户进入，但警卫不会检查，只要你有通行证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jacky the Junk Salesman [06016693] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJSAKingVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldJunkSal_0001669F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe they can't read or maybe they just don't care. Anyway, you buying something or what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许他们不识字，也许他们根本不在乎。不管怎样，你买东西吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jacky the Junk Salesman [06016693] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJSAKingVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldJunkSal_0001669F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do I get inside the city?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么进到城里去？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beats me, you need a referral from the Mayor to get one, but for that you need to have a caravan registered with a reputable organization.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，你需要市长的推荐才能得到，但为此你需要有一个在知名组织注册的商队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jacky the Junk Salesman [06016693] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJSAKingVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldJunkSal_000166A1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got mine before I settled down here, but I don't know how you're gonna get your hands on one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在定居这里之前就有了，但我不知道你要怎么弄到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jacky the Junk Salesman [06016693] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJSAKingVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldJunkSal_000166A1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where can I get a passport?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在哪里可以得到通行证？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [060122A3] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，我走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Edwin, the supply officer for the Havasu Militia. I make sure our weapons are in order and that our armor is in shape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是埃德温，哈瓦苏民兵的供应官。我要确保我们的武器都准备好了，盔甲也准备好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Supply Officer Edwin [06015988] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCasualVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMilitia_000167F6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I also oversee the gun range we have here in the basement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还负责监督我们在地下室的枪械射击场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Supply Officer Edwin [06015988] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCasualVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMilitia_000167F6_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, we have a small shooting range set up in the basement, to give the troops some practice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，我们在地下室建了一个小型射击场，让士兵们练习射击。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Supply Officer Edwin [06015988] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCasualVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMilitia_000167F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're welcome to give it a shot or two if you want, as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你愿意，也欢迎你试一两次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Supply Officer Edwin [06015988] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCasualVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMilitia_000167F7_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你有一个射击场？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, we could always use more ammunition. Ever since the town had a falling out with Tom, he's refused to supply us with the 5.56 we need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我们总是需要使用更多的弹药。自从城里的人跟汤姆闹翻后，他就拒绝向我们提供我们需要的5.56口径的弹药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Supply Officer Edwin [06015988] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCasualVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMilitia_000167F8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's not many other places we could source ammo from around here, the traveling merchants aren't very reliable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这附近我们能找到弹药的地方不多，来往的商人也不太靠谱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Supply Officer Edwin [06015988] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCasualVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMilitia_000167F8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, there's always the army base nearby. It's not a permanent solution but it's a sufficient band-aid in the meantime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，总有附近的军事基地。但在此期间也只是权宜之计，不是长久之计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Supply Officer Edwin [06015988] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCasualVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMilitia_000167F8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mind going down there and try to find a crate of 5.56 for us? It would be a great help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 介意去那里为我们找一箱5.56子弹吗？这将是一个很大的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Supply Officer Edwin [06015988] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCasualVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMilitia_000167F8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any work that needs doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么工作需要做吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! You should look for their armory, that is likely to be where they've stashed their ammunition.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了！你应该去找他们的军械库，那很可能就是他们藏弹药的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Supply Officer Edwin [06015988] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCasualVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMilitia_000167F9_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 好，我知道了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then why did you even ask if you don't want to do any work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那如果你不想工作，为什么还要问我？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Supply Officer Edwin [06015988] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCasualVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMilitia_000167FA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No thanks, I don't want to do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，谢谢，我不想那样做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, that's a crate of ammo all right. A bit dusty, but it'll do the trick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，那是一箱弹药。有点脏，不过还行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Supply Officer Edwin [06015988] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCasualVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMilitia_000167FB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, have some caps as payment for your services.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，为你的服务支付一些瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Supply Officer Edwin [06015988] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCasualVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMilitia_000167FB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem Caps001 200 AddReputation RWHavasuRep 1 2 SetStage rdwrldMilitaSupplyQuest01 200

ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你带了弹药。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you needn't worry about me. I'm just a citizen of this fine town. Name's Gustavo though. Pleasure to meet you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，你不用担心我，我只是这个美丽小镇的一个市民。我的名字叫古斯塔沃，很高兴认识你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_00016DA2_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Gustavo. Frumentarii of the Caesar's Legion. I'm here to keep tabs on Havasu and its surroundings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是古斯塔沃，凯撒军团的特务。我是来监视哈瓦苏及其周边地区的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_00016DA8_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exenterius sent a woman to do his bidding? That's a first. You're lucky you didn't end up chained to his table.
ESP.TRADUIT: 埃克森特里乌斯派了一个女人来执行他的命令？这是头一次，你该庆幸自己没被锁在他的桌子上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_00016DA6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I presume he sees something exceptional in you, and wants me to confirm that you're worth his trust.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜他看到了你的特别之处，想让我确认你是否值得他信任。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_00016DA6_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 埃克森特里乌斯派我来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. So you're his latest prospect. I presume he sent you here to see if you're worthy of his trust.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。所以你是他的新目标，我猜他派你来是想看看你是否值得他的信任。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_00016DA7_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 埃克森特里乌斯派我来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought so. I do have a task for you. I need you to procure a few items and some information for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也是这么想的。有个任务要交给你，我需要你帮我弄些东西和一些信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_00016DAA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to get a dossier from the Caravan Hotel, procure a spare passport and investigate a group of tribals to the south of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你从大篷车酒店拿到一份档案，弄到一本备用通行证，然后调查这里以南的一群部落。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_00016DAA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now get going, profligate. Lest you end up on a cross for betraying Caesar's will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在就开始吧，堕落者。免得你因为背叛凯撒的意志而被钉在十字架上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_00016DAA_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，差不多是这样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very good. You're quite useful, I'll give you that. I have one more task for you to do, then you've earned my complete trust in this mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常好，我得承认，你很有用。我还有一个任务要你做，这样你就赢得了我的完全信任。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_00016DAD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On the other side of town, the NCR has set up an outpost for negotiations with Havasu.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在城市的另一边，NCR设立了一个前哨，开始与哈瓦苏进行谈判。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_00016DAD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can not let these negotiations progress, so I need that ambassador gone. I'm giving you the honor. Return to me when the deed is done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不能让谈判继续下去，所以我需要大使消失。我给你这个荣誉，等事情办完再来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_00016DAD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've completed all of the tasks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经完成了所有的任务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. This will prove most useful in the coming days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你！这将在未来几天被证明是最有用的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_000174B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's the dossier you asked for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你要的档案。

ESP.ORIGINAL: These are surprisingly difficult to get a hand on. I'm glad you proved useful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些东西出乎意料地难以到手。我很高兴你证明了自己是有用的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_000174B6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's a spare passport for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的备用通行证。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And? Are they open for assimilation, or do we need to be more... persuasive to get them to join our cause?
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后呢？他们是否愿意被同化，还是我们需要更多的...说服力来让他们加入我们的事业？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_000174B7_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经和部落谈过了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. This is promising. We can use them against the encroaching NCR and then sweep and enslave the remains of the camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。这很有希望，我们可以用他们来对付入侵的NCR，然后扫荡和奴役营地的残余。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_000174B9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The sandstorm means that they are cut off from the main tribe and will not be able to bring reinforcements.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沙尘暴意味着他们与主要部落的联系被切断了，无法带来增援。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_000174B9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Tell Gustavo about the Deep Claws, and their vendetta against the NCR.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <告诉古斯塔沃厚爪的事以及他们对NCR的仇视>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. He was making matters... complicated. You've proven your allegiances, tell the Primus that you've earned my trust.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，他让事情变得...复杂。你已经证明了你的忠诚，告诉首席百夫长，你已经赢得了我的信任。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_000174BB_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 大使已经走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I see. Well, that settles it. You've earned my trust, return to the Primus for further instructions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我明白了，好了，这样就解决了。你已经赢得了我的信任，回去找首席百夫长接受进一步的指示吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_000174BC_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经杀了大使。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kaisar's Legion? I've heard of them. They have already wiped out several branches of our tribe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯萨军团？我听说过他们，他们已经消灭了我们部落的几个分支。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_000174BF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Luckily, they do not seem to have found us yet. We as a tribe of warriors would not bow down to an outside power.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸运的是，他们似乎还没有找到我们。作为一个勇士部落，我们不会向外部力量屈服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_000174BF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion of the Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对军团有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only citizens of Havasu and certified traders are eligible for passports.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有哈瓦苏的公民和经过认证的贸易商才有资格获得通行证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Havasu Entrance Guard [06049592] (mod) Quest : ([0604B5C7]RadWorldPassPortCheckDialogue) 0604B5C7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPasspor_00018DA5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where can I get a passport?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在哪里可以得到通行证？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing. Here's what we've got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，这是我们有的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_00018F15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I see what you've got for sale?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能看看你们有什么卖的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Tom Groose, of course! And as you could guess by the name, I'm also the proprietor of this fine establishment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然是汤姆·古鲁斯！从名字你就能猜出来，我正是这家高档酒店的老板。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_00018F17_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We sell weapons here. It would be quite foolish of us to have merchandise that could harm us on display.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们这里是卖武器的。我们要是把会伤害我们的商品陈列出来，那也太傻了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_00018F19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to buy anything, you're welcome to browse what we've got here at the counter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想买什么东西，欢迎在柜台上随便看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_00018F19_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you have anything on display?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你没有任何展示的东西呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any work for you, personally. There's a bulletin board to your right though, and sometimes we've got bounties or requests posted there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我个人没有任何工作给你。不过，在你的右边有一个公告板，有时我们会在那里发布悬赏或请求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_00018F1B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can pick and choose from the available bounties, then when you complete them you can come back to me for payment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以从可用的悬赏中挑选，然后等你完成时，可以回来找我拿钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_00018F1B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Other work will be paid out by the poster of the job offers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他工作的报酬由招聘信息的发布者支付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_00018F1B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any work available?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么工作可做吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you're interested in my shop, eh? Tom's Plinkin Guns and Armor is THE best weapon dealership this side of the river.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，你对我的店感兴趣，对吗？乱射汤姆枪支护甲是河这边最好的武器经销商。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_00018F1D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All of our merchandise is checked over and taken care of by our in-house gunsmiths before they're put out for sale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们所有的商品都是由我们内部的枪械师检查和处理过之后，才拿出来销售的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_00018F1D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about your shop?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说你这家店吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's just say me and the other people in town didn't really see eye to eye regarding business, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说吧，我和城里的其他的人在生意上的看法并不一致，行吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_00018F1F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, I don't need the militia's protection and being outside the walls means more potential customers!
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说了，我不需要民兵的保护，而在墙外就意味着有更多的潜在客户！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_00018F1F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why is your shop set up outside of the town wall?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么把商店开在城墙外？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Johnny, the first and only line of defense in this here shantytown.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是强尼，这个棚户区的第一道也是唯一一道防线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyD_000191D6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now who are you, stranger? There's not many who waltzes into this radiation drenched hellhole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你是谁，陌生人？没几个人能走进这个辐射弥漫的地狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyD_000191D6_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, so you came in with that plane, huh? Yeah, I found your friend but he wasn't very talkative.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，你是坐飞机来的吗？我找到你的朋友了，但他不太健谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyD_000191D9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't think there was anyone else around, glad you survived though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为附近没有别人了，很高兴你活下来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyD_000191D9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you haven't attacked me yet so you're likely in your right mind. You do look pretty beat up though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且你还没有攻击我，所以你的脑子应该是正常的。不过你看起来确实很憔悴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyD_000191D9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about this, I'll open the door here behind me and you go find Yuuko. She's not exactly a doctor, but she knows how to tend a broken bone or two.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样吧，我打开后面的门，你去找优子。确切地说，她不是医生，但她知道如何处理一两处骨折。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyD_000191D9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm &PCName;, I guess I crashlanded here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是 &PCName;，我想我是迫降在这里了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I figured. You look like a seasoned traveler itchin' for some action.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我想也是。你看起来像一个经验丰富的旅行家，渴望一些行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rally [060191E4] (mod) Quest : ([060191F2]RadWorldRallyDialogue) 060191F2 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryMartinVT\RadWorldRa_RadWorldRallyQu_000191F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I would ask about credentials or something but we're out here in no man's land and I wanna get going as soon as possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我想问你要什么证件之类的东西，但我们现在在无人区，我想尽快出发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rally [060191E4] (mod) Quest : ([060191F2]RadWorldRallyDialogue) 060191F2 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryMartinVT\RadWorldRa_RadWorldRallyQu_000191F7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, are you ready to go right now or do you need to prepare?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你现在准备好出发了吗？还是你需要准备？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rally [060191E4] (mod) Quest : ([060191F2]RadWorldRallyDialogue) 060191F2 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryMartinVT\RadWorldRa_RadWorldRallyQu_000191F7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'm here about the job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我是为工作而来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They call me Rally. I'm a mercenary and a treasure hunter. One of the better, if you ask me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们叫我拉力。我是个雇佣兵，也是个寻宝者，如果你问我的话，是最好的那个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rally [060191E4] (mod) Quest : ([060191F2]RadWorldRallyDialogue) 060191F2 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryMartinVT\RadWorldRa_RadWorldRallyWh_000191F9_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They call me Rally because I'm the best driver this side of the Colorado river!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们叫我拉力是因为我是科罗拉多河这一边最棒的车手！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rally [060191E4] (mod) Quest : ([060191F2]RadWorldRallyDialogue) 060191F2 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryMartinVT\RadWorldRa_RadWorldRallyNa_000191FB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't say I have too much experience with piloting an airplane though, but I'm sure it's as easy as driving a stick shift.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然不能说我有太多驾驶飞机的经验，但我相信这就像开手动挡一样简单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rally [060191E4] (mod) Quest : ([060191F2]RadWorldRallyDialogue) 060191F2 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryMartinVT\RadWorldRa_RadWorldRallyNa_000191FB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do they call you Rally?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么他们叫你拉力？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We found the base of it lying around, then my boy Paul here worked his engineering magic to make the engine run.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们发现了它的底盘，然后我老弟保罗施展了他的工程魔法让引擎运转起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rally [060191E4] (mod) Quest : ([060191F2]RadWorldRallyDialogue) 060191F2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryMartinVT\RadWorldRa_RadWorldRallyAi_000191FD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've also spent thousands of caps buying rare machine parts that we need to get her running, but it's all an investment, baby!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还花了好几千瓶盖购买稀有的机器零件，我们需要让她运行，但这都是投资，宝贝！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rally [060191E4] (mod) Quest : ([060191F2]RadWorldRallyDialogue) 060191F2 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryMartinVT\RadWorldRa_RadWorldRallyAi_000191FD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When we find the treasure, we're gonna make the caps back tenfold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我们找到了宝藏，瓶盖就会翻十倍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rally [060191E4] (mod) Quest : ([060191F2]RadWorldRallyDialogue) 060191F2 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryMartinVT\RadWorldRa_RadWorldRallyAi_000191FD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where did you get the airplane from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是从哪儿弄到这架飞机的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard a rumor from a guy at a bar in Freeside. He was boasting real good about riches hidden away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在自由城的一家酒吧里听到一个传言。有个人在吹嘘自己藏有很多财富。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rally [060191E4] (mod) Quest : ([060191F2]RadWorldRallyDialogue) 060191F2 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryMartinVT\RadWorldRa_RadWorldRallyTr_000191FF_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，这个宝藏是什么呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nah, man. I'm not one for chasing baseless rumors. I've double checked everything. Shit, I've even got a map to the place!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，伙计。我不喜欢追踪毫无根据的谣言，我已经检查过了，见鬼，我甚至有去那个地方的地图！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rally [060191E4] (mod) Quest : ([060191F2]RadWorldRallyDialogue) 060191F2 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryMartinVT\RadWorldRa_RadWorldRallyRu_00019201_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? You're going on a giant expedition based on only a rumor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？就凭一个谣言你就要进行一次大规模的探险？
离开吧，挥霍者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veteran Decanus [060140B0] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWMullerVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionE_000193F9_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 无所谓，我要走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, but don't take too long. I won't wait more than a week. If you're not back here before then, we're taking off without you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，但别花太长时间。我不会等超过一个星期，如果你在那之前还没回来，我们就不等你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rally [060191E4] (mod) Quest : ([060191F2]RadWorldRallyDialogue) 060191F2 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryMartinVT\RadWorldRa_RadWorldRallyQu_00019812_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I have some stuff to prepare before going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我在去之前还有一些东西要准备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I like that! Someone who comes prepared and ready to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我喜欢这样！一个有备而来，随时准备就绪的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rally [060191E4] (mod) Quest : ([060191F2]RadWorldRallyDialogue) 060191F2 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryMartinVT\RadWorldRa_RadWorldRallyQu_00019814_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get on the plane and let抯 get this show on the road, or uh, sky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上飞机，我们的节目在路上，或者呃，在天上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rally [060191E4] (mod) Quest : ([060191F2]RadWorldRallyDialogue) 060191F2 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryMartinVT\RadWorldRa_RadWorldRallyQu_00019814_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我准备好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now hang on a moment there, we're only hiring a single contractor. Tell your friend that they can't come with us, then we can set off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在得等一下，我们只雇了一个承包人。告诉你的朋友他们不能和我们一起去，然后我们就可以出发了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rally [060191E4] (mod) Quest : ([060191F2]RadWorldRallyDialogue) 060191F2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryMartinVT\RadWorldRa_RadWorldRallyQu_0002C7F6_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我准备好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I told you, I don't know anything about any package. Now beat it.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]我说了，我不知道任何包裹的事。现在走开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tod Robertson [0604572D] (mod) Quest : ([06045F89]RadWorldTodRobertsonDialogue) 06045F89 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTodRobe_00045F93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just tell me where the package is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要告诉我包裹在哪里就行了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] O-Okay I get it. I buried the package in a footlocker in the river, just west of here. Now stop bothering me.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]好...好吧，我知道了。我把包裹埋在河中的一个小型提箱里，就在西边。别再烦我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tod Robertson [0604572D] (mod) Quest : ([06045F89]RadWorldTodRobertsonDialogue) 06045F89 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTodRobe_00045F94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, the faster you tell me where this package is, the easier it will be for the both of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，你越快告诉我这个包裹在哪里，对我们两个人来说就越安逸。
