ESP.ORIGINAL: Just one of Rally's crew members.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是拉力的一个组员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06019815] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulWho_0001984E_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？
机械工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06019815] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulWha_00019850_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这儿是做什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our little shantytown ain't got a name, but we call the surrounding area Radworld.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的棚户区没有名字，但我们把周围的地区叫做辐射世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyW_00019856_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess this place was called the Eagle Crags Industrial Development area before the war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜这个地方在战前叫鹰崖工业开发区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyW_00019858_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's in the western part of the state we used to call Arizona back in the day, and as you could guess, it was an industrial area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它位于这个州的西部，我们以前叫它亚利桑那州，你可以猜到，它是一个工业区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyW_00019858_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's pretty remote, which is both good and bad for us. The seclusion makes raid parties rare, but that also means trade is rare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里相当偏远，这对我们来说既是好事也是坏事。这种与世隔绝的状态使得掠夺者很少，但这也意味着贸易很少。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyW_00019858_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But raid parties has never been an issue in the valley. It's the radiation, and the ferals that causes trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但掠夺者在山谷里从来都不是问题，有麻烦的是辐射和野性尸鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyW_00019858_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could you be a bit more specific about the whereabouts?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能说得更具体点吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take care now. We've seen enough death 'round here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在保重。我们在这里已经见过了足够多的死亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyT_0001985B_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As I said, I'm Johnny. Used to work at the quarry down the road back before the war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说过了，我是强尼。战前曾在这条路上的采石场工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyW_0001985D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now I'm just trying to survive here with the other sane ghouls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我只想和其他神志清醒的食尸鬼一起活下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyW_0001985D_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, when I said that he's "not talkative", I meant that he's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，当我说他“不健谈”的时候，意思是说他死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyW_0001985F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I buried him by the tree where your plane crashed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把他埋在了你飞机坠毁的那棵树下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyW_0001985F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mentioned my friend? Where is he?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你提到了我的朋友？他在哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, that thing crashed hours ago. I heard two big bangs outside so I went out to investigate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，那玩意几个小时前就坠毁了。我听到外面有两声巨响，我就出去调查。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyH_00019861_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw a big plane crashed into the cliff and debris everywhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到一架大飞机撞到悬崖上，到处都是残骸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyH_00019861_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, so long have I been out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，我出来这么久了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your stuff? I don't know, probably up in town. The settlers all came down to scavenge what they could.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的东西？我不知道，可能在城里。移民们都来尽其所能地搜刮食物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyW_00019863_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Despicable if you ask me, but times are tough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要我说，这很卑鄙，但时局艰难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny [06003CBE] (mod) Quest : ([06018BC3]RadWorldJohnnyDialogue) 06018BC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldJo_RadWorldJohnnyW_00019863_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我的东西在哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So she's dead, huh. She was one of the better workers I've had. A real looker too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以她死了，嗯。她是我遇到的最好的员工之一，也是个真正的美人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00019ACF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing we can do about it now. So do you have the 300 caps I lent you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们现在无能为力了。那我支给你的300瓶盖带了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00019ACF_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 护士死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: She did, yeah. I've hidden her away at a... secret place for later. I'll lecture her about the mistake she made trying to flee.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她到了，是的，我把她藏在一个...秘密的地方，以待日后。我得教训教训她，让她知道她试图逃跑是在犯错误。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_0001E768_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, forget about that money I lent you. Hell, have another 300. I'm feeling generous today.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，忘了我借给你的钱吧，再给你300。我今天很慷慨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_0001E768_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 护士来了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks. Come back if you're ever injured, and I'll patch you right up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢。如果你受伤了就回来，我马上给你包扎！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00019AD3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, sure. Here you go. <300 Caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，当然，给你。<300瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, all right. We'll write an I.O.U and you'll pay it off when you get it. No problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，好吧，我们来写个借条，等你拿到了再把钱付清。没问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00019AD4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't have the money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我没有钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, buddy. Everyone is expendable. The strong prey on the weak, that's just how it works in the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，哥们。每个人都是可以牺牲的，弱肉强食，这就是世界的运作方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00019AD5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I live for myself and nobody else. I don't need some wastelander punk telling me what's "morally correct". Piss off, dirtbag.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只为自己而活，不为别人，我不需要什么垃圾废土客告诉我什么是“道德正确”。赶紧滚开，人渣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00019AD5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? That's what you're after? Not a word on how you treated her whilst she was here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？这就是你的目的？她在这里的时候你是怎么对待她的，你只字不提？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you weren't completely useless after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你也不是完全没用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001A2E8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well, I'll give you the gist of the situation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我把情况的要点告诉你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001A2E8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We gave the profligates a deal. They wanted to stay neutral and we of the Caesar's Legion agreed, for a price.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们给了那些堕落者一个协议。他们想保持中立，我们凯撒军团同意，但有条件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001A2E8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In exchange for tribute and the occasional slave, they would get to keep their precious town intact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为对贡品和偶尔的奴隶的交换，他们可以保持他们宝贵的城镇的完整。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001A2E8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They kept their end of the deal, for a time. Lately we'd been hearing rumors of NCR crossing the river and starting negotiations with Havasu.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们在一段时间内遵守了协议。最近，我们一直听到关于NCR渡河并开始与哈瓦苏谈判的传言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001A2E8_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear you've been successful in halting their negotiations, but I need you to show some force to the Mayor as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你成功地阻止了他们的谈判，但我需要你也向市长展示一些力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001A2E8_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make the profligate regret crossing us. Gustavo should know more, speak with him and he'll inform you of the next step.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让这个堕落者后悔越过我们。古斯塔沃应该知道更多，去跟他谈谈，他会通知你下一步的行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001A2E8_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have finished the task Gustavo gave me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我完成了古斯塔沃给我的任务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Primus was pleased, I presume? He's given the order to continue with the plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想，首席百夫长很高兴吧？他已经下达了继续执行计划的命令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_0001A2EA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He wants to renegotiate our deal with the town, or raze it to the ground if they refuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他想重新谈判我们与该镇的协议，如果他们拒绝，就把这里夷为平地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_0001A2EA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, we can not be sure of how far they got with negotiations with the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，我们不能确定他们与NCR的谈判进行到什么程度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_0001A2EA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they've chatted up an alliance already, attacking the town head on would leave us vulnerable for a counterattack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们已经建立了联盟，直接攻击城镇会让我们很容易遭到反击。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_0001A2EA_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, we're gonna deal with the NCR first. I would suggest gathering the help of the tribals. We can settle two things at once that way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，我们要先对付NCR。我建议召集部落的帮助，这样我们可以同时解决两件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_0001A2EA_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eradicate the NCR camp. Show them that they don't belong on this side of the river.
ESP.TRADUIT: 铲除NCR的营地。让他们知道，他们不属于河的这一边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_0001A2EA_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage rdwrldLegionQuest01 30 SetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldLegionQuest01 30 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldLegionQuest01 35 1
Primus Exenterius told me to speak with you again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首席百夫长埃克森特里乌斯让我再和你谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As I said earlier, your best bet would likely be to get the tribals nearby to help you out. We can not afford to send backup across town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正如我之前所说，你最好的选择可能是让附近的部落帮助你。我们没有能力派人穿过城镇支援。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_0001A2EC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or if you want to do things covertly, I've had some NCR armor stashed away. Use it as you see fit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想秘密行事，我已经藏了一些NCR护甲。你觉得合适就用吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_0001A2EC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How should I deal with the NCR camp?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该如何对付NCR的营地？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know, outsider. While we do despise the Bear tribe, we are at a severe disadvantage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，外乡人。虽然我们鄙视熊部落，但我们处于非常不利的地位。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0001A300_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want your aid in my battle against the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你帮助我对抗NCR。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am sorry, but I wish you good luck in your battle. Here, have this a token of fortune.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉，但我祝你在战斗中好运。给，这是一个幸运的象征。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0001A304_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I'll fight them by myself, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那我就自己对付他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] The Deep Claws are anything but weak. Very well, outsider. We shall aid you in your battle.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]厚爪一点也不弱。很好，外乡人，我们会在战斗中帮助你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0001A305_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess your tribe is just weak. When I've wiped out the NCR, I'll be looking at you with pity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你的部落很弱小。当我消灭了NCR后，我会用怜悯的眼光看你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I do not wish death upon my tribe. I am sorry, but we can not aid you in this battle.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]我不希望我的族人死亡。很抱歉，我们不能在这场战斗中帮助你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0001A306_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, I really need you here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，我真的需要你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] With you by our side, victory is assured. We will battle alongside you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]有你在我们身边，胜利是一定的。我们将与你们并肩作战。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0001A307_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am stronger than the NCR. I could wipe them out on my own. I merely want to share the glory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我比NCR更强大，我一个人就能消灭他们。我只是想分享荣耀。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] You do not make sense, outsider. Attacking the Bear tribe would be a suicide for all of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]你说的没道理，外乡人。攻击熊部落对我们所有人来说都是一种自杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0001A308_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry, you'll smack 'em up good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，你会把他们打得落花流水的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'm not actually a doctor, but I could give you some first aid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我其实不是医生，但我可以帮你做点急救。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoHe_0001B1BC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll take a look at that leg of yours. There we go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来看看你的腿，就这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoHe_0001B1BC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah this is one nasty fracture, all right. I recommend taking a rest and let it heal naturally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，这是很严重的骨折。我建议休息一下，让伤口自然愈合。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoHe_0001B1BC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though you don't look like the sitting still type. Here, you can take this to alleviate some of the pain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过你看起来不像那种坐着不动的人。给，你可以用这个来减轻一些疼痛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoHe_0001B1BC_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.ResetHealth player.additem 00050F8F 1 RWYuukosBedREF.SetOwnership RWShantytownBedREF.SetOwnership SetStage rdwrldSecondQuest 30
Johnny told me that you could patch me up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 强尼告诉我你能帮我包扎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Yuuko Takahashi. I guess I'm kind of like the brains around here. Been living on this cliffside for a while now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是高桥优子，我想我有点像这里的大脑。我在这个悬崖边住了一段时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoWh_0001B1C0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not very exciting, for better and worse. Excitement these days mostly involves murder and gunfights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是很刺激，有好有坏。这些天的刺激大多是谋杀和枪战。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoWh_0001B1C0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But out here we at least won't get robbed by any two-bit thief looking to fund his next fix, so I guess it's not too bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但在这里，我们至少不会被任何想搞到下一次毒品剂量的二流窃贼打劫，所以我想这并不是太糟糕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoWh_0001B1C0_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your gear? You mean from that plane crash? I'm not sure...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的装备？你是说那次空难吗？我不确定...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoWh_0001B1C2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know where my gear is?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我的装备在哪吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Right, yes. We do have most of the stuff that landed on the ground after the crash.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]对，是的。我们确实拥有坠机后落在地上的大部分东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoMy_0001B1C5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, there was some great loot in there. That stuff could help us survive for another year or two. I'd be a fool to give it up for free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，那里面有一些很棒的战利品，那东西能让我们再撑一两年。我才不会傻到白白放弃呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoMy_0001B1C5_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你有事瞒着我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. For your sake I hope this one is as cooperative as the one I'm selling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。为你着想，我希望这个和我要卖的那个一样合作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001B424_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm willing to part with her for 5 Aerus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我愿意用她换5奥里斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001B424_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: if RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.SlaveQuestHannah == 1 RWHannahREF.disable endif if RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.SlaveQuestRocket == 1 RWMissRocketREF.disable endif if RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.SlaveQuestRegina == 1 RWReginaCabreraREF.disable endif
I have secured a replacement slave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经找到了一个替代奴隶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If this replacement turns out poorly, it'll be your neck on the line next.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这次换人结果不理想，下一个遭殃的就是你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001B429_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Pay 5 Legion Aureus> Sure, here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: <支付5军团奥里斯>当然，给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you mock me? If you want us to barter with filth I can show you to the outhouses. Present me with real money or get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在嘲笑我？如果你想要我们与污秽物作交易，我可以带你到厕所去。给我真钱，不然就滚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001B42A_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你不要瓶盖吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Utterly ridiculous. I should put a collar around your neck for wasting my time. Get out of my sight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 荒唐至极。你浪费了我的时间，我应该给你套个项圈。滚出我的视线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Primus Exenterius [06014700] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRiceVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldLegionL_0001B42B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do not seem to have the money...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我似乎没有钱...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excuse me? Sorry hun, if you're hitting on me I'm afraid I'm gonna have to turn you down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说什么？抱歉，如果你在挑逗我，恐怕我得拒绝你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Rocket [06016DB6] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWVivivaciousVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMissRoc_0001D2CB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have something to show you, in a more private place...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有东西要给你看，在一个更隐蔽的地方...

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're looking for women to enslave, huh. I see, I see. Well, I've had my eyes on several targets you could try your hand at.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在找女人当奴隶，是吧，我明白了，我明白了。我已经盯上了几个你可以下手的目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_0001B42D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's Miss Rocket, owner of the caravan hostel. We have Regina, the girl in the bar on the east side of town by the wall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有火箭小姐，大篷车酒店的老板。我们有瑞金娜，城东墙边酒吧里的女孩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_0001B42D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And then there's The Mayor's wife, Hannah. I think Hannah would be the easiest target. She's not too bright, so you could lure her with ease.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有市长的妻子，汉娜。我觉得汉娜是最容易下手的目标，她不太聪明，所以你可以很轻易的引诱她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_0001B42D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to find women to enslave, got any tips?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要找个女人来奴役，有什么建议吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Impressive. Now for the task at hand. I've made our forces ready at the edge of town, and on my signal they're ready to move in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 令人印象深刻。现在开始手头的任务，我已经让我们的部队在城镇边缘做好了准备，只要我一发出信号，他们就可以行动了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_0001BD80_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let us have a little chat with the Mayor, shall we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们与市长聊一聊，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_0001BD80_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've dealt with the NCR camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经处理了NCR的营地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh, you continue to surprise. Then we can move on to the task at hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵呵，你继续给我惊喜。那么我们可以继续手头的工作了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_0001BD81_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let us have a little chat with the Mayor, shall we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们与市长聊一聊，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustavo [06049CEB] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAhrceusVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldGustavo_0001BD81_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've already wiped out the NCR camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经消灭了NCR的营地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please turn the climate controls off! It's turned into a fucking freezer, it's gonna kill us all at this rate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请关掉气候控制系统！这已经变成了该死的冰柜，照这个速度，我们都会死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frozen Corpse [0601BB88] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldV47Froz_0001CB8F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I managed to decode a keycard from the robot I destroyed in the hallway. If you're able to get out here, please...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我设法从我在走廊上摧毁的机器人身上破译了一张密钥卡。如果你能从这里出去，请...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frozen Corpse [0601BB88] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldV47Froz_0001CB8F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn it. D-Damn it all. It's s-so cold... Can't move my fingers anymore. Damn robot got my leg.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的，真...真见鬼。这太...太冷了...我的手指动不了了。该死的机器人抓住了我的腿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frozen Corpse [0601BB88] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWForrestVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldV47Froz_0001CB8F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've caught him? The man who killed my ex? Hell yeah, where is he? It's time to get some revenge!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你抓住他了？杀了我前任的人？当然，他在哪？是时候复仇了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Rocket [06016DB6] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWVivivaciousVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMissRoc_0001D2CC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> I think you'd be thrilled to know that I've caught a man by the name of Harry Mama.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>我想你一定会很高兴知道，我抓到了一个叫哈里妈妈的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, I'll meet you there. I'm gonna bring a few... tools to celebrate our reunion with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我们在那儿见。我要带一些...用来庆祝我们重逢的工具。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Rocket [06016DB6] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWVivivaciousVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMissRoc_0001D2CE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldMendezQuest02 31 1 SetObjectiveCompleted rdwrldMendezQuest02 30 1 Set RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.SlaveQuestRocket to 1 Set RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.SlaveBaited to 1
I have him in the gravedigger's hut up in Donkey Acres.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把他关在驴子田园的掘墓人小屋里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what? I'll go look around for your gear if you do some favors for us around here. Sound like a deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗？如果你在这里为我们做一些事，我就去找你的装备。听起来不错吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoMy_0001D663_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then what am I supposed to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我该怎么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, I see. You're just another selfish prick, huh. Typical.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我明白了。你只是又一个自私的混蛋，很典型。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoSP_0001D665_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, how about this? I'll go fetch your stuff if you do me a small favor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这个怎么样？如果你帮我个小忙，我就去拿你的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoSP_0001D665_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm in need of clean water. Scout out the water plant and cistern down below and see if it's usable. It's probably a quick trip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要干净的水。侦察一下下面的水厂和蓄水池，看看是否可以使用，这可能是一次短途旅行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoSP_0001D665_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh and come to think of it, the other settlers around here could probably also use some help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我想起来了，这里的其他定居者可能也需要一些帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoSP_0001D665_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since you're being so rude to me, you won't see your gear until you help all of us out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你对我这么无礼，除非你帮助我们所有人，否则你就看不到你的装备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoSP_0001D665_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage rdwrldYuukoWaterQuest 5 SetStage rdwrldCoreQuest01 3 SetStage rdwrldJohnnyQuest01 3 SetStage rdwrldNigelQuest01 3 SetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldSecondQuest 31 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldSecondQuest 32 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldSecondQuest 33 1
I don't care, that stuff is mine. Give it back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不管，那些东西是我的，还给我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! I'm in need of clean water. I've been trying to grow crops, but I believe my water source is contaminated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了！我需要干净的水。我一直在努力种庄稼，但我认为我的水源被污染了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoMy_0001D667_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could you check out the water treatment plant down below, and see if the water is usable?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能不能检查一下下面的水处理厂，看看水是否可用？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoMy_0001D667_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I'm pretty sure that Core in the tavern had something that needed doing, and pay a visit to Nigel in the upper cave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我很确定酒馆里的科尔有事情需要做，还有拜访上面洞穴里的奈杰尔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoMy_0001D667_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and you should go see Johnny again. He's kind of the leader around here, so he always has stuff that needs doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，你应该再去看看强尼。他是这里的领导，所以他总是有事情要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoMy_0001D667_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage rdwrldYuukoWaterQuest 5 SetStage rdwrldCoreQuest01 3 SetStage rdwrldJohnnyQuest01 3 SetStage rdwrldNigelQuest01 3 SetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldSecondQuest 31 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldSecondQuest 32 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldSecondQuest 33 1

ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，听起来不错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. That's too bad. Well, not like I expected it to be anything else. I'm starting to lose hope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。那太糟糕了，跟我预想的不一样，我开始失去希望了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoRe_0001D7E0_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoRe_0001D7E0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's what I could find. Doesn't seem like there's any good water around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我能找到的，这附近好像没有什么好水。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, but you're just not my type.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，你不是我喜欢的类型。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Regina Cabrera [06010545] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWLinnnnnVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldReginaC_0001DA18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're kinda cute, how about coming back to my place for some sarsparilla?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你挺可爱的，来我家喝点沙士怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh? I don't usually do this, but you're just my type... Where are you holed up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢？我通常不这么做，但你正是我喜欢的类型...你躲在哪里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Regina Cabrera [06010545] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWLinnnnnVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldReginaC_0001DA19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Lady Killer] You're kinda cute, how about coming back to my place for some sarsparilla?
ESP.TRADUIT: [师奶杀手]你挺可爱的，来我家喝点沙士怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh? I don't usually do this, but you're just my type... Where are you holed up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢？我通常不这么做，但你正是我喜欢的类型...你躲在哪里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Regina Cabrera [06010545] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWLinnnnnVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldReginaC_0001DA1A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Cherchez La Femme] You're kinda cute, how about coming back to my place for some sarsparilla?
ESP.TRADUIT: [你是百合]你挺可爱的，来我家喝点沙士怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, I'll be right there after I freshen up a bit. See you soon!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好啊，我梳洗一下就过去。待会儿见！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Regina Cabrera [06010545] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWLinnnnnVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldReginaC_0001DA1B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldMendezQuest02 31 1 SetObjectiveCompleted rdwrldMendezQuest02 30 1 Set RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.SlaveQuestRegina to 1 Set RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.SlaveBaited to 1
I'm in the gravedigger's hut up in Donkey Acres.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在驴子田园的掘墓人小屋里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, stop it you creep. A no is a no. Now get out of my face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别这样，你这个变态。不就是不，现在从我面前消失。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Regina Cabrera [06010545] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWLinnnnnVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldReginaC_0001DA1C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sure you wanna stand someone like me up? Come on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定要拒绝我这种人的约？来吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: He what? I mean I've always suspected something, but you have proof?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他什么？我一直在怀疑，但你有证据吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hannah [06044892] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoGFVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldHannahS_0001DA1E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw your husband out fooling around with another woman the other day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前几天我看到你丈夫在外面和别的女人鬼混。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh yes, of course. Let's go there, it'll be quieter and I can come up with a plan to move forward... I'll see you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是的，当然。我们去那里吧，那里比较安静，我可以想出一个推进的计划...我们在那儿见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hannah [06044892] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoGFVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldHannahS_0001DA20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldMendezQuest02 31 1 SetObjectiveCompleted rdwrldMendezQuest02 30 1 Set RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.SlaveQuestHannah to 1 Set RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.SlaveBaited to 1
Of course I have. But let's not talk here, come to the gravedigger's hut at Donkey Acres.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然有。但我们不要在这里谈，到驴子田园的掘墓人小屋去吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There you are. So who is it? It was that Cabrera bitch, wasn't it? I've seen him eye her up before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来啦。那么是谁呢？是那个叫卡布雷拉的婊子，对吧？我以前见过他盯着她看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hannah [06044892] (mod) Quest : ([0601BD82]rdwrldMendezQuest02) Losing What You Had EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoGFVT\rdwrldMend_RadWorldSlaveQu_0001DA27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're here. But I don't see the asshole. Where are you keeping him? Or were you lying to me all this time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这。但我没看到那个混蛋，你把他关在哪里？还是你一直在骗我？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Rocket [06016DB6] (mod) Quest : ([0601BD82]rdwrldMendezQuest02) Losing What You Had EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWVivivaciousVT\rdwrldMend_RadWorldSlaveQu_0001DA28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there, hot stuff. Are we getting our drink on first or are we going straight into the action?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿你好，帅哥。我们是先喝一杯还是直接开始行动？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Regina Cabrera [06010545] (mod) Quest : ([0601BD82]rdwrldMendezQuest02) Losing What You Had EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWLinnnnnVT\rdwrldMend_RadWorldSlaveQu_0001DA29_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 搞什么？！你在干什...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hannah [06044892] (mod) Quest : ([0601BD82]rdwrldMendezQuest02) Losing What You Had EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoGFVT\rdwrldMend_RadWorldSlaveQu_0001DA2B_1.ogg

I lied. <Knock her out and put a Sack over her head>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我骗你的。<把她打晕，用麻袋套住她的头>
你这个混蛋！放开我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Rocket [06016DB6] (mod) Quest : ([0601BD82]rdwrldMendezQuest02) Losing What You Had EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWVivivaciousVT\rdwrldMend_RadWorldSlaveQu_0001DA2C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: RWMissRocketREF.RemoveScriptPackage RWSlaveQuestTargetTalkPackage RWMissRocketREF.RemoveScriptPackage RWHavasuCitzenNightPACKAGE RWMissRocketREF.RemoveScriptPackage DefaultSandboxEditorLocation16 RWMissRocketREF.AddScriptPackage RWMendezSlaveCapturePACKAGE Player.RemoveItem RWSackHelmet 1 RWMissRocketREF.AddItem RWSackHelmet 1 RWMissRocketREF.EquipItem RWSackHelmet Set RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.SlaveGagged to 1 SetObjectiveCompleted rdwrldMendezQuest02 32 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldMendezQuest02 33 1 EnablePlayerControls
Yeah, I lied. <Knock her out and put a Sack over her head>
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我骗你的。<把她打晕，用麻袋套住她的头>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not really into this kinky stu...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太喜欢这个古怪的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Regina Cabrera [06010545] (mod) Quest : ([0601BD82]rdwrldMendezQuest02) Losing What You Had EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWLinnnnnVT\rdwrldMend_RadWorldSlaveQu_0001DA2D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: RWReginaCabreraREF.RemoveScriptPackage RWSlaveQuestTargetTalkPackage RWReginaCabreraREF.RemoveScriptPackage RWHavasuCitzenNightPACKAGE RWReginaCabreraREF.RemoveScriptPackage DefaultSandboxEditorLocation16 RWReginaCabreraREF.AddScriptPackage RWMendezSlaveCapturePACKAGE Player.RemoveItem RWSackHelmet 1 RWReginaCabreraREF.AddItem RWSackHelmet 1 RWReginaCabreraREF.EquipItem RWSackHelmet Set RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.SlaveGagged to 1 SetObjectiveCompleted rdwrldMendezQuest02 32 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed rdwrldMendezQuest02 33 1 EnablePlayerControls
We're going straight into the action. <Put a Sack over her head and knock her out>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们直接行动。<用麻袋套住她的头，把她打晕>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You what? Really? I'm free to go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说什么？真的吗？我可以走了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slave [060146F5] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldNurseFr_0001E755_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, where would I go? I-I don't have anywhere to call home anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，我要去哪？我...我已经没有任何可以称之为家的地方了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slave [060146F5] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldNurseFr_0001E755_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage rdwrldMendezQuest02 50 RWNurseSlaveREF.RemoveScriptPackage RWLegionSlave01DayPackage RWNurseSlaveREF.RemoveScriptPackage RWHavasuNCRGuardSleepPackage
I've come to get you out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来救你出去的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back to him? You serious? I would rather end my life right here than go back to that dirtbag again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到他身边？你认真的？我宁愿在这里结束我的生命也不愿再回到那个人渣身边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slave [060146F5] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldNurseBa_0001E757_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been hired to get you back to Mendez.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人雇我把你送回门德斯那里。
那好...好吧...谢谢你，陌生人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slave [060146F5] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldNurseAn_0001E756_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're free to go wherever you want, I don't care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想去哪就去哪，我不在乎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mendez is gone, you say? While he was a despicable man, he was the only one with medical knowledge in Havasu...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说门德斯已经走了？虽然他是一个卑鄙的人，但他是哈瓦苏唯一有医学知识的人...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slave [060146F5] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldNurseMe_0001E758_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if the clinic stands empty... You know what? I'll take you up on that. I'll start up the clinic as my own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果诊所是空的...你知道吗？我接受你的建议，我会把诊所当成自己的事业的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slave [060146F5] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldNurseMe_0001E758_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage rdwrldMendezQuest02 200 RWNurseSlaveREF.disable RWNurseClinicREF.enable SetCellFullName RadWorldHavasuClinic RWClinicNameChanger
Well Dr Mendez isn't around anymore, how about taking over his clinic?
ESP.TRADUIT: 门德斯医生已经不在了，接管他的诊所怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] W-Well I guess I can go hear him out... But nothing more than that.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]好...好吧，我想我可以去听他说完...但仅此而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slave [060146F5] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldNurseDo_0001E75A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a changed man. He really misses you and wants to make amends for what he's done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他已经改过自新了。他真的很想你，想为他所做的事做出补偿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] No. NO! I won't do it. I don't want anything to do with that man!
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]不，不！！！我不会这么做的，我不想和那个人扯上任何关系！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slave [060146F5] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldNurseDo_0001E75C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trust me, he's a nice guy now. Come with me and see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我，他现在是个好人了。我们一起去看看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're taking me from one hell to another, huh? Then my only option is to end it here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要把我从一个地狱带到另一个地狱，是吗？那我唯一的选择就是在这里结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slave [060146F5] (mod) Quest : ([060140B9]RadWorldLegionDialogue) 060140B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldLe_RadWorldNurseDo_0001E75D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever, I'm here to do my job and my job is to bring you to Mendez.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么样，我是来完成我的工作的，我的工作就是带你去见门德斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you hit your head that hard? I'm Paul, remember? Worked with Rally as treasure hunters. Flew an airplane. Ring any bells?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的头撞得那么厉害吗？我是保罗，记得吗？和拉力一起当寻宝者，开一架飞机。有印象吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulWho_0001EFB7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is kinda awkward, but who are you again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这有点尴尬，你是谁来着？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pretty bad, my leg is broken and doc said I got a bad concussion. No more adventuring for me until I've healed up again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 糟透了，我的腿断了，医生说我有严重的脑震荡。在我痊愈之前，我不能再去冒险了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulHow_0001EFC2_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么坚持下来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you did survive. Glad to hear it. How about Rally? Did he make it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你幸存下来了，很高兴听到这个消息。拉力怎么样？他活着吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulBar_0001EFB8_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 那次坠机太糟糕了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, I see. Damn. Not that I was ever fond of the guy, but he knew his stuff and was steady employment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我明白了，见鬼。倒不是说我喜欢他，但他很懂行，而且有份稳定的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulDid_0001EFC1_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，拉力没能活下来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The job? Rally was the guy who knew where to look, and he had the key to the place too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这份工作？拉力知道该去哪里找，他也有那地方的钥匙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulFin_0001EFC4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think it was a regular key though, because I never saw him unload anything like it from his pockets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我不认为那是一把普通的钥匙，因为我从未见过他从口袋里掏出任何类似的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulFin_0001EFC4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what, go search the crash site again for anything suspicious, then come back to me and I'll see what I can do with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样吧，再去搜索一下坠机地点，看看有没有什么可疑的东西，然后再来找我，我看看我能做些什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulFin_0001EFC4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately I can't go with you with this broken leg, but you can handle it alone, can't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，我的腿断了，不能和你一起去，但你一个人能应付，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulFin_0001EFC4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are we still finishing the job I was hired for, though?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我们还在完成我受雇的工作吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't really interested in getting to know anyone back there, Rally usually made quick work of chatty coworkers, if you get my drift.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对认识那里的人并不感兴趣，拉力通常能迅速搞定健谈的同事，如果你明白我的意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulPer_0001EFC7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem different now than back then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在看起来和以前不一样了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me see. Yeah, this is no normal tooth, there's some cutting edge technology in this thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看。是的，这不是普通的牙齿，这里面有一些尖端技术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulQue_0001EFCF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, we've got some sort of clue to go on, but we still don't know where to look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们有了一些线索，但我们还是不知道去哪里找。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulQue_0001EFCF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're probably gonna have to ask around town if they've heard anything about Big Bradley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能得问问镇上的人有没有听说过大布拉德利的消息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulQue_0001EFCF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found this strange tooth on Rally's corpse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在拉力的尸体上发现了这个奇怪的牙齿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Big Bradley? Yeah I know him. Don't know where he's hiding these days though, he got chased out of his old base when the NCR arrived.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大布拉德利？对我认识他，当NCR到达时他被赶出了原来的基地，不知道这些天他躲在哪里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Rocket [06016DB6] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWVivivaciousVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMissRoc_000200A4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know of a man called Big Bradley?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说过一个叫大布拉德利的人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We do indeed. That man is a wanted criminal and is not allowed to enter the city under any circumstances. Why? Have you found him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们确实有。那个人是通缉犯，在任何情况下都不允许进入这座城市。为什么？你找到他了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Havasu Militia [06011A47] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBanana\RadWorldHa_RadWorldMilitia_000200A6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know of a man called Big Bradley?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说过一个叫大布拉德利的人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You looking for Big B, huh? I would advice you otherwise. Man's a juggernaut, an unstoppable machine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在找大B，对吧？我建议你不要这么做，这个人是一个巨无霸，一个不可阻挡的机器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_000200A8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've had a bounty on his head several times but none of the hunters that took the job came back alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们曾多次悬赏他的人头，但接活的猎人们没有一个活着回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_000200A8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know of a man called Big Bradley?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说过一个叫大布拉德利的人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard you've been asking around for Big Bradley. What do you want with him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说你在四处打听大布拉德利的事。你找他干什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mysterious Man [060200A9] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHorseVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_00025DAF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me and my boys, we're bounty hunters. We've been tracking Bradley for a while now, but we need a few more heads to make the final push.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和我的孩子们，我们是赏金猎人。我们已经追踪布莱德利有一段时间了，但我们还需要几个人来做最后的冲刺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mysterious Man [060200A9] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHorseVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_000200BC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you feel like it, head down south past the NCR checkpoint. We have a camp set up there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想去，就往南走穿过NCR检查站。我们在那里搭了个营地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mysterious Man [060200A9] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHorseVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_000200BC_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 这关你什么事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bloodthirsty, are we? Well you're in luck, me and my boys, we're actually hunting him right now! We could help each other out, you feel me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你嗜杀吗？你很幸运，我和我的孩子们，我们正在追捕他！我们可以互相帮助，明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mysterious Man [060200A9] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHorseVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_000200BA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you feel like it, head down south past the NCR checkpoint. We have a camp set up down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想去，就往南走穿过NCR检查站。我们在那里搭了个营地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mysterious Man [060200A9] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHorseVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_000200BA_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我想杀了他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, you don't have to tell me. But if you by chance want a shot at his legendary bounty, me and my buddies have a camp down south.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你不用告诉我。如果你碰巧想试试他的传奇赏金，我和我的伙伴们在南边扎营。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mysterious Man [060200A9] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHorseVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_000200BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you feel like helping out, come see us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想帮忙，就来找我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mysterious Man [060200A9] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHorseVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_000200BB_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会告诉你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We are bounty hunters, chasing the legendary thief Big Bradley. Are you here to help us out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们是赏金猎人，在追捕传奇窃贼大布拉德利。你是来帮我们的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bounty Hunter [060200B5] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_000200C4_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fantastic! I assume you met our friend in town? He's running some errands so we're not gonna start the operation until he gets back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了！我想你在城里遇到我们的朋友了吧？他在处理一些事情，所以在他回来之前我们还不会开始作业。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bounty Hunter [060200B5] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_000200C5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can share information in the meanwhile, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我们可以在此同时分享信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bounty Hunter [060200B5] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_000200C5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard you were hunting Big Bradley, thought that I'd cooperate with you guys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说你在追捕大布莱德利，我想我应该和你们合作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bradley is locked up with his goons in an old abandoned bunker near the army base.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布拉德利和他的打手们被关在陆军基地附近一个废弃的旧地堡里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bounty Hunter [060200B5] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_000200C6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He must have some secret exit though, because we've never been able to get the jump on him when stalking the place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他一定有秘密出口，因为我们跟踪他的时候从来没能占据先机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bounty Hunter [060200B5] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_000200C6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And even when we entered the bunker, there was a big locked door that we couldn't get open. It used some kind of super technological lock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使我们进了地堡，也有一扇上了锁的门，我们打不开。它使用了某种超级科技锁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bounty Hunter [060200B5] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_000200C6_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 大布拉德利在哪儿？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tooth? Looks just like a regular tooth to me, but if you're certain it has something to do with the bunker, you're welcome to scout it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 牙齿？在我看来就是普通的牙齿，但如果你确定它和地堡有关，欢迎你去看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bounty Hunter [060200B5] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_000200C7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't seen any goons in there during the weeks we've been keeping a lookout on the place, so it should be safe to explore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们监视那里的几个星期里，我没有看到任何歹徒在那里，所以探索那里应该是安全的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bounty Hunter [060200B5] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_000200C7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you seen a tooth like this before?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以前见过这样的牙齿吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. I doubt we can blow ourselves in with explosives...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。我怀疑我们会用炸药把自己炸飞...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulQue_000200CD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about the tooth? Did you try doing anything with that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那牙齿呢？你试过用它做什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulQue_000200CD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've found the bunker where Bradley supposedly is, but the place is locked tight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了据说是布拉德利藏身的地堡，但那个地方锁得严严实实。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. Maybe it's an electronic key, but it's just missing power. Try connecting some kind of power cell or something to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。可能是把电子钥匙，只是没电了，连接到某个能量电池或什么东西上试试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulQue_000200CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell, ask the guy that brought me here. His name was Dylan if I remember correctly. He could probably help you out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，问问把我带到这里的那个人。如果我没记错的话，他的名字叫迪伦，他或许能帮你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulQue_000200CF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The tooth fit some kind of depression, but it didn't do anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这颗牙跟凹陷处吻合，但没起什么作用。
让我看看...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanFo_000200D2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh yes, there are some circuits in this tooth, albeit very small. Must've been one hell of an engineer that made this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，对的，这颗牙齿上有一些电路，尽管很小。制造这个的一定是个非常厉害的工程师。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanFo_000200D2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me try hooking it up to a microfusion cell, see if anything happens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我试着把它连接到一个微聚变电池上，看看会发生什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanFo_000200D2_3.ogg
NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it seems like the circuits didn't blow, at least. Here, try if you can't unlock whatever this is for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，至少看起来电路没有爆炸。给，如果你现在暂时无法解锁，就试试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanFo_000200D2_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could you have a look at this tooth? I think it might be some sort of key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能看看这颗牙齿吗？我猜这可能是某种钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have? Then let's go, what are we waiting for? Let's kill this bastard!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？那我们走吧，还等什么？让我们杀了那个杂种！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bounty Hunter [060200B5] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_000200DB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've figured out a way to open the locked door in the bunker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经想出了一个办法，可以打开地堡里上锁的门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the fuck are you? Men, get the intruders!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的是谁？伙计们，抓住入侵者！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Bradley Voice Activator [060200F1] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJamesVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_000200F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you guys doing? Kill them already!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们在干什么？快杀了他们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Bradley Voice Activator [060200F1] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJamesVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_000200F9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So who the fuck are you, huh? Barging into my house, killing my men. Do you feel like some kind of hero, or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你他妈的是谁，嗯？闯入我的房子，杀我的人。你是不是觉得自己是个英雄什么的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Bradley [06020817] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJamesVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_00021B51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bounty hunting is just stealing from other thieves. But I'll kill you like I killed all the others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赏金狩猎只不过是偷其他小偷的东西。而我会像杀其他人一样杀了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Bradley [06020817] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJamesVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_00021B57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: RWBigBradleyREF.AddToFaction RWBunkerEnemyFaction 1 RWBradleyTurret01REF.AddToFaction RWBunkerEnemyFaction 1 RWBradleyTurret02REF.AddToFaction RWBunkerEnemyFaction 1 RWBigBradleyREF.StartCombat player RWBradleyTurret01REF.StartCombat player RWBradleyTurret02REF.StartCombat player

ESP.TRADUIT: 只是工作罢了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh yeah? Who the fuck made you the judge of righteousness? I made my earnings like anyone else would in this godforsaken world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦是吗？谁他妈让你来当这个正义法官的？我只是在这个被上帝抛弃的世界里像其他人一样为了钱而活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Bradley [06020817] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJamesVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_00021B59_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你要完蛋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Bradley [06020817] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJamesVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_00021B59_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: RWBigBradleyREF.AddToFaction RWBunkerEnemyFaction 1 RWBradleyTurret01REF.AddToFaction RWBunkerEnemyFaction 1 RWBradleyTurret02REF.AddToFaction RWBunkerEnemyFaction 1 RWBigBradleyREF.StartCombat player RWBradleyTurret01REF.StartCombat player RWBradleyTurret02REF.StartCombat player

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个卑鄙小人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too late for that one, pal. Don't think you can barge into my home and beg to be my friend. You're going down no matter what.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太晚了，小子，别以为你能闯进我家求我做你的朋友。无论如何你都要完蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Bradley [06020817] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJamesVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_00021B58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: RWBigBradleyREF.AddToFaction RWBunkerEnemyFaction 1 RWBradleyTurret01REF.AddToFaction RWBunkerEnemyFaction 1 RWBradleyTurret02REF.AddToFaction RWBunkerEnemyFaction 1 RWBigBradleyREF.StartCombat player RWBradleyTurret01REF.StartCombat player RWBradleyTurret02REF.StartCombat player
Uhm, could we just not fight?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，我们能不能不打？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pfah! Delusional dumbass. Fine then, I'll take you on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呸！有妄想症的傻逼。那好吧，我来和你较量较量！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Bradley [06020817] (mod) Quest : ([0601EFC8]rdwrldFourthQuest) The Great Expedition, Resumed EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJamesVT\rdwrldFour_RadWorldFourthQ_00021B56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: RWBigBradleyREF.AddToFaction RWBunkerEnemyFaction 1 RWBradleyTurret01REF.AddToFaction RWBunkerEnemyFaction 1 RWBradleyTurret02REF.AddToFaction RWBunkerEnemyFaction 1 RWBigBradleyREF.StartCombat player RWBradleyTurret01REF.StartCombat player RWBradleyTurret02REF.StartCombat player
Hell yeah I do. I'm the good guy here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然可以，我是这里的好人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got him? What of this rumored "treasure" though? Did you find any?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你抓住他了？那么那个传说中的“宝藏”是什么呢？你找到了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulQue_00021B7A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have dealt with Big Bradley and his gang.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经处理了大布拉德利和他的团伙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's great! Now, well... I don't want to sound needy or anything, but do I get a share out of that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那真是太好了！现在，嗯...我不想听起来很贫困什么的，但我能从中分一杯羹吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulFou_00021B7E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's fine if I don't, you did almost all of the work. But I have medical bills to pay and other expenses, you know...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我不要也没什么，你几乎做了所有的工作。但我还有医药费和其他费用要付，你知道的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulFou_00021B7E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, I'm outta work and could really use the money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 求你了，我已经失业了，真的很需要钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulFou_00021B7E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did, yeah. The whole stash of Big Bradley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了，是的，大布拉德利的全部私藏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. Well they can't all be winners. Maybe I'll hit you up next time we need some work done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了，不可能都成为赢家。也许下次我们需要做一些工作的时候我会再找你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulPla_00021B7D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hah, I say "we" like Rally was still alive. Guess I'll have to find a new job once I get out of here...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈，我说“我们”好像拉力还活着似的。我想等我一离开这里就得找新工作了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulPla_00021B7D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He rigged the place to blow, I couldn't get anything out of there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他把那里炸了，我什么都没弄到。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh thank you. Thank you so much. I'll be sure to contact you if I find any more work that needs doing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔谢谢你，非常感谢。如果我发现还有什么工作需要做的话，我一定会再联系你的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulGiv_00021B81_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <700 Caps> Sure, buddy. Here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: <700瓶盖>当然，哥们儿，给你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't be too upset at that choice, I guess. Maybe I'll have some better luck another time. Maybe the Doc will steal my kidney.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想，对这个选择不能太难过。也许我下次会有更好的运气，也许医生会偷走我的肾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulGiv_00021B82_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice doing "business" with ya. Now get out of my face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴跟你做 "生意"，现在从我面前消失吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [06034328] (mod) Quest : ([06019846]RadWorldPaulDialogue) 06019846 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPaulGiv_00021B82_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, you won't get any of that money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你一分钱都拿不到。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh my goodness! This is quite the largest pearl I have ever seen! If you'd be willing to part ways with it, I'd buy it for, say 500 caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢我的天哪！这是我见过的最大的珍珠！如果你愿意出售的话，我买了，500瓶盖怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_0002233D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you interested in this pearl?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对这颗珍珠感兴趣吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] You make a good case. Fine, I'll give you 800 caps for the gem. Final offer.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]你的理由很充分。好吧，我给你800瓶盖换这颗宝石。最终报价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_0002233E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got more than that to cough up, Colbert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 科尔伯特，你可不止这些。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Fat chance, buddy. You'll get 500, no more.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]机会难得，哥们。你能拿到500，没有更多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_0002233F_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，老兄！再来点！

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's your call. Not many others would be interested in buying shiny rocks nowadays, though. Just saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由你决定。不过，现在没有多少人会对购买闪亮的石头感兴趣。只是说说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_00022340_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't think I'll sell it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我想我不会卖掉它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, I'll make sure to bring out the true potential of this jewel. Here's your caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，我一定会发掘出这颗宝石的真正潜力。这是你的瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_00022341_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，成交。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So here's the plan. You've been into town, have you not? There's a bank in there, and I have gotten news of quite a valuable rarity inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 计划是这样的。你进城了，对吧？那里有一家银行，我听说里面有一件非常珍贵的藏品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_00022343_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're up for it, I'll pay handsomely for you to procure it for me, if you get my drift. Interested?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你明白我的意思，我愿意出一大笔钱让你帮我弄到它。感兴趣吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_00022343_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me more about this job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我更多关于这份工作的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great, great. Now I'd like to give you some details.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了，太好了。现在我想告诉你一些细节。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_00022347_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have two options to deal with this. Busting in from the front door, fighting anything in your way...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有两个选项来处理这件事。从前门冲进去，与任何阻挡你的东西战斗...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_00022347_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...or sneak in from the roof through a ventilation shaft. If you're confident you can do it all undetected, that's all the better, but if not...
ESP.TRADUIT: ...或者从屋顶上的通风口潜入。如果你有信心能在不被发现的情况下完成这一切，那就更好了，但如果不能...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_00022347_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...I've stashed a bomb in the sewers. So if you go ahead and fetch that bomb for now, I'll prepare some masks to hide your face with.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...我在下水道里藏了一个炸弹。所以，如果你先去把炸弹取来，我会准备一些面具来遮住你的脸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_00022347_4.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我很乐意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, okay. Forget I ever brought it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好的。就当我没提过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_00022348_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm not willing to do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不愿意那样做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm, it's quite dirty and stained with blood, but I believe this is a diamond. Super compressed carbon, valued highly in pre-war society.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，很脏，还有血迹，但我相信这是颗钻石。超压缩碳，在战前社会受到高度重视。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_00022350_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd be willing to buy this for 500 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我愿意花500瓶盖买这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_00022350_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现了这颗宝石，有兴趣吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] You make a good case. Fine, I'll give you 800 caps for the gem. Final offer.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]你的理由很充分。好吧，我给你800瓶盖换这颗宝石。最终报价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_00022351_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it's worth more than what you're giving on here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得它的价值比你在这给的要高。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Fat chance, buddy. You'll get 500, no more.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]机会难得，哥们。你能拿到500，没有更多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_00022352_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我要求至少翻倍！

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's your call. Not many others would be interested in buying shiny rocks nowadays, though. Just saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由你决定。不过，现在没有多少人会对购买闪亮的石头感兴趣。只是说说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_00022353_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't think I'll sell it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我想我不会卖掉它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, I'll make sure to bring out the true potential of this jewel. Here's your caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，我一定会发掘出这颗宝石的真正潜力。这是你的瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_00022354_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，成交。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me see that. Hmm... Is this... I'm not sure, I would need to have a closer inspection back at my workshop, but this looks like a sapphire.
