ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看。嗯...这是...我不确定，我需要在我的工作室里仔细鉴定一下，但这个看起来像蓝宝石。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_00022375_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll give you five hundred for it. Nothing more though, in consideration of potentially being a fake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我出五百。但考虑到有可能是假的，就不多说了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_00022375_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found this blue crystal, got anything to say about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了这块蓝色水晶，有什么要说的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's your call. Not many others would be interested in buying shiny rocks nowadays, though. Just saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由你决定。不过，现在没有多少人会对购买闪亮的石头感兴趣。只是说说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_00022376_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't think I'll sell it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我想我不会卖掉它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, I'll make sure to bring out the true potential of this jewel. Here's your caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，我一定会发掘出这颗宝石的真正潜力。这是你的瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_00022377_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，成交。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice yeah, that's the bomb. I'm not going to tell you how to do the job, but if you want some tips you're free to look over the plans I hung up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，就是那个炸弹。我不会告诉你怎么做这份工作，但如果你想要一些建议，你可以看看我挂出的计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_000230F2_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 给，你的面具。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_000230F2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, uh... good luck. If you get caught though, we don't know each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有，呃...祝你好运。如果你被抓了，那我们是不认识的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_000230F2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I picked up the bomb, as you asked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我按你说的把炸弹捡来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, yes! This is the one! This is the emerald I crossed half the country to find. The shine, the size, the volume! It's almost chaotic!
ESP.TRADUIT: 对的，对的！就是这块！这就是我跨越半个国家去寻找的翡翠。它的光泽，它的大小，它的体积！这简直太混乱了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_000230FE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you my friend. I will stay here for a while in case you find more gems for me. Here's your payment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你我的朋友，我会在这里呆一段时间，以防你为我找到更多的宝石。这是你的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colbert [06051405] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldColbert_000230FE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe this is what you were looking for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这就是你要找的东西吧？
没错，给你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Fun Guy [0600EC02] (mod) Quest : ([06007F23]RadWorldTwitchDialogue) 06007F23 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJSAKingVT\RadWorldTw_RadWorldFunGuyA_00025113_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我想？
哇！我的头好晕...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Fun Guy [0600EC02] (mod) Quest : ([06007F23]RadWorldTwitchDialogue) 06007F23 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJSAKingVT\RadWorldTw_RadWorldFunGuyR_00025114_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 不，谢谢，我很好。
哈哈哈！对！对！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Talking Skull [060254C1] (mod) Quest : ([060254C4]RadWorldApartmentTalkingSkull01Dialogue) 060254C4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJaboVT\RadWorldAp_RadWorldTalking_00025B0E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll decorate their rusty walls with their rotten innards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要用他们腐烂的内脏来装饰他们生锈的墙壁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hahaha! Yes, that's it! I knew you were the one!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈哈！对，就是这样！我就知道你是那个人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Talking Skull [060254C1] (mod) Quest : ([060254C4]RadWorldApartmentTalkingSkull01Dialogue) 060254C4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJaboVT\RadWorldAp_RadWorldTalking_00025B13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I crave blood, and you will give me the feast I desire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我渴望鲜血，而你将给我带来我所渴望的盛宴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Talking Skull [060254C1] (mod) Quest : ([060254C4]RadWorldApartmentTalkingSkull01Dialogue) 060254C4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJaboVT\RadWorldAp_RadWorldTalking_00025B13_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The town of zombie rejects north of here, surely you've met them. I want you to slaughter the entire town in my name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里以北的被拒绝的僵尸小镇，你肯定见过他们。我要你以我的名义屠杀全镇的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Talking Skull [060254C1] (mod) Quest : ([060254C4]RadWorldApartmentTalkingSkull01Dialogue) 060254C4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJaboVT\RadWorldAp_RadWorldTalking_00025B13_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slaughter the cowards like the lambs they are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 像宰杀羔羊一样宰杀这些懦夫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Talking Skull [060254C1] (mod) Quest : ([060254C4]RadWorldApartmentTalkingSkull01Dialogue) 060254C4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJaboVT\RadWorldAp_RadWorldTalking_00025B13_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the fuck are you cackling about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的在笑什么呢？
哈哈哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Talking Skull [060254C1] (mod) Quest : ([060254C4]RadWorldApartmentTalkingSkull01Dialogue) 060254C4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWJaboVT\RadWorldAp_RadWorldTalking_00025B15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm too high, I'm seeing shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我太兴奋了，我看到的是狗屎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My name is Wolfgang. Now, the name might sound menacing, but I assure you. I wouldn't hurt a fly!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫沃尔夫冈。这名字可能听起来很吓人，但我向你保证，我连一只苍蝇都不忍心伤害！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolfgang [0602913A] (mod) Quest : ([0602913D]RadWorldWolfgangDialogue) 0602913D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoVT\RadWorldWo_RadWorldWolfgan_0002978C_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a radio technician. I run a small relay station here to snap up whatever signals I can get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是个无线电技术员。我在这里建了一个小型中继站，接受我能得到的任何信号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolfgang [0602913A] (mod) Quest : ([0602913D]RadWorldWolfgangDialogue) 0602913D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoVT\RadWorldWo_RadWorldWolfgan_0002978E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're mostly coming up north from Vegas though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过大部分是从维加斯往北来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolfgang [0602913A] (mod) Quest : ([0602913D]RadWorldWolfgangDialogue) 0602913D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoVT\RadWorldWo_RadWorldWolfgan_0002978E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And look at that, you've got a pip-boy! I believe those have a portable radio on them, so you might've noticed already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看这个，你有个Pip-boy！我相信它上面有便携式收音机，那你可能已经注意到了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolfgang [0602913A] (mod) Quest : ([0602913D]RadWorldWolfgangDialogue) 0602913D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoVT\RadWorldWo_RadWorldWolfgan_0002978E_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这儿是做什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can manage this station just fine by myself, but thanks for asking!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以自己管理好这个电台，但是谢谢你的关心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolfgang [0602913A] (mod) Quest : ([0602913D]RadWorldWolfgangDialogue) 0602913D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoVT\RadWorldWo_RadWorldWolfgan_00029790_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, I'm always up for listening to some stories, and you look like a well traveled adventurer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我总是很想听一些故事，而你看起来像一个游历甚广的冒险家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolfgang [0602913A] (mod) Quest : ([0602913D]RadWorldWolfgangDialogue) 0602913D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoVT\RadWorldWo_RadWorldWolfgan_00029790_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say, do you have any impressive stories to tell me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说，你有什么令人印象深刻的故事能告诉我吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolfgang [0602913A] (mod) Quest : ([0602913D]RadWorldWolfgangDialogue) 0602913D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoVT\RadWorldWo_RadWorldWolfgan_00029790_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anything I can do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能做些什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No problem. I'm sure you'll experience some in the future though, so when you do, come back and tell me about it, yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题。我相信你将来会有这样的经历，所以等你有了，回来告诉我，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolfgang [0602913A] (mod) Quest : ([0602913D]RadWorldWolfgangDialogue) 0602913D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoVT\RadWorldWo_RadWorldWolfgan_00029792_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any stories for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在没有任何故事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, no way! I've heard about the vault experiments, but something as crazy as that sounds almost unbelievable!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，不可能！我听说过避难所实验，但这么疯狂的事情听起来几乎令人难以置信！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolfgang [0602913A] (mod) Quest : ([0602913D]RadWorldWolfgangDialogue) 0602913D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoVT\RadWorldWo_RadWorldWolfgan_00029794_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe that Vault-Tec built a vault around this area too, back in the day. Wonder if that also had a tragic ending to it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信避难所科技公司以前也在这附近建了一个避难所。不知道是否也有一个悲剧的结局...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolfgang [0602913A] (mod) Quest : ([0602913D]RadWorldWolfgangDialogue) 0602913D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoVT\RadWorldWo_RadWorldWolfgan_00029794_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back in the Mojave, I found a vault that was all overgrown, filled with monster plants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到莫哈韦，我发现了一个杂草丛生的避难所，里面长满了怪物植物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, that sounds awesome! Lifting a giant plane from the bottom of a lakem huh? That must've looked impressive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，听起来棒极了！把一架巨型飞机从湖底吊起来？那一定让人印象深刻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolfgang [0602913A] (mod) Quest : ([0602913D]RadWorldWolfgangDialogue) 0602913D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoVT\RadWorldWo_RadWorldWolfgan_00029796_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I helped a tribe of bomb crazed nutjobs raise an old world war plane from the bottom of Lake Mead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我帮助一群炸弹狂人从米德湖底打捞起一架旧的战前飞机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh, gotta say, that sounds like quite the tall tale, but I'll believe you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵呵，我得说，这听起来像是无稽之谈，但我相信你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolfgang [0602913A] (mod) Quest : ([0602913D]RadWorldWolfgangDialogue) 0602913D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoVT\RadWorldWo_RadWorldWolfgan_00029798_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ghoul rocketeers, now I've heard everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 食尸鬼火箭人，现在我什么都听过了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolfgang [0602913A] (mod) Quest : ([0602913D]RadWorldWolfgangDialogue) 0602913D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoVT\RadWorldWo_RadWorldWolfgan_00029798_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I once helped a gang of ghouls build a rocket and sent them off to space.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经帮一群食尸鬼造了一枚火箭，把他们送上了太空。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I've heard of the Sierra Madre. That was a colossal waste of pre-war resources, in my opinion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说过马德雷山脉。在我看来，这是对战前资源的巨大浪费。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolfgang [0602913A] (mod) Quest : ([0602913D]RadWorldWolfgangDialogue) 0602913D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoVT\RadWorldWo_RadWorldWolfgan_0002979B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like, making a giant casino right when the world is on the brink of nuclear war? Ridiculous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像，在世界濒临核战争的时候建一个巨型赌场？太荒谬了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolfgang [0602913A] (mod) Quest : ([0602913D]RadWorldWolfgangDialogue) 0602913D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoVT\RadWorldWo_RadWorldWolfgan_0002979B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I went to the Sierra Madre and broke into it's vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去了马德拉山脉，闯入了那里的避难所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, Zion huh? That's on the other side of the Grand Canyon up north, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，锡安啊？那是在北部大峡谷的另一边，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolfgang [0602913A] (mod) Quest : ([0602913D]RadWorldWolfgangDialogue) 0602913D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoVT\RadWorldWo_RadWorldWolfgan_0002979D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Helping out tribals is good and all, but I'm not gonna lie to ya. It doesn't sound very exciting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮助部落是挺好的，但我不想骗你，这听起来不是很令人兴奋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolfgang [0602913A] (mod) Quest : ([0602913D]RadWorldWolfgangDialogue) 0602913D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoVT\RadWorldWo_RadWorldWolfgan_0002979D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I went to Zion and helped solve the conflicts with the tribes there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去了锡安，帮助解决了那里的部落冲突。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hahaha, that sounds like a hell of a trip, indeed! You crack me up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈哈，这听起来真是一趟地狱之旅啊！笑死我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolfgang [0602913A] (mod) Quest : ([0602913D]RadWorldWolfgangDialogue) 0602913D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoVT\RadWorldWo_RadWorldWolfgan_000297A0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did I also mention that I got high on Datura and slayed a giant burning Yao Guai?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还提过我嗑曼陀罗嗨了，然后杀了一个燃烧的巨大妖怪吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh yeah, I'm sure it was quite the experience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢是的，我想那肯定是段很难忘的经历。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolfgang [0602913A] (mod) Quest : ([0602913D]RadWorldWolfgangDialogue) 0602913D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoVT\RadWorldWo_RadWorldWolfgan_000297A2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it is what it is. I still feel like I made a difference for the people there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，事情就是这样。我还是觉得我为那里的人带来了一些改变。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell? That sounds crazy. How does that even work? How are you not dead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么鬼？这听起来很疯狂，这怎么能行呢？你为什么不会死呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolfgang [0602913A] (mod) Quest : ([0602913D]RadWorldWolfgangDialogue) 0602913D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoVT\RadWorldWo_RadWorldWolfgan_000297A4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got my heart and brain stolen once by floating robot scientists, when I went to the Big Empty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一次我的心脏和大脑被漂浮的机器人科学家偷走了，当我去大山脉的时候。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am Din, and I am the Speaker for this Following of the Deep Claw tribe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫丁，我是厚爪部落追随者的发言人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0002B326_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the home of our humble village, outsider. I would prefer it if you did not cause us any trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我们卑微的村庄和家，外乡人，我希望你不要给我们带来任何麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0002B328_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Deep Claws is a big tribe of fierce warriors. We are but a small branch of them, called a Following.
ESP.TRADUIT: “厚爪”是一个由凶猛的战士组成的庞大部落。我们只是他们的一个小分支，被称为追随者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0002B32A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We call the branches a Following because we merely follow the predators we respect and revere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们称这些分支为“追随者”，因为我们只追随我们尊敬和敬仰的捕食者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0002B32A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe you people call them "Death Claws".
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信你们这些人叫它们“死亡爪”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0002B32A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our culture has a better understanding of the beasts than most others, so please don't call them that in our presence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的文化对野兽的理解比其他大多数文化要深，所以请不要在我们面前这样称呼它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0002B32A_4.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 厚爪是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to hear more about us, yes? You're a rare kind of outsider, you know? I'd be glad to share whatever I can about us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想知道更多关于我们的事，对吗？你是个少见的外乡人，知道吗？我很高兴能与你分享关于我们的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0002B32C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We, the Deep Claws, believe that the Great Beasts are akin to Gods. They are the prime predators and we revere them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们，厚爪，相信巨兽是类似于神的存在。它们是主要的捕食者，我们崇敬它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0002B32C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To become closer to Gods ourselves, we overcome and defeat the Great Beasts when the time is ripe. This is called the Reaping.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了使自己更接近神，我们在时机成熟时战胜并击败巨兽。这就是所谓的 "收割"。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0002B32C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fierce warriors who prove themselves are granted a God Claw, a trophy from a Great Beast to use as a weapon, and an extension of themselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 证明自己的凶猛战士会被授予神爪，这是一个来自巨兽的战利品，可以作为武器使用，也是他们自己的延伸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0002B32C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As I said earlier, we are but a small branch of the main tribe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我之前说过，我们只是主要部落的一个小分支。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0002B32C_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A small branch such as ourselves is called a Following, because we follow and monitor a family of Great Beasts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 像我们这样的一个小分支被称为“追随者”，因为我们追随并监视着一个巨兽家族。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0002B32C_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once a year, the youngest warriors get sent to the main tribe to get their God Claw blessed by the shaman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每年一次，最年轻的战士会被派到主要部落接受萨满的神爪祝福。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0002B32C_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately we missed our chance to send someone this year because of the sandstorm and the Bear Tribe warriors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，由于沙尘暴和熊部落的战士，我们错过了今年派人去的机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0002B32C_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me more about the Deep Claws?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我更多关于厚爪的事吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, the ones with big green tents and flags with a bear on them. They wear brown and use heretical weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的，就是那种有绿色大帐篷和有熊图案的旗子的。他们穿着棕色衣服，使用异教武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0002B32E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure you've seen them. We challenged them at first, but even the fiercest warriors know when to retreat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你肯定见过他们。一开始我们向他们发起挑战，但即使是最勇猛的战士也知道何时该撤退。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0002B32E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Luckily, I don't believe they've found our camp and they don't seem very inclined on searching for us either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸运的是，我认为他们没有找到我们的营地，而且他们似乎也不太想找我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker Din [0602B31D] (mod) Quest : ([0602B322]RadWorldSpeakerDinDialogue) 0602B322 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPascalVT\RadWorldSp_RadWorldSpeaker_0002B32E_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 熊部落？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted you to find Fernando, or Fidget as he prefer to call himself. He and his friend Twitch left town and headed south about a week ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让你去找费尔南多，或者他更喜欢叫自己菲基特。他和他的朋友图奇在一周前离开了小镇，向南走去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelQu_0002D00D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would be ever so grateful if you could talk some sense into the boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能劝劝这孩子，我会很感激的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nigel [06007F50] (mod) Quest : ([06009B55]RadWorldNigelDialogue) 06009B55 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldNi_RadWorldNigelQu_0002D00D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was I supposed to do again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说下我该干啥？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No siree, I'm more of a broadcasting guy than a listening guy if you get me. I'm just here grooving to the music.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，如果你明白我的意思的话，我更像是一个播音的人，而不是一个倾听的人。我只是在这里随着音乐舞动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolfgang [0602913A] (mod) Quest : ([0602913D]RadWorldWolfgangDialogue) 0602913D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoVT\RadWorldWo_RadWorldWolfgan_0002F3BD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you picked up any signals from the NCR broadcasts lately?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最近收到NCR广播的信号了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am the protector of this great tower! The Grand Magus Mervin stands before you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是这座高塔的守护者！大法师默温就站在你面前！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grand Magus Mervin [06032365] (mod) Quest : ([06032376]RadWorldMervinDialogue) 06032376 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMe_RadWorldMervinW_00002AFC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Master of magics and wizard of destruction! You would do well to tremble in the presence of someone as great as me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 魔法大师，毁灭巫师！在像我这样伟大的人面前，你最好颤抖一下！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grand Magus Mervin [06032365] (mod) Quest : ([06032376]RadWorldMervinDialogue) 06032376 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMe_RadWorldMervinW_00002AFC_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why yes, you understand I have to protect the secrets of magic from anyone who'd want to steal it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然是，你知道我必须保护魔法的秘密不被任何人窃取。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grand Magus Mervin [06032365] (mod) Quest : ([06032376]RadWorldMervinDialogue) 06032376 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMe_RadWorldMervinD_00002AFB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But do not worry. I will not fire upon you any longer, as a token of friendship between us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但别担心。我再也不会向你开枪了，作为我们友谊的象征。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grand Magus Mervin [06032365] (mod) Quest : ([06032376]RadWorldMervinDialogue) 06032376 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMe_RadWorldMervinD_00002AFB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you the one who shot at me on the runway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你在跑道上朝我开枪的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why I'd never! You dare insult the Grand Magus?! I am a master of magic who's dedicated a lifetime to my studies!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来没有！你竟敢侮辱大法师？！我是一个毕生致力于研究的魔法大师！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grand Magus Mervin [06032365] (mod) Quest : ([06032376]RadWorldMervinDialogue) 06032376 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMe_RadWorldMervinY_00002AFD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please take your leave. I do not wish to associate with crude barbarians such as yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请走吧，我不想和你这样的野蛮人来往。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grand Magus Mervin [06032365] (mod) Quest : ([06032376]RadWorldMervinDialogue) 06032376 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMe_RadWorldMervinY_00002AFD_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你疯了，老头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Julian Mendez. I'm the third generation of physician in this family clinic. I've been running this place for a while now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是朱利安·门德斯，这个家庭诊所的第三代医生。我经营这个地方有一段时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00034302_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh, no. I am not with the Followers. My former nurse was though. They're a good bunch, even though their name is confusing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵呵，不，我不是天启追随者的人，不过我以前的护士是。他们是一群好人，尽管他们的名字让人困惑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00034304_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My former nurse arranged for regular supply shipments to come through from Vegas, but she's not around anymore. A shame, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以前的护士定期安排从拉斯维加斯运送补给，但她现在不在了。真的很遗憾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00034304_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you with the Followers of the Apocalypse?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是天启追随者的人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know, really. She said that she was needed somewhere, and had to go help. Selfless to the point of stupidity, that one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，真的，她说有地方需要她，必须去帮忙。这个人无私到了愚蠢的地步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00034306_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你的护士出了什么事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand, it's easy to fall prey to substance dependence in the wasteland. Do you want me to cure you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我理解，在废土上很容易陷入对药物的依赖。你想让我治愈你吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00034314_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I might be addicted to something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我或许对某些东西上瘾了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh no! You've got to stop abusing substances. I've seen that end too many lives already. Let's get you treated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，不！你必须停止滥用药物。我已经看到太多生命因此结束，让我给你治疗一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Isabella Mills [0601EFA0] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00029AEA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I might be addicted to something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我或许对某些东西上瘾了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it's your choice in the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，最终是你的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00034315_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'll tough it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我将勇敢接受。
哦...哦？嗯，那好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Isabella Mills [0601EFA0] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00029AEB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'll tough it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我将勇敢接受。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, this will only take a second. Be still, would you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，这只需要几秒钟。别动，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00034316_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; set Begin Medical Services variable: setav variable01 2 Player.RemoveItem Caps001 50

ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，治好我。给你50瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, this will only take a second. Here we go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，只需要几秒钟，准备来吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Isabella Mills [0601EFA0] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00029AEC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; set Begin Medical Services variable: setav variable01 2
Yes, cure me of my addiction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，治好我的成瘾。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do realize that this is a business too, right? I can't give away freebies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道这也是生意，对吧？我不能赠送免费服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00034317_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有50个瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm hurt. I need help, Doc.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我受伤了。医生，我需要帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you playing a prank on me? There's nothing wrong with you! Stop wasting my time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在跟我开玩笑吗？你什么毛病都没有！别再浪费我的时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00034318_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem perfectly fine to me. Maybe take a rest if you're feeling ill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我看来你很好。如果你觉得不舒服，就休息一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Isabella Mills [0601EFA0] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00029AE4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not looking too roughed up. A bandage and some painkillers might do the trick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来没怎么受伤，绷带和止疼药可能会起作用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00034319_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just a few scratches. We'll fix that up in a jiffy, you'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有几处刮伤，我们马上就能治好，你等着瞧吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Isabella Mills [0601EFA0] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00029AE5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's some serious wounds on you. Let's get you fixed up before it gets infected.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你身上的伤口很严重，让我们在它被感染之前给你治好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_0003431A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh, those looks like they hurt. Hurry, let's get you some first aid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔，这些看起来很疼。快点，让我们给你做一些急救措施。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Isabella Mills [0601EFA0] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00029AE6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I'll say. You better lay down before you pass out there! Let's get you treated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我会说。你最好在晕过去之前躺下！让我给你治疗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_0003431B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are you still walking? Let's get you treated right now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么还能走路？我们现在就给你治疗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Isabella Mills [0601EFA0] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00029AE7_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，现在别动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_0003431E_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，治好我。这是100瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is gonna sting a bit, but don't worry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这将会有点刺痛，但别担心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Isabella Mills [0601EFA0] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00029AE8_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，帮我治疗一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you better not fall over and die in here, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你最好别在这里摔死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_0003431D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't afford the 100 cap medical bill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我付不起100瓶盖的治疗费。
好了，现在别动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00034320_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，治好我。这是75瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is gonna sting a bit, but don't worry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这将会有点刺痛，但别担心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Isabella Mills [0601EFA0] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00029AE9_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，帮我治疗一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then scram! I'm running a business here too, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就滚吧！我也是在这里做生意的，你懂的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00034321_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我付不起75瓶盖。
好了，现在别动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_0003431C_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，治好我。这是50瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then scram! I'm running a business here too, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就滚吧！我也是在这里做生意的，你懂的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00034326_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我付不起50瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is gonna sting a bit, but don't worry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这将会有点刺痛，但别担心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Isabella Mills [0601EFA0] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00029AE2_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，帮我治疗一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be here, if you change your mind. If you've got the caps, I've got the cure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你改变主意，我就在这里。只要你有瓶盖，我就有疗法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00034322_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，没什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay then, I won't force you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧，我不强迫你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Isabella Mills [0601EFA0] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00029AE1_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，没什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing, I can get rid of that glowing mold for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然啦，我可以帮你除掉那些发光的霉菌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00034323_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你能治疗我的辐射吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're positively glowing! And not just because of your looks. Do you want me to remove those rads?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是容光焕发！不仅仅是因为你的长相。需要我把这些辐射去掉吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Isabella Mills [0601EFA0] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00029AED_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你能治疗我的辐射吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Ah, please don't hurt me! The package is in the river! Just over there!
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]啊，请不要伤害我！包裹在河里！就在那边！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tod Robertson [0604572D] (mod) Quest : ([06045F89]RadWorldTodRobertsonDialogue) 06045F89 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTodRobe_00045F95_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough of this shit. Tell me where the package is or you'll start missing walking on two legs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我受够了这些狗屎。告诉我包裹在哪里，否则你会开始想念用两条腿走路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't blame me when your spit turns green.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的口水变绿了可别怪我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00034324_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，没什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay then, I won't force you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧，我不强迫你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Isabella Mills [0601EFA0] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00029AEE_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，没什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, let's drain those rads out of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，让我们把你体内的辐射排出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00034325_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 给你100瓶盖，治好我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, let's get you all fixed up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，让我们把你治好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Isabella Mills [0601EFA0] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00029AEF_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，治好我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then scram! I'm running a business here too, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就滚吧！我也是在这里做生意的，你懂的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_0003431F_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我付不起50瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, you can never be too prepared out on the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，在路上准备再充分也不过分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00034327_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要医疗物资。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's what I can offer. I can't give you anything for free though, unfortunately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我能提供的东西。但不幸的是，我不能免费给你任何东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Isabella Mills [0601EFA0] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWCaitlynVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00029AF0_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要医疗物资。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you've come to the right *hic* place. I-I sell boats, rent boats, fix boats. Because I am a boat salesman. Hehehe...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你就来对了*嗝*地方。我...我卖船，租船，修船。因为我是一个船只销售员。呵呵呵..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry the Boat Salesman [06034333] (mod) Quest : ([06034336]RadWorldBoatSalesmanDialogue) 06034336 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWLastonVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldBoatSal_0003433D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For only a thousand caps, you can be the captain of your own vessel!
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要一千瓶盖，你就能成为你自己船的船长！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry the Boat Salesman [06034333] (mod) Quest : ([06034336]RadWorldBoatSalesmanDialogue) 06034336 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWLastonVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldBoatSal_0003433D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would like to buy a boat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想买条船。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Terry. I sell boats. I fix boats. Enough with the chit-chat. Are you buying a boat or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是特瑞，我卖船，我修船。闲话少说，你到底买不买船？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry the Boat Salesman [06034333] (mod) Quest : ([06034336]RadWorldBoatSalesmanDialogue) 06034336 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWLastonVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldBoatSal_00034341_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help? Yeah I need help. I need caps, so I sell boats. You can help me by buying a *hic* damn boat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮忙？是的，我需要帮忙，我需要瓶盖，所以我卖船。你可以帮我买一艘该死的船。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry the Boat Salesman [06034333] (mod) Quest : ([06034336]RadWorldBoatSalesmanDialogue) 06034336 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWLastonVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldBoatSal_00034340_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Splendid! You can take the red one by the water's edge, around the corner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 痛快！你可以坐水边的那条红色的，在拐角处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry the Boat Salesman [06034333] (mod) Quest : ([06034336]RadWorldBoatSalesmanDialogue) 06034336 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWLastonVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldBoatSal_0003433F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: RWMojaveBoatREF01.enable RWMojaveBoatREF02.enable player.RemoveItem Caps001 1000 setstage RadWorldBoatSalesmanDialogue 20

ESP.TRADUIT: <1000瓶盖>我要一艘船。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then come back when you do! I'll be *hic* here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有钱了再回来！我就在*嗝*这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry the Boat Salesman [06034333] (mod) Quest : ([06034336]RadWorldBoatSalesmanDialogue) 06034336 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWLastonVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldBoatSal_00034342_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我买不起这条船。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bah! Then piss off, yeah? I can't make money with chatter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呸！那就滚开，好吗？我不靠闲聊赚钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry the Boat Salesman [06034333] (mod) Quest : ([06034336]RadWorldBoatSalesmanDialogue) 06034336 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWLastonVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldBoatSal_0003433E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, I'll pass on the boat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 仔细想想，我还是不买船了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me? Gosh, I'm Hannah. I work here as The Mayor's secretary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我？啊呀，我是汉娜。在这里做市长的秘书。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hannah [06044892] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoGFVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldHannahW_000448C9_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's The Mayor's office! The Mayor is the leader of the great town of Havasu and he's the man who's kept it the independent trading hub that it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是市长的办公室！市长是哈瓦苏城的领袖，是他让哈瓦苏保持了独立贸易中心的地位。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hannah [06044892] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoGFVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldHannahW_000448CB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without his guidance and leadership, the town would've never prospered like it has.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果没有他的指引和领导，这个小城绝不会有现在的繁荣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hannah [06044892] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoGFVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldHannahW_000448CB_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Absolutely! Lake Havasu City, or just Havasu for short, is an independent trading hub placed right next to the Colorado River in western Arizona.
ESP.TRADUIT: 完全可以！哈瓦苏湖城，简称哈瓦苏，是一个独立的贸易中心，位于亚利桑那州西部的科罗拉多河旁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hannah [06044892] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoGFVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldHannahA_000448CD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The current Mayor has been in office for over 20 years, and during his time our average annual revenue has tripled!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现任市长已经任职20多年了，在他任职期间，我们的平均年收入翻了三倍！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hannah [06044892] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoGFVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldHannahA_000448CD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks to being right next to the Colorado River, we have easy access to fresh water that we use to grow crops, mostly maize.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于紧邻科罗拉多河，我们很容易获得用于种植作物的淡水，主要是玉米。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hannah [06044892] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoGFVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldHannahA_000448CD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The river also has living fish in it, quite the rarity from what I've heard! We fish a lot of it here. It's quite delicious, if you ask me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这条河里还有活鱼，据我所知非常罕见！我们在这里钓了很多鱼。要我说，那真是太好吃了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hannah [06044892] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoGFVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldHannahA_000448CD_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me more about Havasu?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我更多关于哈瓦苏的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those boys leave us mostly alone, thank goodness. I've heard real nasty rumors about them but The Mayor settled some kind of deal with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢天谢地，那些孩子们基本没打扰我们。我听说了关于他们的一些很恶劣的传言，但是市长和他们达成了某种协议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hannah [06044892] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoGFVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldHannahL_000448CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How come Ceasar's Legion haven't attacked this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么凯撒军团还没有攻击这个地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those passports are a kind of security for us citizens. It ensures that no bad people come in, and we also gain a bit of profit from them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些通行证是对我们公民的一种保障。它确保没有坏人会进来，我们也能从中获得一点利润。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hannah [06044892] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoGFVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldHannahA_000448D1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Many travelers who pass through aren't fond of paying for entry, but the benefits of the town outweighs the price of a passport.
ESP.TRADUIT: 许多路过的旅行者并不喜欢付费进入，但这座城市的好处超过了通行证的价格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hannah [06044892] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoGFVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldHannahA_000448D1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid I don't know all the details behind the passports, you'd have to ask The Mayor for more information.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕我不知道这些通行证背后的所有细节，你得向市长询问更多的信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hannah [06044892] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoGFVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldHannahA_000448D1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the deal with the passports?
ESP.TRADUIT: 通行证是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do? Eh, I was just joking when I said that. I don't actually mark down appointments.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有？呃，我说这话时只是在开玩笑，我实际上并没有记下预约。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hannah [06044892] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoGFVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldHannahY_000448D4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to talk to The Mayor just head around back and up the stairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想和市长谈谈，只需要绕到后面，然后上楼就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hannah [06044892] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWTomatoGFVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldHannahY_000448D4_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我有个预约。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the most important person in town. I'm The Mayor! If you ever need anything, do not hesitate to ask me for help or advice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是城里最重要的人，我是市长！如果你有任何需要，请随时向我寻求帮助或建议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_000448D7_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Friend, there are many places you can go for work but this isn't the one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 朋友，有很多地方你可以去工作，但不是这个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_000448D9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can however point you in the direction of some people who might be in need of assistance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我可以给你指出一些可能需要帮助的人的方向。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_000448D9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The gun shop to the north, called Tom's Plinkin', has a notice board where lots of people post job offers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 北边的一家枪店叫“乱射汤姆”，那里有一个布告栏，很多人在上面张贴招工启事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_000448D9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like the guy, but he runs a good business. There's also the hotel on the island. I hear they've seen better days. Try checking that out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢这个家伙，但他的生意做得不错。还有岛上的酒店，我听说他们的日子已经好过了，试着去看看吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mayor [06044895] (mod) Quest : ([06010544]RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue) 06010544 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWRichardVT\RadWorldHa_RadWorldTheMayo_000448D9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any work available?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么工作可做吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Adam Gregory, huh? Sure I've heard of him. Skeevy little punk who's got fingers stickier than a toddler in a marmalade jar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亚当·格里高利？我当然听说过他。一个手指比果酱罐里的小孩还粘的邋遢小混混。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_000456FC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He used to live in town until the militia had enough of him stealing time and time again. They took his passport and kicked him out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他从前住在城里，后来民兵团受够了他屡次偷窃。他们收走了他的通行证，把他赶了出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_000456FC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's not many other places nearby, so maybe you could try asking around in Donkey Acres to the east?
ESP.TRADUIT: 附近的地方不多，也许你可以到东边的驴子田园问问？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_000456FC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about Adam Gregory?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道亚当·格里高利的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tod Robertson? Haven't heard of the guy, sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 托德·罗伯逊？没听说过这个人，抱歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_00045F9C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you know about Tod Robertson?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对托德·罗伯逊了解多少？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know much about the man, only that he was obsessed with radiation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对这个人不太了解，只知道他对辐射很痴迷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_0004A94B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your best bet to finding this Randy Jaxter is probably to head east, through the tunnel. You'd better go prepared though, that area is nasty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要找到这个兰迪-贾克斯特，你最好的办法可能是向东走穿过隧道。不过你最好做好准备，那片区域很危险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_0004A94B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about Randy Jaxter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你了解兰迪·贾克斯特吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm, she and Pierce has had a feud for years. Celeste usually comes from the south whilst Pierce comes from the north.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，她和皮尔斯多年来一直不和。塞莱斯特通常来自南方，而皮尔斯则来自北方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_0004AF8A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're both merchants, you see. I suspect that this is some kind of business disagreement that Pierce wants to settle for good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的，他们都是商人。我怀疑这是某种商业上的分歧，皮尔斯想要彻底解决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_0004AF8A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about Celeste Ashley?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道塞莱斯特·阿什利的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holy shit, you didn't have to rip his entire head off! Sure, it's proof of his death but try to be a bit more subtle next time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我靠，你没必要把他的头整个撕下来吧！当然，这是他死亡的证据，但下次试着委婉一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_000456FB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's the agreed upon sum of 300 caps. On behalf of my client, thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我们商定的300瓶盖。我代表我的客户，谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_000456FB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to claim a bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来领赏金的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice work, I'll take this package off your hands. Here's your reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好，我来帮你拿这个包裹。这是你的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_00045F9D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to claim a bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来领赏金的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hm, this note doesn't say much but the client should recognize the handwriting. Let's go with this, here's your reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这张纸条没说什么，但客户应该能认出这个笔迹。就这样吧，这是你的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_0004A94C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to claim a bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来领赏金的。
不关你的事，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tod Robertson [0604572D] (mod) Quest : ([06045F89]RadWorldTodRobertsonDialogue) 06045F89 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTodRobe_00045F90_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know anything about no package.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道什么包裹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tod Robertson [0604572D] (mod) Quest : ([06045F89]RadWorldTodRobertsonDialogue) 06045F89 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTodRobe_00045F91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to get the package back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来拿回包裹的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Ah, what the fuck are you doing?! Okay, okay. I'll tell you where the package is.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]啊，你他妈的在干什么？！好吧，好吧，我会告诉你包裹在哪里的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tod Robertson [0604572D] (mod) Quest : ([06045F89]RadWorldTodRobertsonDialogue) 06045F89 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTodRobe_00045F96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I dumped it just west of here, in the river. It's in a footlocker hidden behind some weeds. Now get your mouth away from there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把它扔在西边的河里了，在一个藏在杂草后面的小型提箱里。马上把你的嘴拿开！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tod Robertson [0604572D] (mod) Quest : ([06045F89]RadWorldTodRobertsonDialogue) 06045F89 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTodRobe_00045F96_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where is the package? *Put Tod's finger in your mouth and bite intimidatingly*
ESP.TRADUIT: 包裹在哪？*把托德的手指放在嘴里，用力咬*

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Oh baby, I haven't had any action in months! Gladly!
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]噢，宝贝，我已经好几个月没有行动了！乐意之至！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tod Robertson [0604572D] (mod) Quest : ([06045F89]RadWorldTodRobertsonDialogue) 06045F89 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTodRobe_00045F98_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX RWBounty02FootlockerREF.RemoveItem RWBounty02Package 1 player.addItem RWBounty02Package 1
How about an exchange then? I take care of this package, and you give me my package.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就交换一下怎么样？我负责这个包裹，而你把我要的包裹给我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Fine, but I better not get any trouble for this later. I hid the package in the river, behind some weeds just west of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]好吧，但我最好以后不要因为这个而惹上任何麻烦。我把包裹藏在河里，就在这西边的一些杂草后面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tod Robertson [0604572D] (mod) Quest : ([06045F89]RadWorldTodRobertsonDialogue) 06045F89 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTodRobe_00045F9A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see that this is valuable to you, but I guarantee that I can make it worth your while. <200 Caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道这对你很有价值，但我保证我能让你觉得物有所值。<200瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] You just don't know when to give up, do you? Fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]你就是不知道什么时候该放弃，是吧？滚蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tod Robertson [0604572D] (mod) Quest : ([06045F89]RadWorldTodRobertsonDialogue) 06045F89 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBraydenVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTodRobe_00045F9B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How much do you want? 100 Caps? 150? Pack of cigarettes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要多少？100瓶盖？150？一包香烟？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just a barkeep. Not interested in sharing my life story, pal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是个酒吧招待。我对分享我的人生故事没兴趣，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartender [0604744B] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldPPHBart_00047458_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing, here's what we've got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，这是我们有的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartender [0604744B] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBishopVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldPPHBart_00047457_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me see what's on tap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看有什么生啤。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Ariella, the manager and proprietor of this magnificent hotel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是阿蕾拉，这家豪华酒店的经理和老板。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_00047460_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the Pittsburg Point Hotel. A magnificent building in a wonderful location! Truly the pearl of Havasu.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是匹兹堡角酒店。坐落在绝佳位置的宏伟建筑！哈瓦苏的明珠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_00047461_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We do actually! You see, our basement has recently been overrun with a nasty pest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们确实有！你看，我们的地下室最近被一种讨厌的害虫侵占了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_00047462_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A pack of Lakelurks have started nesting down there and they've managed to shut off the main generator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一群湖沼蟹已经开始在那里筑巢了，它们成功地关闭了主发电机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_00047462_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you think you can take care of the pests for us? You can take the elevator on the left down to the basement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得你能帮我们解决这些害虫吗？你可以乘左边的电梯下到地下室。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_00047462_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any work that needs doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么工作需要做吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, you read the work notice! You see, our basement has recently been overrun with a nasty pest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你读了工作布告！你看，我们的地下室最近被一种讨厌的害虫侵占了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_00047463_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A pack of Lakelurks have started nesting down there and they've managed to shut off the main generator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一群湖沼蟹已经开始在那里筑巢了，它们成功地关闭了主发电机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_00047463_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you think you can take care of the pests for us? You can take the elevator on the left to the basement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得你能帮我们解决这些害虫吗？你可以乘左边的电梯到地下室。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_00047463_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here about the work poster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是为了工作海报来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! The main generator controls should be to the left after taking the elevator down. Come back here when you've taken care of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了！下电梯后主发电机控制应在左侧。等你处理好了再回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_00047466_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I can do that for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我可以为你做这些。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. That's unfortunate. Well if you change your mind, come back here. I just hope they don't come up here and attack us in the meantime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了，这很不幸，如果你改变主意了就回来。我只希望在此期间他们不要上来攻击我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_00047467_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'll pass on this job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我不会接受这份工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh thank goodness! A work splendidly done. I'm willing to pay you 400 caps for this, but as the notice stated, it's negotiable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，谢天谢地！工作做得很出色。我愿意为此付你400瓶盖，但就像布告上说的，可以商量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_00047469_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
setstage rdwrldPittsburgPointQuest01 200 player.additem Caps001 400
RWPPHPreQuestLobbyElevatorREF.disable RWPPHElevatorLobbyREF.enable RWPPHPreQuestBasementElevatorREF.disable RWPPHBasementElevatorREF.enable
I've taken care of the Lakelurks and switched on the power.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经搞定了湖沼蟹并接通了电源。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Fair enough, I suppose you've earned some extra pay.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]很公平，我想你已经赚到了一些额外的报酬
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_0004746D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would like to be reimbursed for materiel spent, plus extra hazard pay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想报销所有的费用，外加额外的危险津贴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Well, you did solve the job without hassle I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]嗯，我想你确实不费吹灰之力就解决了这个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_0004746E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to be paid more for the work I did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想为我所做的工作要求更多报酬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, we are not renting out rooms at the moment. But feel free to order something in the bar or take a dip in the swimming pool.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很遗憾，我们现在不出租房间。但你也可以在酒吧里点餐，或者在游泳池里泡一泡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_00047470_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any rooms available?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有房间吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I only really introduce myself to people I do business with, and you don't look like a potential investment if you catch my drift.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只向跟我做生意的人介绍自己，如果你明白我的意思的话，你看起来不像是一个潜在的投资者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Celeste Ashley [0604A961] (mod) Quest : ([0604AF84]RadWorldBounty04Dialogue) 0604AF84 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldCeleste_0004AF8D_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's Pierce Clemons. I'm a... trader of sorts. A traveling merchant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫皮尔斯·克莱蒙斯。我是一个...买卖人之类的，一个旅行商人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce Clemons [0604A955] (mod) Quest : ([0604AF84]RadWorldBounty04Dialogue) 0604AF84 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBriggsVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldPierceW_0004AF87_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, you've taken up my offer. I presume you're ready to do what needs to be done, yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你接受了我的提议。我想你已经准备好做该做的事了，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce Clemons [0604A955] (mod) Quest : ([0604AF84]RadWorldBounty04Dialogue) 0604AF84 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBriggsVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldPierceA_0004AF89_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This woman, Celeste Ashley, has been encroaching on my territory for far too long. I need her out of the picture, if you get my meaning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个女人，塞莱斯特·阿什利，已经侵占我的地盘太久了。我需要她出局，如果你明白我的意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce Clemons [0604A955] (mod) Quest : ([0604AF84]RadWorldBounty04Dialogue) 0604AF84 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBriggsVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldPierceA_0004AF89_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, I would need proof that you've done what I asked. Let's see, I don't want you to bring me her head, that's too incriminating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我需要证据证明你已经做了我要求的事情。让我想想，我不希望你把她的头带给我，那太容易入罪了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce Clemons [0604A955] (mod) Quest : ([0604AF84]RadWorldBounty04Dialogue) 0604AF84 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBriggsVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldPierceA_0004AF89_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, that's it! Bring me the horn of her brahmin. She would never willingly part ways with her prized pack animal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，对了！把她婆罗门的角给我拿来，她永远不会愿意离开她心爱的驮畜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce Clemons [0604A955] (mod) Quest : ([0604AF84]RadWorldBounty04Dialogue) 0604AF84 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBriggsVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldPierceA_0004AF89_4.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我是为赏金来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, splendid! I knew you looked like a competent hunter. Thank you, friend. Here's your payment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，好极了！我就知道你看起来像个能干的猎人。谢谢你，朋友，这是你的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce Clemons [0604A955] (mod) Quest : ([0604AF84]RadWorldBounty04Dialogue) 0604AF84 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBriggsVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldPierceB_0004AF8C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back another time, yeah? I may have more work that needs to be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下次再来，好吗？我可能会有更多的工作需要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce Clemons [0604A955] (mod) Quest : ([0604AF84]RadWorldBounty04Dialogue) 0604AF84 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBriggsVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldPierceB_0004AF8C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's the horn of Celeste's brahmin, as requested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 按照要求，这是塞莱斯特的婆罗门之角。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A bounty on my head? I can't believe that bastard would stoop so low.
ESP.TRADUIT: 悬赏我的人头？我不敢相信那个混蛋会做出这种事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Celeste Ashley [0604A961] (mod) Quest : ([0604AF84]RadWorldBounty04Dialogue) 0604AF84 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldCeleste_0004AF92_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, so what's it gonna be? I assume you're not planning to kill me outright seeing as you walked up and talked to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那你打算怎么做？我猜你不打算直接杀了我，因为你走过来跟我说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Celeste Ashley [0604A961] (mod) Quest : ([0604AF84]RadWorldBounty04Dialogue) 0604AF84 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldCeleste_0004AF92_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a bounty posted on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人悬赏你。
那就来吧，混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Celeste Ashley [0604A961] (mod) Quest : ([0604AF84]RadWorldBounty04Dialogue) 0604AF84 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldCeleste_0004AF94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nope, that's exactly what I'm gonna do. <Start Combat>
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，这正是我要做的。<开始战斗>

ESP.ORIGINAL: This won't stop until either I'm dead or he is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不会停止，直到我死或者他死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Celeste Ashley [0604A961] (mod) Quest : ([0604AF84]RadWorldBounty04Dialogue) 0604AF84 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldCeleste_0004AF96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I think I've made my choice. Hang on a second while I cut the horn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我想我已经做出了选择。稍等片刻，我把角切掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Celeste Ashley [0604A961] (mod) Quest : ([0604AF84]RadWorldBounty04Dialogue) 0604AF84 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldCeleste_0004AF96_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX PlaySound NPCBrahminDeath player.additem RWBounty04BrahminHorn 1
I'm willing to negotiate. He only wants the horn of your brahmin as proof. You don't have to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我愿意谈判，他只想要你的婆罗门的角作为证据。你不需要死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told you, this will only end when either he or I dies. And I'm not gonna just sit down and let him roll over me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉过你，只有我或他死了，这一切才会结束。我不会就这么坐着让他在我身上打滚的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Celeste Ashley [0604A961] (mod) Quest : ([0604AF84]RadWorldBounty04Dialogue) 0604AF84 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldCeleste_0004AFAC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I'm not so much of a coward to send someone else to do my dirty work for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是个派别人来替我干脏活的懦夫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Celeste Ashley [0604A961] (mod) Quest : ([0604AF84]RadWorldBounty04Dialogue) 0604AF84 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldCeleste_0004AFAC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now beat it before I kill you too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我把你也杀了之前赶紧滚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Celeste Ashley [0604A961] (mod) Quest : ([0604AF84]RadWorldBounty04Dialogue) 0604AF84 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldBo_RadWorldCeleste_0004AFAC_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要跟着我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Halt! Entry without a passport is not permitted. Present your passport or turn back, traveler.
ESP.TRADUIT: 停！没有通行证是不允许进入的。请出示你的通行证，否则请回头，旅行者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Havasu Entrance Guard [06049592] (mod) Quest : ([0604B5C7]RadWorldPassPortCheckDialogue) 0604B5C7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPasspor_0004B5C9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you are not permitted to enter through the gates.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你就不能从门里进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Havasu Entrance Guard [06049592] (mod) Quest : ([0604B5C7]RadWorldPassPortCheckDialogue) 0604B5C7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPasspor_0004B5CE_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有通行证。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's see. All right, looks good to me. Welcome to Havasu, enjoy your stay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看看，好吧，在我看来不错。欢迎来到哈瓦苏，祝你在这里过得愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Havasu Entrance Guard [06049592] (mod) Quest : ([0604B5C7]RadWorldPassPortCheckDialogue) 0604B5C7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldPa_RadWorldPasspor_0004B5CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a passport right here. <Show Passport>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有通行证。<展示通行证>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I-I'm Gwenda. Not much else to say, dear. A big ol' lady named Gwenda.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我是格温达。没有什么可说的了，亲爱的，一个叫格温达的大老太太。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gwenda [0600CD30] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWMalachaiVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldGwendaW_0004BBEA_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, dear. I don't talk to people much, so I've learned to handle everything I need myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，亲爱的。我不太和人说话，所以我已经学会了自己处理需要的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gwenda [0600CD30] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWMalachaiVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldGwendaN_0004BBEB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But say, do you play Caravan by any chance? I love that card game but since my husband isn't a fan I rarely get to play.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我说，你会不会玩 "大篷车扑克"？我喜欢那个纸牌游戏，但因为我丈夫不喜欢，所以我很少能玩到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gwenda [0600CD30] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWMalachaiVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldGwendaN_0004BBEB_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要帮忙吗？
好极了，我们来玩吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gwenda [0600CD30] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWMalachaiVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldGwendaC_0004BBEE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I'll play a game of Caravan with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我可以和你玩大篷车扑克。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, that's a shame. Maybe another time, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，真是太遗憾了，那就改天吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gwenda [0600CD30] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWMalachaiVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldGwendaC_0004BBEF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No thanks, I hate card games.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，谢谢，我讨厌纸牌游戏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do have more work, but this is a... dirty job, if you know what I mean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有很多工作要做，但都是...肮脏的工作，如果你明白我的意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_0004C34F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that our elevator is working properly, we have access to the suites level again. However, nobody's been up there in quite some time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在电梯正常工作了，我们又可以进入套间层了。然而，已经有一段时间没人上去过了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_0004C34F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could you go clean it up, make it look presentable again? I'll pay you, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能去打扫一下吗，让它看起来更像样些？当然，我会付钱给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_0004C34F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anything else that needs doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么需要做的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! It's quite dusty so I recommend wearing a mask when cleaning! Come back here when you're done, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了！这里灰尘比较大，所以我建议在打扫的时候戴上口罩！做完了就回来，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_0004C352_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage rdwrldPittsburgPointQuest02 5 player.additemhealthpercent NVDLC04HelmetBreathingMask 1 0.25 player.additem RWWeapBroom 1 player.equipitem NVDLC04HelmetBreathingMask 0 1 player.equipitem RWWeapBroom 0 1
Sure, I've got nothing better to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我没有更好的事可做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right then. I guess I'll have to hire more staff...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。我想我得雇更多的员工了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_0004C353_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, no. I didn't come here to play janitor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，不了，我不是来这里当清洁工的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! We'll have this hotel business up and running again in no time! Thanks a bunch. Here's your payment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了！我们很快就能让这家酒店重新开业了！多谢，这是你的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_0004C993_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, there is one more thing you could help me with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，还有一件事你可以帮我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_0004C993_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see, we need to let everyone know we're open again. I need you to go and post some advertising for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，我们得让大家知道我们又开业了。我需要你去帮我贴一些广告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_0004C993_3.ogg
