ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh I know! There should be some paint in the basement. Take that paint, and go write something on the billboards down by the highway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我想起来了！地下室应该有些油漆，拿上油漆，去公路边的广告牌上写点什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_0004C993_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That should let travellers know that we're taking customers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这应该能让旅行者知道我们正在接待顾客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_0004C993_5.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经把套房打扫干净了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! I'll pay you for this too, of course. See you soon!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了！当然，我也会付钱给你的。待会儿见！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_0004C997_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，听起来够简单。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose I've kept you long enough. Your talents are needed elsewhere, am I right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我已经留你留得够久了。其他地方也需要你的才能，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_0004C998_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 不了谢谢，我干完了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to get the paint from the basement and write some lines advertising our hotel down by the highway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你去地下室拿油漆在高速公路边写几行我们酒店的广告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_0004C999_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There should be these big, ground level billboards that are perfect to write on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 应该有这样大的地面广告牌，非常适合在上面写字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_0004C999_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll compensate you for the work, of course. Good luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我会对你的工作给予酬劳。祝好运！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_0004C999_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, what was that job you were talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实，你说的那个工作是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks a bunch! Here's your payment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多谢！这是你的报酬！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ariella Cain [06047452] (mod) Quest : ([06047454]RadWorldPPHDialogue) 06047454 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAbeechuVT\RadWorldPP_RadWorldAriella_0004C99C_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经画好了广告。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you usually do this? Just barge into other peoples homes and ask who they are?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你经常这样做吗？闯进别人家，问他们是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Horace [0604CFCF] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPazureVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldHoraceW_0004CFD7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not one to get angry, but some people might not like trespassing, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是那种会生气的人，但有些人可能不喜欢非法入侵，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Horace [0604CFCF] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPazureVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldHoraceW_0004CFD7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But to answer your question, I'm Horace. I'm a bit of a jack of all trades handyman around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但要回答你的问题，我叫贺瑞斯。我是这里所有行业的杂活工，有点像万事通。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Horace [0604CFCF] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPazureVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldHoraceW_0004CFD7_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hm, you a friend of Jimmy's? Nice to hear more people being nice to that old couple.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，你是杰米的朋友？很高兴听到更多的人对那对老夫妇好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Horace [0604CFCF] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPazureVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldHoraceQ_0004CFD9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks. I'll make sure to process this, so come back later when I'm done, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢。我会处理好的，等我处理完再来，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Horace [0604CFCF] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPazureVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldHoraceQ_0004CFD9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've delivered a crate of meat from Jimmy's for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从杰米那里给你送来了一箱肉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nah, man. I'm not about to give work to any old goofball who stumbles in. Sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，伙计，我不打算把任何工作交给一个偶然闯进来的老呆瓜。对不起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Horace [0604CFCF] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPazureVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldHoraceQ_0004CFD8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any work that needs doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么工作需要做吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! I've put the crate in the cart next to the barn. Horace lives in a house on the southern end of Donkey Acres, west of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了！我已经把板条箱放在谷仓旁边的推车里了。贺瑞斯住在驴子田园最南端的一栋房子里，在这里的西边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [0600CD32] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldJimmysQ_0004CFDE_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我可以。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's too bad, these need to be delivered pretty soon or they'll spoil. Come back if you change your mind, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那太糟了，这些东西必须尽快送到，否则会变质的。不过，如果你改变主意了就回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [0600CD32] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldJimmysQ_0004CFDF_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 不谢谢，我就算了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, we have a crate of special grade meat ordered by my friend Horace down in Donkey Acres.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我们有一箱特级肉，是我在驴子田园的朋友贺瑞斯订购的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [0600CD32] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldJimmyQu_0004CFDD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This crate is kinda heavy, but are you up for delivering it for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这箱子有点重，但你能帮我送过去吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [0600CD32] (mod) Quest : ([0600CD36]RadWorldJimmyDialogue) 0600CD36 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWAlexDVT\RadWorldJi_RadWorldJimmyQu_0004CFDD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said you had another task that needed doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说你还有别的任务要做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's Smith. Me and the boys have been miners for decades. We're currently in between work because of a cave in at our previous mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫史密斯，我和弟兄们已经当了几十年矿工了。由于之前的矿井发生塌方，我们目前正处于停工状态。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miner Captain Smith [0604DC17] (mod) Quest : ([0604DC1F]RadWorldMinerDialogue) 0604DC1F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMi_RadWorldMinerWh_0004DC26_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, you saw the notice. Yes, we're in need of a mercenary capable of running a few errands and handle eventual pests we encounter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你看到布告了。是的，我们需要一名雇佣兵来帮我们跑腿，还要对付我们最后遇到的害虫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miner Captain Smith [0604DC17] (mod) Quest : ([0604DC1F]RadWorldMinerDialogue) 0604DC1F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMi_RadWorldMinerQu_0004DC27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And since you've taken the notice, I assume you're interested in the job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你收到了布告，我想你一定对这份工作很感兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miner Captain Smith [0604DC17] (mod) Quest : ([0604DC1F]RadWorldMinerDialogue) 0604DC1F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMi_RadWorldMinerQu_0004DC27_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well then, we should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我们应该开始行动了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miner Captain Smith [0604DC17] (mod) Quest : ([0604DC1F]RadWorldMinerDialogue) 0604DC1F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMi_RadWorldMinerQu_0004DC27_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me and the boys are gonna head to the mine, you go to Tom Plinkins and pick up a box of dynamite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和伙计们去矿井，你去乱射汤姆拿一箱炸药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miner Captain Smith [0604DC17] (mod) Quest : ([0604DC1F]RadWorldMinerDialogue) 0604DC1F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMi_RadWorldMinerQu_0004DC27_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you don't need to worry about payment, I've already taken care of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不用担心报酬的事，我已经安排好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miner Captain Smith [0604DC17] (mod) Quest : ([0604DC1F]RadWorldMinerDialogue) 0604DC1F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMi_RadWorldMinerQu_0004DC27_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage rdwrldMinerQuest01 10 RWMinerCaptainREF.additem HatConstruction 1 RWMinerCaptainREF.equipitem HatConstruction 0 0 RWMiner01REF.additem HatConstruction 1 RWMiner01REF.equipitem HatConstruction 0 0 RWMiner02REF.additem HatConstruction 1 RWMiner02REF.equipitem HatConstruction 0 0 RWMiner03REF.additem HatConstruction 1 RWMiner03REF.equipitem HatConstruction 0 0

ESP.TRADUIT: 我是为了工作来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jacob's alive? Sweet heavens, what a miracle! You've done a great job here, mercenary. Here's your payment, plus a little extra.
ESP.TRADUIT: 雅各布还活着？苍天啊，真是个奇迹！你干得很好，雇佣兵，这是你的报酬，还有一点额外奖金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miner Captain Smith [0604DC17] (mod) Quest : ([0604DC1F]RadWorldMinerDialogue) 0604DC1F (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMi_RadWorldMinerQu_0004DC2B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I cleared the mine and found a miner alive in the back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我清理了矿井，在后面发现了一个活着的矿工。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He didn't make it, huh? Well, not like I expected anything else. He's been down there for weeks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他没能活下来，对吧？好吧，我也没指望别的，他已经在下面呆了好几个星期了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miner Captain Smith [0604DC17] (mod) Quest : ([0604DC1F]RadWorldMinerDialogue) 0604DC1F (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMi_RadWorldMinerQu_0004E876_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you anyway though. Here's your payment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过还是谢谢你。这是你的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miner Captain Smith [0604DC17] (mod) Quest : ([0604DC1F]RadWorldMinerDialogue) 0604DC1F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMi_RadWorldMinerQu_0004E876_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I cleared the mine and found a dead miner in the back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我清理了矿井，在后面发现了一个死去的矿工。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This here is a mine for iron ore. We worked on it for a few months until we had a cave in and unfortunately lost one of our miners.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个铁矿。我们在那里工作了几个月，直到塌方，不幸地失去了一名矿工。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miner Captain Smith [0604DC17] (mod) Quest : ([0604DC1F]RadWorldMinerDialogue) 0604DC1F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMi_RadWorldMinerAb_0004DC2D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After trying to save him for a few days, we eventually gave up and decided to take a break.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在试图营救他几天后，我们最终放弃了，决定休息一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miner Captain Smith [0604DC17] (mod) Quest : ([0604DC1F]RadWorldMinerDialogue) 0604DC1F (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMi_RadWorldMinerAb_0004DC2D_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Splendid. Let's have a look at it then, shall we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了。让我们来看看，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miner Captain Smith [0604DC17] (mod) Quest : ([0604DC1F]RadWorldMinerDialogue) 0604DC1F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMi_RadWorldMinerAr_0004DC2C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh yeah, a fine pack of sticks. This will do nicely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢对，一包不错的棍子。这会解决得很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miner Captain Smith [0604DC17] (mod) Quest : ([0604DC1F]RadWorldMinerDialogue) 0604DC1F (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMi_RadWorldMinerAr_0004DC2C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hang on a second, while I bunch them up and rig a fuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 稍等一下，我把它们捆起来，装上保险丝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miner Captain Smith [0604DC17] (mod) Quest : ([0604DC1F]RadWorldMinerDialogue) 0604DC1F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMi_RadWorldMinerAr_0004DC2C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go. Place it down at the rubble, way back to the left. I've already set up the detonator so you only have to connect the fuses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿去吧。把它放在碎石堆上，靠左边的地方，我已经设置好引爆器了，所以你只需要连接引信。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miner Captain Smith [0604DC17] (mod) Quest : ([0604DC1F]RadWorldMinerDialogue) 0604DC1F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWDebugVT\RadWorldMi_RadWorldMinerAr_0004DC2C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage rdwrldMinerQuest01 30 RWMineFenceREF.unlock player.additem RWDynamiteBundle 1 RWExplosivesMarkerSpotREF.enable

ESP.TRADUIT: 我带来了炸药。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, I've got the box right here. Here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我这里有这个盒子。给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Groose [060188BB] (mod) Quest : ([06018F10]RadWorldTomGrooseDialogue) 06018F10 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBackburnerVT\RadWorldTo_RadWorldTomGroo_0004E24E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to pick up some dynamite on behalf of Smith, the Miner Captain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来替矿工队长史密斯取炸药的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm good at the moment, thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在很好，谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_0005075E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have anything that needs doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么需要做的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Indeed, I am in need of some help. And I would appreciate it if you would be... discreet about the whole ordeal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 的确，我需要一些帮助。如果你能...谨慎地对待整个事件，我会很感激。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_0005075F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see, my previous nurse worked here for several years before abruptly leaving. She never gave me a clear reason and I would like to find out why.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，我以前的护士在这里工作了几年，然后突然离开了。她从未给我一个明确的理由，我想找出原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_0005075F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to find out why she left, then report the reason back to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你找出她离开的原因，然后报告给我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_0005075F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As I said earlier, I want it to be discreet. Don't go running your mouth to every guy in town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像我之前说的，我想要保密。别对镇上的每个人都信口开河。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_0005075F_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have anything that needs doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么需要做的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You saw the notice, huh? That's right. I'm in need of a discreet fellow to dig up some info for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到布告了？没错，我需要一个谨慎的人来帮我挖掘一些信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00050760_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see, my previous nurse worked here for several years before abruptly leaving. She never gave me a clear reason and I would like to find out why.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，我以前的护士在这里工作了几年，然后突然离开了。她从未给我一个明确的理由，我想找出原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00050760_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to find out why she left, then report the reason back to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你找出她离开的原因，然后报告给我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00050760_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And as I said earlier, I want it to be discreet. Don't go running your mouth to every guy in town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有就像我之前说的，我想要保密。别对镇上的每个人都信口开河。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00050760_4.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来做"侦探"工作的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm... I see, I see. Curious, but I still don't have any clues on where she went.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...我明白了，我明白了。很不寻常，但我仍然没有任何关于她去哪里的线索。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00011A54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you anyway, and I'll appreciate you keeping quiet about all this, yeah? Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样谢谢你，我会很感激你对这一切保持沉默的，好吗？很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00011A54_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage rdwrldMendezQuest01 200 RewardKarma -50 Player.additem Caps001 200 Set RadWorldHavasuMiscDialogue.MendezQuest01MendezSide to 1
I found this diary in the nurse's apartment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在护士的公寓里找到了这本日记。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No problem. Here, you can borrow mine. Just bring it back to me once you're done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，给，你可以借用我的。用完给我拿来就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr Mendez [060342F4] (mod) Quest : ([060342FD]RadWorldDrMendezDialogue) 060342FD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWPatrickVT\RadWorldDr_RadWorldDoctorM_00050763_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have a passport into town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有进城的通行证。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, don't go any further! The snipers on the other side have orders to shoot anyone who tries to cross the bridge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，别再往前走了！另一边的狙击手奉命射杀任何试图过桥的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [0601471C] (mod) Quest : ([0605274B]RadWorldNCRNPCDialogue) 0605274B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWBanana\RadWorldNC_RadWorldNCRTroo_0005274D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're welcome to stay here with us, but I reckon you want to move on, maybe find your way home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎你和我们一起留在这里，但我估计你想继续前进，也许你能找到回家的路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoWh_0005275A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only way out of here is through the tunnel to the south.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从这里出去的唯一办法是穿过南边的隧道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoWh_0005275A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know who has the key, but if you follow the road and take a right at the fork, you should be able to get there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道谁有钥匙，但如果你沿着这条路走，在岔路口右转，你应该能到达那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Yuuko [06014FFF] (mod) Quest : ([0601B1B9]RadWorldYuukoDialogue) 0601B1B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWKatyVT\RadWorldYu_RadWorldYuukoWh_0005275A_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我该做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who am I? I'm nobody significant. I'm just an old man living in a decrepit gas station, tinkering with machines and what not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是谁？我是个无足轻重的人。我只是个住在破旧加油站里，整天摆弄机器的老头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanWh_00056B24_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, the parts! I was wondering what took the other guy so long. I'm guessing he didn't fare too well if you're the one bringing them here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，那些零件！我还在想那个人怎么花了这么长时间。我觉得，如果是你把它们带来的，那他的情况应该不会太好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanQu_00056B27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found a delivery that was addressed to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现了一个寄给你的快递。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, the parts! I was wondering what took the other guy so long. I'm guessing he didn't fare too well if you're the one bringing them here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，那些零件！我还在想那个人怎么花了这么长时间。我觉得，如果是你把它们带来的，那他的情况应该不会太好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanQu_00056B2A_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了公文包。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually yes, I do have something that needs doing. I sent out a scavenger to fetch me some parts from beyond the tunnel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实是，我确实有事情需要做。我派了一个拾荒者去隧道那边给我拿一些零件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanNe_00056B29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew it was gonna be a difficult job, but that was months ago. I don't think he's gonna make it back, so could you try to find out what happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道这工作不容易，但那都是几个月前的事了。恐怕他回不来了，所以你能去看看发生了什么事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanNe_00056B29_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mostly electrical parts. You know how every airplane around here seems to crash?
ESP.TRADUIT: 主要是电气部件。你知道这里的每架飞机似乎都会坠毁吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanWh_00056B2C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They get shot down by the automatic targeting system in the base just south of here. I'm working on a bypass that will disable it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 都是被这里南边基地的自动瞄准系统击落的。我正在研究一个能使其失效的分流。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanWh_00056B2C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The last plane got shot down only a few days ago. I hope the guy who parachuted down is still all right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上一架飞机几天前才被击落，我希望那个跳伞的人现在还好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanWh_00056B2C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I'll get to working on this bypass module. If you want to help more, come back later when I've finished it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我要开始研究这个分流模块了。如果你还想帮忙，等我做完再来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanWh_00056B2C_4.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 公文包里到底有什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, he was in pretty bad shape when he landed. Me and a buddy of mine carried him down to the clinic by the bridge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，他落地的时候状态很糟糕，我和我的一个朋友把他抬到了桥边的诊所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanPa_00056B2E_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，有人幸存？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not yet. I'm still working on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还没有，我还在努力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanQu_00056B30_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 分流模块完成了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is! However, I don't think I can handle installing it myself. The army base has recently been infested with these giant beasts called Deathclaws.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的！不过，我想我自己安装不了。这个军事基地最近到处都是一种叫死亡爪的巨兽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dylan [06056B19] (mod) Quest : ([0604CFD1]RadWorldDonkeyAcresDialogue) 0604CFD1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\havasublues.esm\RWHenryShultzVT\RadWorldDo_RadWorldDylanQu_00056B31_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know it's a lot to ask of you, but could you go install it? I can't pay you, but you'd be doing everyone around here a great favor.

ESP.TRADUIT: 把菲基特的命运告诉奈杰尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This seems to be the launch controls for the rocket. What will you do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这好像是火箭的发射控制装置。你想怎么做？
洲际弹道导弹发射控制
什么都不做。
输入发射码密钥。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You become disoriented in the raging sandstorm...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在肆虐的沙尘暴中迷失了方向...

ESP.ORIGINAL: It appears that you can disarm this rigged grenade rifle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来你可以拆除这把安装了手榴弹的步枪。
别去碰它。
拆除装有手榴弹的步枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What floor would you like to go to?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要去几楼？
选择楼层
留在这里。
地下室
大堂
三楼。
客房。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The miner is unconscious, but alive. In his hand he's clutching a crystal that's looking mighty valuable. The other miners must miss this man, and if saved, would likely want to keep the crystal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个矿工失去了知觉，但还活着，他手里拿着一块看起来很值钱的水晶。其他矿工一定很想念这个人，如果他获救了，他们很可能会想要保留水晶。
让他保持原样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Snuff the last traces of life out of the him and steal the crystal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 消除他最后一丝生命的痕迹然后偷走水晶。
你被冻结了！
你被冻结了！
此角色正忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: These notes resemble time stamps when messages were broadcast and their contents, mostly shipment notices and similar stuff. It seems likely that the owner of this radio has been spying on someone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些笔记类似于信息广播时的时间戳和内容，大多是发货通知和类似的东西。看来这台收音机的主人很可能一直在监视着某人。
文件

ESP.ORIGINAL: This piece of old radio equipment seems functional, but it's fairly heavy and don't seem very valuable so you pass up on trying to haul it away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这台旧无线电设备看起来很实用，但它相当重，而且看起来不是很有价值，所以你放弃了把它拖走的想法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This attraption appears to be a brewing stand of some sort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个装置似乎是某种类型的酿酒台。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do not have any Empty Beer Bottles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没有任何空啤酒瓶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The stench coming from this small tunnel reeks badly. Only a fool would try to enter without a reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从这个小通道传来的臭味很难闻。只有傻子才会无缘无故地试图进入。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The ant mound is destroyed and can no longer be entered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 蚁丘被摧毁，无法再进入。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You take the bomb and shove it as far in as you can inside the hole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你拿起炸弹，把它尽可能地塞进洞里。
这个按钮没有任何作用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This crate is filled to the brim with 5.56 caliber ammunition! You take it with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个箱子装满了5.56口径的弹药！你把它带走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This crate is quite waterlogged, and the ammunition inside is of the 9mm caliber. Not what Edwin wants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个箱子被水浸透了，里面的弹药是9毫米口径的。这不是埃德温想要的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Half empty crate with nothing but canisters of grease.
ESP.TRADUIT: 半空的板条箱，除了几罐润滑油之外没别的了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
A bunch of papers, mostly invoices.
You spot some correspondence between Miss Rocket and what seems to be her lover. It seems that their relationship ended poorly, for the other part.
One of the more interesting papers mentions a switch of ownership of an apartment in downtown Havasu, in the red house next to the bank on the second floor. Perhaps it's worth investigating.
ESP.TRADUIT:
一堆文件，大部分是发票。
你发现了一些火箭小姐和她的情人之间的通信。另一方面，他们的关系似乎结束得很糟糕。
其中一份比较有趣的文件提到了哈瓦苏市中心一套公寓的所有权转换，这套公寓位于银行旁边二楼的红房子里。也许这值得调查。
文件
米尔斯诊所

ESP.ORIGINAL:
These drums contains the drinking water for the entire camp. If they were to be poisoned, the camp would surely be significantly weakened within a few days.
(Poisoning the water requires 3 Bleak Venom)
ESP.TRADUIT:
这些桶里装着整个营地的饮用水。如果他们被毒死，几天之内，营地的力量肯定会大大削弱。
(在水里下毒需要3个寒毒)
水桶
什么都不做。
在水里下毒。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This wall looks severely weakened, and will likely break with a push. However, unless you're strong enough to punch it down with your fists you would need a tool to break the wall.
Sledgehammer, Super Sledge, Pickaxe or Strength 9+ Required.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这堵墙看起来很脆弱，一推就可能会倒。然而，除非你有足够的力气用拳头把它砸开，否则你还是需要一个工具来打破这面墙。
需要大锤、超级动力锤、鹤嘴锄或9以上的力量。
薄弱墙壁
什么都不做。
砸碎墙壁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The woman is bound and gagged, you won't get anything out of her now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个女人被绑住并塞住了嘴，你现在什么都问不出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where would you like to go with the boat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想坐船去哪里？
选择一个目的地
留在这里。
特瑞的船
匹兹堡角
鲶鱼湾
拖车公园
北岸
莫哈维废土

ESP.ORIGINAL: You pluck a tooth that looks different from the others from Rally's decomposing skull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从拉力的腐烂头骨上拔下了一颗看起来与众不同的牙齿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This door is locked, but not by any normal lock that you recognize. There is a small socket to input something, but you don't seem to have the correct key.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这扇门是锁着的，但不是你所认识的普通锁。
有一个小插座可以插入东西，但你好像没有正确的钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This door is locked, but not by any normal lock that you recognize. You try to input the tooth, and while it does fit, nothing happens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这扇门是锁着的，但不是你认识的普通锁。 你试着插入牙齿，虽然它确实适合，但什么也没有发生。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
As you put the powered tooth into the hole, it sparks and a whirling sound starts buzzing.
The door unlocks.
ESP.TRADUIT:
当你把通电的牙齿放入孔中，它开始产生火花，并发出嗡嗡的旋涡声。
门解锁了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Upon Big Bradley's death, an alarm starts blaring and you can't help but feel uneasy...
ESP.TRADUIT: 大布拉德利死后，一个警报开始响起，你不禁感到不安...
